question: 如图,在△ABC中,已知∠A=80°,∠B=60°,DE∥BC,那么∠CED的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, it is known that ∠A = 80°, ∠B = 60°, DE ∥ BC, then the size of ∠CED is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A + ∠B + ∠C = 180° (the sum of the angles in a triangle), ∠A = 80°, ∠B = 60°, therefore ∠C = 180° - ∠A - ∠B = 180° - 80° - 60° = 40°. Since DE is parallel to BC, therefore ∠CED + ∠C = 180° (when two lines are parallel, the consecutive interior angles are supplementary). Therefore, ∠CED = 180° - 40° = 140°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,直线EF交AB于点E,交CD于点F,EG平分∠BEF,交CD于点G,∠1=50°,则∠2等于()
answer_cot: ∵ABIICD,∴∠BEF+∠1=180°(两直线平行,同旁内角互补)∵∠1=50°,∴∠BEF=130°∵EG平分∠BEF,∴∠BEG=\frac{1}{2}∠BEF=65°(角平分线的定义)5°(角平分线的定义)∴∠2=∠BEG=65°(两直线平行1内错角相等),故选C
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, straight line EF intersects AB at point E, intersects CD at point F, EG bisects ∠BEF, and it intersects CD at point G, ∠1 = 50°, then ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠BEF + ∠1 = 180° (when two lines are parallel, the consecutive interior angles are supplementary). Given that ∠1 = 50°, therefore ∠BEF = 130°. Since EG bisects ∠BEF, therefore ∠BEG = 1/2 ∠BEF = 65° (definition of angle bisector). Therefore ∠2 = ∠BEG = 65° (when two lines are parallel, the alternate interior angles are equal). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,BD平分∠ABC,CD∥AB,若∠BCD=70°,则∠CDB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD bisects ∠ABC, CD ∥ AB, if ∠BCD = 70°, then the degree of ∠CDB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD ∥ AB, therefore ∠BCD + ∠CBA = 180°, thus ∠CBA = 180° - 70° = 110°. Since BD bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABD = 1/2 ∠CBA = 55°, and since AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠CDB = ∠ABD = 55°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点B,AO的延长线交⊙O于点C,连接BC,若∠A=36°,则∠C等于()
answer_cot: ∵AB与⊙O相切于点B,∴∠ABO=90°,∵∠A=36°,∴∠BOA=54°∴由圆周角定理得:∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠BOA=27^{°},故选D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, the extension line of AO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC, if ∠A = 36°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, therefore ∠ABO = 90°. Since ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠BOA = 54°. Hence, by the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠C = 1/2 ∠BOA = 27°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,直线a,b相交于点O,若∠1等于50°,则∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, lines a and b intersect at point O, if ∠1 equals 50°, then ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠2 and ∠1 are vertical angles, therefore ∠2 = ∠1 = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB//CD,EF分别为交AB,CD于点E,F,∠1=50°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, EF intersects AB at point E, intersects CD at point F, ∠1 = 50°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the answer diagram, because AB is parallel to C, ∠1 = 50°. Therefore, ∠3 = ∠1 = 50°. Thus, ∠2 = 180° - ∠3 = 130°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC≌△ADE,若∠B=70°,∠C=30°,∠DAC=35°,则∠EAC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is congruent to △ADE. If ∠B = 70°, ∠C = 30°, ∠DAC = 35°, then the degree of ∠EAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠B = 70°, ∠C = 30°, therefore ∠BAC = 180° - ∠B - ∠C = 180° - 70° - 30° = 80°. Since △ABC ≌ △ADE, therefore ∠EAD = ∠BAC = 80°, thus ∠EAC = ∠EAD - ∠DAC = 80° - 35° = 45°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC≌△DEF,点A与D,B与E分别是对应顶点,且测得BC=5cm,BF=7cm,则EC长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ≅ △DEF, points A and D, B and E are corresponding vertices, and it is measured that BC = 5 cm, BF = 7 cm, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC ≌ △BAD, therefore EF = BC = 5cm. Since BF = 7cm, BC = 5cm, therefore CF = EF - CF = 3cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=BC,AD平分∠CAB交BC于D,DE⊥AB于E,若AB=6cm,则△DBE的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵AD平分∠CAB,AC⊥BC于点C,DE⊥AB于E,∴CD=DE.又∵AD=AD∴Rt△ACD≌Rt△AED,∴AC=AE.又∵AC=BC,∴△DBE的周长为DE+BD+EB=CD+BD+EB=BC+EB=AC+EB=AE+EB=AB=6故选A
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, AC = BC, AD bisects ∠CAB and intersects BC at D, DE ⊥ AB at E, if AB = 6 cm, then the perimeter of △DBE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD bisects ∠CAB, AC is perpendicular to BC at point C, DE is perpendicular to AB at E, therefore CD = DE. Also, since AD = AD, right triangle ACD is congruent to right triangle AED, therefore AC = AE. Since AC = BC, therefore the perimeter of △DBE is DE + BD + EB = CD + BD + EB = BC + EB = AC + EB = AE + EB = AB = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC中,AB=AC,∠A=36°,AB的垂直平分线DE交AC于D,交AB于E,则∠BDC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠A = 36°, the perpendicular bisector DE of AB intersects AC at D, intersects AB at E, then the degree of ∠BDC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠C = (180° - ∠A) / 2 = (180° - 36°) / 2 = 72°. Since DE perpendicularly bisects AB, therefore ∠A = ∠ABD = 36°, thus ∠BDC = ∠A + ∠ABD = 36° + 36° = 72°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=36°,将△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转60°得到△AED,AD与BC交于点F,则∠AFC的度数为()
answer_cot: 根据旋转图形可得∠FAC=60°,根据△AFC的内角和定理可得∠AFC=180°-36°-60°=84°.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 36°, rotate △ABC 60° counterclockwise around point A to get △AED, AD intersects BC at point F, then the degree of ∠AFC is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the rotation diagram, ∠FAC = 60°. According to the interior angle sum theorem of △AFC, ∠AFC = 180° - 36° - 60° = 84°.

question: 如图,直线AB∥CD,Rt△DEF如图放置,∠EDF=90°,若∠1+∠F=70°,则∠2的度数为()
answer_cot: 根据∠1+∠F=70°以及三角形的外角的性质可得∠ABD=70°,根据AB//CD可得∠ABD+∠BDC=180°,则∠BDC=110°,根据∠EDF=90°可得∠2=110°-90°=20°.
question_en: As shown in the figure, line AB ∥ CD, Rt△DEF is placed as shown, ∠EDF = 90°, if ∠1 + ∠F = 70°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: According to ∠1 + ∠F = 70° and the property of the exterior angle of a triangle, we can get ∠ABD = 70°. Given that AB is parallel to CD, we can get ∠ABD + ∠BDC = 180°, then ∠BDC = 110°. Given that ∠EDF = 90°, we can get ∠2 = 110° - 90° = 20°.

question: 如图,AB∥EF,CD⊥EF,∠BAC=50°,则∠ACD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ EF, CD ⊥ EF, ∠BAC = 50°, then ∠ACD = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, extend AC to intersect EF at point G; Because AB is parallel to EF, therefore ∠DGC = ∠BAC = 50°; Since CD is perpendicular to EF, therefore ∠CDG = 90°, thus ∠ACD = 90° + 50° = 140°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,∠OAB=35°,则∠ACB的度数为()
answer_cot: 根据OA=OB可得∠OBA=∠OAB=35°,则∠AOB=110°,根据圆的基本性质可得,∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=55^{°}
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O, ∠OAB = 35°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: According to OA = OB, we can get ∠OBA = ∠OAB = 35°, then ∠AOB = 110°. According to the basic properties of the circle, we can get ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 55°.

question: 将直尺和直角三角板按如图方式摆放(∠ACB为直角),已知∠1=30°,则∠2的大小是()
answer_cot: 先根据两角互余的性质求出∠3的度数,再由平行线的性质即可得出结论.∵∠1+∠3=90°,∠1=30°,∴∠3=60°.∵直尺的两边互相平行,∴∠2=∠3=60°.
question_en: Place the ruler and the right-angled triangle as shown in the figure (with ∠ACB being a right angle). It is known that ∠1 = 30°, then the size of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: First, find the degree of ∠3 based on the property of complementary angles, then the conclusion can be drawn from the property of parallel lines. Because ∠1 + ∠3 = 90°, and ∠1 = 30°, therefore ∠3 = 60°. Since the two sides of the ruler are parallel to each other, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 60°.

question: 如图,直线a与直线b被直线c所截,b⊥c,垂足为点A,∠1=70°．若使直线b与直线a平行,则可将直线b绕着点A顺时针旋转()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a and line b are intersected by line c, b ⊥ c, with the foot of the perpendicular at point A, ∠1 = 70°. To make line b parallel to line a, line b can be rotated clockwise around point A by ()
answer_cot_en: Because b ⊥ c, therefore ∠2 = 90°. Since ∠1 = 70° and a is parallel to b, therefore the degree of rotation of line b around point A clockwise is 90° - 70° = 20°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,弦AC∥半径OB,∠BOC=50°,则∠OAB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, chord AC ∥ radius OB, ∠BOC = 50°, then the degree of ∠OAB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because ∠BOC = 50°, therefore ∠BAC = 25°. Since AC is parallel to OB, therefore ∠OBA = ∠BAC = 25°. Given that OA = OB, therefore ∠OAB = ∠OBA = 25°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: □ABCD中,对角线AC与BD交于点O,∠DAC=42°,∠CBD=23°,则∠COD是()．
answer_cot: ∵AD//BC,∴∠BCA=∠DAC=42°,根据三角形的外角等于和它不相邻的内角和,∠COD=∠BCO+∠CBO=42°+23°=65°,故选
question_en: In □ABCD, the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, ∠DAC = 42°, ∠CBD = 23°, then ∠COD is ().
answer_cot_en: Because AD is parallel to BC, therefore ∠BCA = ∠DAC = 42°. According to the rule that the exterior angle of a triangle equals the sum of its non-adjacent interior angles, ∠COD = ∠BCO + ∠CBO = 42° + 23° = 65°. Hence, the answer is:

question: 直线a、b、c、d的位置如图所示,如果∠1=58°,∠2=58°,∠3=70°,那么∠4等于()
answer_cot: 根据同位角相等,两直线平行这一定理可知a//b,再根据两直线平行,同旁内角互补可得∠3+∠5=180°,即∠5=180°-∠3=180°-70°=110°,因此可求得∠4=∠5=110°.故选C
question_en: As shown in the figure, the positions of lines a, b, c, and d are as shown. If ∠1 = 58°, ∠2 = 58°, ∠3 = 70°, then ∠4 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: According to the theorem that corresponding angles are equal when two lines are parallel, it is known that a is parallel to b. Then, based on the principle that when two lines are parallel, the consecutive interior angles are supplementary, we get ∠3 + ∠5 = 180°, that is, ∠5 = 180° - ∠3 = 180° - 70° = 110°. Therefore, ∠4 can be calculated as ∠4 = ∠5 = 110°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,a∥b,∠1=158°,∠2=42°,∠4=50°．那么∠3=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, ∠1 = 158°, ∠2 = 42°, ∠4 = 50°. Then ∠3 = ()
answer_cot_en: Draw BC parallel to a, BE parallel to b. Because a is parallel to b, therefore a is parallel to b, which is parallel to BC, which is parallel to DE. Given that ∠1 = 158°, ∠2 = 42°, ∠4 = 50°, therefore ∠ABC = 180° - 158° = 22°. Therefore ∠CBD = ∠BDE = 42° - 22° = 20°, ∠EDF = ∠4 = 50°. Therefore ∠3 = ∠BDE + ∠EDF = 20° + 50° = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、D是⊙O上的两点,分别连结AC、BC、CD、OD.若∠DOB=140°,则∠ACD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O. Connect AC, BC, CD, and OD respectively. If ∠DOB = 140°, then ∠ACD = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DOB = 140°, therefore ∠AOD = 40°, thus ∠ACD = 1/2 ∠AOD = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知∠1=∠2=∠3=55°,则∠4的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠1 = ∠2 = ∠3 = 55°, then the degree of ∠4 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = ∠2, and ∠5 = ∠1 (vertical angles are equal), therefore ∠2 = ∠5, thus a is parallel to b (equal corresponding angles imply parallel lines); therefore ∠3 = ∠6 = 55° (when two lines are parallel, alternate interior angles are equal), hence ∠4 = 180° - 55° = 125° (adjacent angles are supplementary). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,M,N分别为AB、CD上,且AM=CN,MN与AC交于点O,连接BO.若∠DAC=28°,则∠OBC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, M and N are respectively on AB and CD, and AM = CN, MN intersects AC at point O, connect BO. If ∠DAC = 28°, then the degree of ∠OBC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, therefore AB ∥ CD, and AB = BC, therefore ∠MAO = ∠NCO, and ∠AMO = ∠CNO. In △AMO and △CNO, therefore △AMO ≌ △CNO (ASA), thus AO = CO. Since AB = BC, therefore BO ⊥ AC, thus ∠BOC = 90°. Given that ∠DAC = 28°, and BC ∥ AD, therefore ∠BCA = ∠DAC = 28°, thus ∠OBC = 90° - 28° = 62°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A,B两点,若∠C=65°,则∠P的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B, respectively. If ∠C = 65°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O, therefore OA ⊥ AP, OB ⊥ BP, thus ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Also, since ∠AOB = 2∠C = 130°, then ∠P = 360° - (90° + 90° + 130°) = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: (4分)如图,直线a∥b,直线c分别与a,b相交,∠1=50°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b, line c intersects with a and b respectively, ∠1 = 50°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because a is parallel to b, ∠1 = 50°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 50°. Since ∠2 + ∠3 = 180°, therefore ∠2 = 130°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: (3分)如图,EF∥BC,AC平分∠BAF,∠B=50°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, EF ∥ BC, AC bisects ∠BAF, ∠B = 50°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because EF is parallel to BC, therefore ∠EAB = ∠B = 50°, ∠C = ∠CAF, thus ∠BAF = 180° - 50° = 130°. Since AC bisects ∠BAF, therefore ∠CAF = 130° ÷ 2 = 65°, thus ∠C = 65°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,为测量学校旗杆的高度,小东用长为3.2米的竹竿作测量工具,移动竹竿,使竹竿顶端与旗杆顶端的影子恰好落在地面的同一点,此时,竹竿与这一点相距8米,与旗杆相距22米,则旗杆的高度为()米.
question_en: As shown in the figure, to measure the height of the school flagpole, Xiao Dong used a bamboo pole 3.2 meters long as a measuring tool. He moved the bamboo pole so that the shadow of the top end of the bamboo pole and the top end of the flagpole fell on the same point on the ground. At this time, the bamboo pole was 8 meters away from this point and 22 meters away from the flagpole, then the height of the flagpole is () meters.
answer_cot_en: If we set the height of the flagpole as x meters, then 3.2/x = 8/(8+22), therefore x = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平地上种植树木时,要求株距(相邻两树间的水平距离)为4m．如果在坡度为0.75的山坡上种树,也要求株距为4m,那么相邻两树间的坡面距离为()
answer_cot: tan\alpha=0.5=\frac{铅直高度}{水平距离}=\frac{AC}{AB}∵AB=4m,∴AC=0.75×4=3m由勾股定理知:面相邻两株数间的坡面距离BC=√{AB²+AC²}=√{4²+3²}=5m故选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, when planting trees on flat ground, the spacing (the horizontal distance between two adjacent trees) is required to be 4 m. If trees are planted on a slope with a gradient of 0.75, and the spacing is also required to be 4 m, then the distance along the slope between two adjacent trees is ()
answer_cot_en: tanα = 0.5 = vertical height / horizontal distance = AC / AB. Since AB = 4m, therefore AC = 0.75 × 4 = 3m. By the Pythagorean theorem, the slope distance BC between the two adjacent trees on the surface is √(AB² + AC²) = √(4² + 3²) = 5m. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,以线段AB为边分别作直角三角形ABC和等边三角形ABD,其中∠ACB=90°.连接CD,当CD的长度最大时,此时∠CAB的大小是()
answer_cot: 如图所示:∵AB长一定,∴只有C点距离AB距离最大,则CD的长度最大.∴只有C点在C′位置,即C′在半圆的中点时,此时当CD的长度最大故此时AC′=BC′,∴∠C′AB的大小是45°.故选B.
question_en: As shown in the figure, right-angled triangle ABC and equilateral triangle ABD are constructed with AB as the side, where ∠ACB = 90°. Connect CD, when the length of CD is at its maximum, the size of ∠CAB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Because the length of AB is fixed, therefore only when point C is at the maximum distance from AB, the length of CD is the maximum. Therefore, only when point C is at position C', that is, when C' is at the midpoint of the semicircle, at this time the length of CD is the maximum. Hence, at this time AC' = BC', therefore the size of ∠C'AB is 45°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,D是△ABC的角平分线BD和CD的交点,若∠A=50°,则∠D=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D is the intersection point of the angle bisectors BD and CD of △ABC. If ∠A = 50°, then ∠D = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A = 50°, therefore ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 180° - ∠A = 180° - 50° = 130°. Since D is the intersection of the angle bisectors BD and CD of △ABC, therefore ∠DBC + ∠DCB = 1/2(∠ABC + ∠ACB) = 1/2 × 130° = 65°. In △BCD, ∠D = 180° - (∠DBC + ∠DCB) = 180° - 65° = 115°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知OA=OB=OC且∠ACB=30°,则∠AOB的大小是()
answer_cot: ∵OA=OB=OC,∴A、B、C在以O为圆心OA为半径的圆上.作⊙O.∵∠ACB和∠AOB是同弧AB所对的圆周角和圆心角,且∠ACB=30°,∴根据同弧所对的圆周角是圆心角的一半的性质,得∠AOB=60°.故选C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that OA = OB = OC and ∠ACB = 30°, then the size of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OB = OC, therefore A, B, C are on the circle with O as the center and OA as the radius. Draw ⊙O. Because ∠ACB and ∠AOB are the inscribed angle and central angle corresponding to the same arc AB, and ∠ACB = 30°, therefore, according to the property that the inscribed angle corresponding to the same arc is half of the central angle, we get ∠AOB = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线a∥b,点B在直线b上,且AB⊥BC,∠2=65°,则∠1的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b, point B is on line b, and AB ⊥ BC, ∠2 = 65°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Since line a is parallel to b, it can be concluded that ∠3 = ∠2 = 65°. According to AB ⊥ BC, it can be concluded that ∠1 = 25°.

question: 圆I是三角形ABC的内切圆,D,E,F为3个切点,若∠DEF=52°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: Circle I is the incircle of triangle ABC, D, E, and F are the 3 tangent points, if ∠DEF = 52°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect DI, FI, because ∠DEF = 52°, therefore ∠DIF = 104°. Since ⊙I is the inscribed circle of △ABC, and D, E, F are the three tangent points, therefore ∠IDA = ∠IFA = 90°, thus ∠A = 360° - 90° - 90° - 104° = 76°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线AB∥CD,∠1=136°,∠E为直角,则∠C等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line AB ∥ CD, ∠1 = 136°, ∠E is a right angle, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 136°, therefore ∠BAE = 180° - ∠1 = 44°. Draw EF parallel to AB, therefore AB ∥ CD, therefore AB ∥ EF ∥ CD, therefore ∠BAE = ∠AEF, ∠CEF = ∠C. Since ∠BAE = 44° and ∠E is a right angle, therefore ∠AEF = 44°, therefore ∠C = ∠CEF = 90° - 44° = 46°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,直线AB、CD被直线EF所截,若AB∥CD,∠1=100°,则∠2的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines AB and CD are intersected by straight line EF. If AB ∥ CD, ∠1 = 100°, then the size of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, ∠3 = ∠1 = 100°, therefore ∠2 = 180° - ∠3 = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图:AB∥DE,∠B=30°,∠C=110°,∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ DE, ∠B = 30°, ∠C = 110°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw CF through point C parallel to AB, because AB is parallel to DE, therefore AB, DE, and CF are all parallel. Since ∠B = 30°, therefore ∠1 = 30°. Since ∠C = 110°, therefore ∠2 = 80°. Thus, ∠D = 180° - ∠2 = 180° - 80° = 100°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C在⊙O上,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点D,连接AC．若∠D=50°,则∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point C is on ⊙O, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn through point C and intersects the extension of AB at point D. Connect AC. If ∠D = 50°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD is tangent to ⊙O at C, therefore OC ⊥ CD, thus ∠OCD = 90°. Given that ∠D = 50°, therefore ∠COD = 180° - 90° - 50° = 40°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠OCA. Given that ∠A + ∠OCA = ∠COD = 40°, therefore ∠A = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,CP交AB于O,AO=PO,若∠C=50°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, CP intersects AB at O, AO = PO, if ∠C = 50°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, and CP intersects AB at O, therefore ∠POB = ∠C. Since ∠C = 50°, therefore ∠POB = 50°. Since AO = PO, therefore ∠A = ∠P, thus ∠A = 25°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,过点A作AD∥BC.若∠1=70°,则∠BAC的大小为()
answer_cot: 根据AD//BC可得出∠C=∠1=70°/再根据AB=AC即可得出∠B=∠C=70°,结合三角形的内角和为180°,即可算出C=180°-∠B-∠C=40°.故选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, through point A, AD ∥ BC. If ∠1 = 70°, then the size of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: According to AD parallel to BC, it can be concluded that ∠C = ∠1 = 70°. Further, based on AB = AC, it can be concluded that ∠B = ∠C = 70°. Combining the sum of the interior angles of a triangle equals 180°, we can calculate ∠A = 180° - ∠B - ∠C = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 将一张宽度相等的长方形纸条按如图所示的方式折叠一下,如果∠1=140°,那么∠2的度数是()
answer_cot: 根据平行线的性质可得∠3+∠4=∠1=140°,根据折叠图形的性质可得:∠3=∠4=70°,根据平行线的性质可得:∠2=180°-70°=110°.
question_en: Fold a rectangular strip of paper with equal width as shown in the figure, if ∠1 = 140°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the properties of parallel lines, ∠3 + ∠4 = ∠1 = 140°. According to the properties of folded figures, ∠3 = ∠4 = 70°. According to the properties of parallel lines, ∠2 = 180° - 70° = 110°.

question: 如图,已知直线a、b被直线c所截,a∥b,∠1=50°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that lines a and b are intersected by line c, a ∥ b, ∠1 = 50°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: Firstly, by using the properties of parallel lines, we can deduce that ∠3 = ∠1. Then, by the equality of vertical angles, we can infer that ∠2 = ∠3, hence the degree of ∠2 can be calculated. As shown in the figure, since a is parallel to b, and ∠1 = 50°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 50°. Since ∠2 = ∠3, therefore ∠2 = ∠1 = 50°.

question: 直线a、b、c、d的位置如图,如果∠1=100°,∠2=100°,∠3=125°,那么∠4等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the positions of lines a, b, c, and d are as shown. If ∠1 = 100°, ∠2 = 100°, ∠3 = 125°, then ∠4 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 100°, ∠2 = 100°, therefore ∠1 = ∠2, thus a is parallel to b, therefore ∠4 = ∠5. Since ∠3 + ∠5 = 180°, therefore ∠5 = 180° - ∠3 = 180° - 125° = 55°, thus ∠4 = 55°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图是小刘做的一个风筝支架示意图,已知BC∥PQ,AB:AP=2:5,AQ=20cm,则CQ的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, this is a schematic diagram of a kite frame made by Xiao Liu. It is known that BC ∥ PQ, AB:AP = 2:5, AQ = 20 cm, then the length of CQ is ()
answer_cot_en: [Analysis] Solution: Because BC is parallel to PQ, therefore △ABC is similar to △APQ, thus AB/AP = AC/AQ. Given that the ratio of AB to AP is 2:5, and AQ = 20cm, therefore AC/20 = 2/5. Solving this gives: AC = 8cm, thus CQ = AQ - AC = 20 - 8 = 12(cm). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ODC是由△OAB绕点O顺时针旋转30°后得到的图形,若点D恰好落在AB上,且∠AOC的度数为100°,则∠DOB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ODC is obtained by rotating △OAB 30° clockwise around point O. If point D falls exactly on AB, and the degree of ∠AOC is 100°, then the degree of ∠DOB is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠AOD = 30°, ∠BOC = 30°, and ∠AOC = 100°, therefore ∠DOB = 100° - 30° - 30° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,甲、乙两盏路灯相距30米,一天晚上,当小刚从路灯甲底部向路灯乙底部直行25米时,发现自己的身影顶部正好接触到路灯乙的底部,已知小刚的身高为1.5米,那么路灯甲的高为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, streetlights A and B are 30 meters apart. One night, when Xiao Gang walked straight from the base of streetlight A to the base of streetlight B for 25 meters, he found that the top of his shadow just touched the base of streetlight B. Knowing that Xiao Gang's height is 1.5 meters, then the height of streetlight A is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because AB ⊥ OB, CD ⊥ OB, therefore △ABO ~ △CDO. Therefore, CD/AB = DO/BO, 1.5/AB = (30-25)/30, solving this gives AB = 9. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,C是⊙O上一点,O是圆心,若∠C=35°,则∠AOB的度数为()
answer_cot: 同弧所对的圆心角的度数等于圆周角度数的两倍,则∠AOB=2∠C=70°.
question_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on ⊙O, O is the center of the circle, if ∠C = 35°, then the degree of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: The degree of the central angle corresponding to the same arc is twice the degree of the circumferential angle, thus ∠AOB = 2∠C = 70°.

question: 如图,若AB∥CD,∠A=70°,则∠1的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if AB ∥ CD, ∠A = 70°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: [Analysis] Solution: As shown in the figure, because AB is parallel to CD, and ∠A = 70°, therefore ∠2 = ∠A = 70°, thus ∠1 = 180° - ∠2 = 180° - 70° = 110°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线AB∥CD,∠C=44°,∠E为直角,则∠1等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line AB ∥ CD, ∠C = 44°, ∠E is a right angle, then ∠1 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Draw EF through E parallel to AB, since AB is parallel to CD, therefore AB, CD, and EF are all parallel. Hence, ∠C = ∠FEC, ∠BAE = ∠FEA. Given that ∠C = 44° and ∠AEC is a right angle, therefore ∠FEC = 44°, ∠BAE = ∠AEF = 90° - 44° = 46°. Thus, ∠1 = 180° - ∠BAE = 180° - 46° = 134°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,A、B、C为⊙O上的任意三点,若∠BOC=100°,则∠BAC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are any three points on ⊙O. If ∠BOC = 100°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Take a point D on ⊙O, connect BD, CD, because ∠BOC = 100°, and ∠D = 50°, therefore ∠BAC = 180° - 50° = 130°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O的内接五边形ABCDE中,∠CAD=35°,∠AED=115°,则∠B的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ACDE是圆内接四边形,∴∠AED+∠ACD=180^{°},∵∠AED=115°∴∠ACD=65°∵∠CAD=35°,∴∠ADC=80°,∵四边形ABCD是圆内接四边形,∴∠B+∠ADC=180°,∴∠B=100°,故选D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the inscribed pentagon ABCDE of ⊙O, ∠CAD = 35°, ∠AED = 115°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ACDE is a cyclic quadrilateral, therefore ∠AED + ∠ACD = 180°. Given that ∠AED = 115°, therefore ∠ACD = 65°. Since ∠CAD = 35°, therefore ∠ADC = 80°. Because quadrilateral ABCD is a cyclic quadrilateral, therefore ∠B + ∠ADC = 180°, thus ∠B = 100°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠C=90°,AD是∠BAC的平分线,DE⊥AB于E,若DE=8cm,DB=10cm则BC等于()
answer_cot: 已知△ABC中,∠C=90°,AD是∠BAC的平分线,DE⊥AB于E,根据角平分线的性质可得CD=DE=8cm,所以BC=CD+BD=18cm,故选C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC, DE ⊥ AB at E. If DE = 8 cm, DB = 10 cm, then BC equals ()
answer_cot_en: Given in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC, DE ⊥ AB at E, according to the property of the angle bisector, we can get CD = DE = 8cm, so BC = CD + BD = 18cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线AB,CD相交于点O,EO⊥AB,垂直为点O,∠BOD=50°,则∠COE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines AB and CD intersect at point O, EO ⊥ AB, perpendicular at point O, ∠BOD = 50°, then ∠COE = ()
answer_cot_en: Since EO ⊥ AB, therefore ∠AOE = 90°. Given that ∠AOC = ∠BOD = 50°, therefore ∠COE = ∠AOC + ∠AOE = 50° + 90° = 140°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点B,E,C,F在同一条直线上,△ABC≌△DEF,∠B=45°,∠F=65°,则∠COE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points B, E, C, and F are on the same straight line, △ABC is congruent to △DEF, ∠B = 45°, ∠F = 65°, then the degree of ∠COE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is congruent to △DEF, ∠B = 45° and ∠F = 65°, therefore ∠DEF = ∠B = 45°, ∠ACB = ∠F = 65°. In △OEC, ∠COE = 180° - ∠DEF - ∠ACB = 180° - 45° - 65° = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,把一块含有45°角的直角三角板的两个顶点放在直尺的对边上,如果∠1=27.5°,那么∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if a right-angled triangle board with a 45° angle is placed with its two vertices on the opposite sides of a ruler, and if ∠1 = 27.5°, then ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠1 = ∠AEC. Given that ∠1 = 27.5° and ∠FEC = 45°, therefore ∠2 = ∠FEC - ∠1 = 17.5°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线a∥b,点B在直线b上,且AB⊥BC,∠1=55°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b, point B is on line b, and AB ⊥ BC, ∠1 = 55°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a is parallel to b, therefore the acute angle between BC and b equals ∠1 = 55°. Since AB is perpendicular to BC, therefore ∠2 = 180° - 90° - 55° = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线a∥b,直线c与a,b相交,∠1=55°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b, line c intersects with a and b, ∠1 = 55°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, a is parallel to b, ∠1 = 55°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 55°. Since ∠2 and ∠3 are vertical angles, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 55°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 把一尺与三角板如图放置,∠1=40°则∠2的度数为()
question_en: Place a ruler and a set square as shown in the figure, if ∠1 = 40°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because ∠3 = ∠1 + 90°, and ∠1 = 40°, therefore ∠3 = 130°. Since a is parallel to b, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 130°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,直线AB,CD相交于点O,射线OM平分∠AOC,ON⊥OM．若∠AOC=70°,则∠CON的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines AB and CD intersect at point O, ray OM bisects ∠AOC, ON ⊥ OM. If ∠AOC = 70°, then the degree of ∠CON is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ON ⊥ OM, therefore ∠MON = 90°. OM bisects ∠AOC, and ∠AOC = 70°, therefore ∠MOC = 1/2 ∠AOC = 35°, thus ∠CON = 90° - 35° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O的直径CD过弦EF的中点G,∠DCF=20°,则∠EOD等于()
answer_cot: ∵⊙O的直径CD过弦EF的中点G,∠DCF=20°DF=DE,且弧的度数是40°.∴∠DOE=40°.故选C
question_en: As shown in the figure, CD is the diameter of ⊙O passing through the midpoint G of chord EF, ∠DCF = 20°, then ∠EOD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because the diameter CD of ⊙O passes through the midpoint G of chord EF, ∠DCF = 20°, DF = DE, and the degree of the arc is 40°. Therefore, ∠DOE = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB平行CD,如果∠B=20°,那么∠C为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is parallel to CD, if ∠B = 20°, then ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, and ∠B = 20°, therefore ∠C = ∠B = 20°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,∠CED=90°,∠AEC=35°,则∠D的大小()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ∠CED = 90°, ∠AEC = 35°, then the size of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠D = ∠BED. Since ∠CED = 90°, ∠AEC = 35°, therefore ∠BED = 180° - 90° - 35° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AD平分∠BAC,且∠C=80°,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AD bisects ∠BAC, and ∠C = 80°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠CAD. Since AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠BAD = ∠D. Thus ∠CAD = ∠D. In △ACD, ∠C + ∠D + ∠CAD = 180°, that is 80° + ∠D + ∠D = 180°, solving this gives ∠D = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,若∠2=135°,那么∠1的度数是()
answer_cot: 由AB1ICD,知∠1的对顶角与∠2互补,所以∠1=45°
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, if ∠2 = 135°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: From AB parallel to CD, we know that the vertical angle of ∠1 is supplementary to ∠2, so ∠1 = 45°.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,点E在BC上,且CD=CE,∠D=74°,则∠B的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, point E is on BC, and CD = CE, ∠D = 74°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD = CE, and ∠D = 74°, therefore ∠C = 32°. Since AB is parallel to CD, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,点E在CA的延长线上.若∠BAE=40°,则∠ACD的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, point E is on the extension line of CA. If ∠BAE = 40°, then the size of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, extend DC to F, then because AB is parallel to CD, ∠BAE = 40°, therefore ∠ECF = ∠BAE = 40°, thus ∠ACD = 180° - ∠ECF = 140°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,利用标杆BE测量树CD的高度,如果标杆BE长为2米,测得AB=3米,AC=9米,且点A、E、D在一条直线上,则树CD是()
answer_cot: 本题考查的三角形的相似.由题意得三角形ABE~三角形ACD所以有\frac{AB}{AC}=\frac{BE}{CD}即\frac{3}{9}=\frac{2}{CD}解得CD=6故A正确.
question_en: As shown in the figure, using the staff BE to measure the height of the tree CD, if the staff BE is 2 meters long, AB is measured to be 3 meters, AC is 9 meters, and points A, E, and D are on a straight line, then the height of the tree CD is ()
answer_cot_en: This question tests the similarity of triangles. According to the problem, triangle ABE is similar to triangle ACD, so we have AB/AC = BE/CD, which is 3/9 = 2/CD. Solving this gives CD = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 在直径为200cm的圆柱形油槽内装入一些油以后,截面如图．若油面的宽AB=160cm,则油的最大深度为()
answer_cot: 连接OA,过点O作OE⊥AB,交AB于点M,由垂径定理求出AM的长,再根据勾股定理求出OM的长,进而可得出ME的长.
question_en: After some oil is poured into a cylindrical oil tank with a diameter of 200 cm, the cross-section is as shown in the figure. If the width of the oil surface AB = 160 cm, then the maximum depth of the oil is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, draw OE ⊥ AB through point O, intersecting AB at point M. Use the perpendicular diameter theorem to find the length of AM, then use the Pythagorean theorem to find the length of OM, from which the length of ME can be obtained.

question: 如图,∠1=∠2,∠3=30°,则∠4等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠1 = ∠2, ∠3 = 30°, then ∠4 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = ∠2, therefore allb, therefore ∠5 = ∠3 = 30°, thus ∠4 = 180° - ∠5 = 150°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,∠B=20°,∠D=60°,则∠BED的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ∠B = 20°, ∠D = 60°, then the degree of ∠BED is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Draw EF through point E parallel to AB, then CD is parallel to EF. Therefore, ∠BEF = ∠B = 20°, ∠DEF = ∠D = 60°. Thus, ∠BED = ∠BEF + ∠DEF = 80°.

question: 如图,直线AB∥CD,AE平分∠CAB,∠ACD=40°,则∠AEC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line AB ∥ CD, AE bisects ∠CAB, ∠ACD = 40°, then the degree of ∠AEC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠ACD + ∠BAC = 180°. Since ∠ACD = 40°, therefore ∠BAC = 180° - 40° = 140°. Since AE bisects ∠CAB, therefore ∠BAE = 1/2 ∠BAC = 1/2 × 140° = 70°, thus ∠AEC = ∠BAE = 70°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 轩轩和凯凯在同一个数学学习小组,在一次数学活动课上,他们各自用一张边长为12cm的正方形纸片制作了一副七巧板,并合作设计了如图所示的作品请你帮他们计算图中圈出来的三块图形的面积之和为()
answer_cot: 根据七巧板的特点可知:圈出来的图形面积是正方形面积的四分之一,所以面积是12×12÷4=36故选:C
question_en: Xuanxuan and Kaikai are in the same math study group. During a math activity class, they each made a set of tangrams with a square piece of paper with a side length of 12 cm and cooperated to design the work shown in the figure. Please help them calculate the sum of the areas of the three marked shapes in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the characteristics of the Tangram, it is known that the area of the circled shape is one quarter of the square area, so the area is 12×12÷4=36. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线a∥b,∠2=35°,∠3=40°,则∠1的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b, ∠2 = 35°, ∠3 = 40°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a is parallel to b, therefore ∠1 = ∠4. Given that ∠2 = 35° and ∠3 = 40°, therefore ∠4 = 180° - 35° - 40° = 105°, thus ∠1 = 105°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,BD是△ABC的角平分线,AE⊥BD,垂足为F,若∠ABC=35°,∠C=50°,则∠CDE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD is the angle bisector of △ABC, AE ⊥ BD at foot F. If ∠ABC = 35°, ∠C = 50°, then the degree of ∠CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BD is the angle bisector of △ABC, and AE ⊥ BD, therefore ∠ABD = ∠EBD = 1/2 ∠ABC = 35°/2. ∠AFB = ∠EFB = 90°, thus ∠BAF = ∠BEF = 90° - 17.5°. Therefore AB = BE, thus AF = EF, therefore AD = ED, thus ∠DAF = ∠DEF. Because ∠BAC = 180° - ∠ABC - ∠C = 95°, therefore ∠BED = ∠BAD = 95°, thus ∠CDE = 95° - 50° = 45°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线AD∥BC,若∠1=42°,∠BAC=78°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line AD ∥ BC, if ∠1 = 42°, ∠BAC = 78°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 42°, ∠BAC = 78°, therefore ∠ABC = 180° - ∠1 - ∠BAC = 60°. Since AD is parallel to BC, therefore ∠2 = ∠ABC = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,□ABCD的周长为16cm,AC、BD相交于点O,OE⊥AC交AD于点E,则△DCE的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of □ABCD is 16 cm, AC and BD intersect at point O, OE ⊥ AC intersects AD at point E, then the perimeter of △DCE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because parallelogram ABCD, therefore AD = BC, AB = CD, OA = OC. Since EO ⊥ AC, therefore AE = BC. Given that AB + BC + CD + AD = 16cm, therefore AD + DC = 8cm. Hence, the perimeter of △DCE is: CD + DE + CE - AE + DE + CD = AD + CD = 8cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形.若∠ABC=70°,则∠AOC的度数等于()
answer_cot: 因为∠ABC和∠AOC是同一条弧AC所对的圆周角和圆心角,所以∠AOC=2∠ABC×70°=140°
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O. If ∠ABC = 70°, then the degree of ∠AOC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ABC and ∠AOC are angles subtended by the same arc AC, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠ABC = 2×70° = 140°.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,射线AE交CD于点F,若∠1=115°,则∠2的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ray AE intersects CD at point F, if ∠1 = 115°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠1 + ∠AFD = 180°. Given that ∠1 = 115°, therefore ∠AFD = 65°. Since ∠2 and ∠AFD are vertical angles, therefore ∠2 = ∠AFD = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,a//b,将一块三角板的直角顶点放在直线a上,∠1=42°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, placing the right-angle vertex of a triangular plate on the straight line a, ∠1 = 42°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 42°, therefore ∠3 = 90° - 42° = 48°. Since a is parallel to b, therefore ∠2 = ∠3, thus ∠2 = 48°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,a∥b,点B在直线b上,且AB⊥BC,∠1=36°,那么∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, point B is on line b, and AB ⊥ BC, ∠1 = 36°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem: As shown in the figure, since AB ⊥ BC, ∠1 = 36°, therefore ∠3 = 90° - ∠1 = 54°. Since a || b, therefore ∠3 = ∠2 = 54°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,如果∠1=∠3,∠2=60°,那么∠4的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if ∠1 = ∠3, ∠2 = 60°, then the degree of ∠4 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = ∠3, therefore a is parallel to b, thus ∠5 = ∠2 = 60°, therefore ∠4 = 180° - 60° = 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AE平分∠CAB交CD于点E,若∠C=70°,则∠AED度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AE bisects ∠CAB and intersects CD at point E, if ∠C = 70°, then the degree of ∠AED is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠BAC + ∠C = 180°. Since ∠C = 70°, therefore ∠CAB = 180° - 70° = 110°. Also, since AE bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠CAE = 55°. Thus, ∠AED = ∠C + ∠CAE = 125°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,▱ABCD的周长为32cm,AC,BD相交于点O,OE⊥AC交AD于点E,则△DCE的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 32 cm, AC and BD intersect at point O, OE ⊥ AC intersects AD at point E, then the perimeter of △DCE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because parallelogram ABCD, therefore AD = BC, AB = CD, OA = OC. Since EO ⊥ AC, therefore AE = EC. Given that AB + BC + CD + AD = 32cm, therefore AD + DC = 16cm. Hence, the perimeter of △DCE is: CD + DE + CE = AE + DE + CD = AD + CD = 16cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,一个底面圆周长为24m,高为5m的圆柱体,一只蚂蚁沿表面从点A到点B所经过的最短路线长为()
answer_cot: 将圆柱体的侧面展开,连接AB.如图所示:由于圆柱体的底面周长为24m,AD=24×\frac{1}{2}=12m.又因为AC=5m,所以AB=√{12²+5²}=13m.即蚂蚁沿表面从点A到点B所经过的最短路线长为13m.故选C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, for a cylindrical body with a base circumference of 24 m and a height of 5 m, the shortest path length that an ant travels along the surface from point A to point B is ()
answer_cot_en: Unfold the lateral surface of the cylinder and connect AB. As shown in the figure: Since the circumference of the base of the cylinder is 24m, AD = 24 × 1/2 = 12m. Also, since AC = 5m, AB = √{12² + 5²} = 13m. That is, the shortest route for the ant to travel from point A to point B along the surface is 13m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AD⊥BC于点D,AE平分∠DAC,∠B=50°,求∠DAE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, AD ⊥ BC at point D, AE bisects ∠DAC, ∠B = 50°, then the degree of ∠DAE is ()
answer_cot_en: In △ABC, because ∠BAC = 90°, ∠B = 50°, therefore ∠C = 90° - ∠B = 40°. Since AD ⊥ BC at point D, therefore ∠BAD = 90° - ∠B = 40°; In △ADC, because ∠ADC = 90° and ∠C = 40°, therefore ∠DAC = 90° - ∠C = 50°. Since AE bisects ∠DAC, therefore ∠DAE = 1/2 ∠DAC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线l∥m∥n,三角形ABC的顶点B,C分别在直线n和m上,边BC与直线n所夹的角为25°,且∠ACB=60°,则∠a的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l ∥ m ∥ n, the vertices B and C of triangle ABC are respectively on lines n and m, the angle between side BC and line n is 25°, and ∠ACB = 60°, then the degree of ∠a is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because I is parallel to m and n, therefore ∠a = ∠1, and ∠2 = 25°. Since ∠ACB = ∠a + ∠2 = 60°, therefore ∠a = 60° - 25° = 35°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知⊙O中,圆心角∠AOB=100°,则圆周角∠ACB等于().
answer_cot: 如图:设点E是优弧AB上的一-点,连接EA,EB∵∠AOB=100^{°}∴∠E=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=50^{°}∴∠ACB=180^{°}-∠E=130^{°}
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, the central angle ∠AOB = 100°, then the inscribed angle ∠ACB is equal to ().
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Assume point E is a point on the major arc AB, connect EA, EB. Because ∠AOB = 100°, therefore ∠E = 1/2 ∠AOB = 50°, thus ∠ACB = 180° - ∠E = 130°.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于半径为1的⊙O中,若∠BAC=60°,则BC的长度为()
answer_cot:
作直径BD,连接CD,
则∠BCD=90°,
由圆周角定理得,∠D=∠BAC=60°,∴BC=BD×sin∠D=√{3},
故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O with a radius of 1. If ∠BAC = 60°, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw diameter BD, connect CD, then ∠BCD = 90°. According to the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠D = ∠BAC = 60°, therefore BC = BD × sin∠D = √3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,圆O是△ABC的外接圆,∠BAC与∠ABC的平分线相交于点I,延长AI交圆O于点D,连结BD、DC．若圆O的半径为8,∠BAC=120°,则DI的长度为()
answer_cot:
∵AI平分∠BAC,∴∠BAD=∠DAC,∴⁀{BD}=⁀{CD},∴BD=DC．∵BI平分∠ABC,∴∠ABI=∠CBI．∵∠BAD=∠DAC,∠DBC=∠DAC,∴∠BAD=∠DBC．
又∵∠DBI=∠DBC+∠CBI,∠DIB=∠ABI+∠BAD,∴∠DBI=∠DIB,∴△BDI为等腰三角形,∴BD=ID,∴BD=DC=DI．∵∠BAC=120°,△ABC为钝角三角形,∴圆心O在△ABC外．
连接OB、OD、OC．∵BD=CD,∴⁀{BD}=⁀{CD},∴∠DOC=∠BOD=2∠BAD=120°,∴∠DBC=∠DCB=60°,∴△BDC为正三角形．
延长CO交BD于点E,则OE⊥BD,∴BE=\frac{1}{2}BD,
又∵OB=18,∴BD=2OB\cos30°=2×8×\frac{√{3}}{2}=√{3}8,∴DI=BD=8√{3},
故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, circle O is the circumcircle of △ABC, the bisectors of ∠BAC and ∠ABC intersect at point I, extend AI to intersect circle O at point D, connect BD and DC. If the radius of circle O is 8, ∠BAC = 120°, then the length of DI is ()
answer_cot_en:
Because AI bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠DAC, thus ⁀BD = ⁀CD, thus BD = DC. Because BI bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABI = ∠CBI. Since ∠BAD = ∠DAC and ∠DBC = ∠DAC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠DBC. 
Also, since ∠DBI = ∠DBC + ∠CBI and ∠DIB = ∠ABI + ∠BAD, therefore ∠DBI = ∠DIB, thus △BDI is an isosceles triangle, therefore BD = ID, thus BD = DC = DI. Because ∠BAC = 120°, △ABC is an obtuse triangle, therefore the center O is outside △ABC. 
Connect OB, OD, OC. Because BD = CD, therefore ⁀BD = ⁀CD, therefore ∠DOC = ∠BOD = 2∠BAD = 120°, thus ∠DBC = ∠DCB = 60°, therefore △BDC is an equilateral triangle. 
Extend CO to intersect BD at point E, then OE ⊥ BD, therefore BE = 1/2 BD, 
Also, since OB = 18, therefore BD = 2OB cos30° = 2×8×√3/2 = 8√3, therefore DI = BD = 8√3, 
Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,连接OB、OC,若⊙O的半径为2,∠BAC=60°,则BC的长为()
answer_cot:
:延长BO交圆于D,连接CD．则∠BCD=90°,∠BDC=∠BAC=60°,∵⊙O的半径为2,∴BD=4,∴BC=2√{3},
故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, connect OB and OC. If the radius of ⊙O is 2, ∠BAC = 60°, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend BO to intersect the circle at D, and connect CD. Then ∠BCD = 90°, ∠BDC = ∠BAC = 60°. Since the radius of ⊙O is 2, therefore BD = 4, thus BC = 2√3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB和CD是⊙O的两条直径,弦DE∥AB,弧DE为50°的弧,那么∠BOC为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and CD are two diameters of ⊙O, chord DE ∥ AB, the arc DE is an arc of 50°, then ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OE, because arc DE is 50°, therefore ∠EOD = 50°, thus ∠OED + ∠ODE = 130°. Since OE = OD, therefore ∠OED = ∠ODE = 65°. Since DE ∥ AB, therefore ∠AOE = ∠OED = 65°, thus ∠AOD = ∠AOE + ∠EOD = 65° + 50° = 115°, therefore ∠BOC = ∠AOD = 115°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,∠ABO=22°,∠ACO=42°,则∠BOC等于()
answer_cot: 过A作⊙O的直径,交⊙O于D；在△OAB中,OA=OB,则∠BOD=∠ABO+∠OAB=2×22°=44°,同理可得:∠COD=∠ACO+∠OAC=2×42°=84°,故∠BOC=∠BOD+∠COD=128°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠ABO = 22°, ∠ACO = 42°, then ∠BOC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Draw a diameter of ⊙O through A, intersecting ⊙O at D; in △OAB, OA = OB, then ∠BOD = ∠ABO + ∠OAB = 2×22° = 44°, similarly, ∠COD = ∠ACO + ∠OAC = 2×42° = 84°, therefore ∠BOC = ∠BOD + ∠COD = 128°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上三点,∠ACB=25°,则∠BAO的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, ∠ACB = 25°, then the degree of ∠BAO is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, because ∠ACB = 25°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠ACB = 50°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠OAB = ∠OBA = (180° - ∠AOB) / 2 = 65°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知⊙O中,∠AOB=50°,则圆周角∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, ∠AOB = 50°, then the degree of the inscribed angle ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB = 50°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C、D是⊙O上的两点,∠BAC=30°,⁀{AD}=⁀{CD}．则∠DAC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O, ∠BAC = 30°, arc AD = arc CD. Then ∠DAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°, thus ∠B = 90° - ∠BAC = 90° - 30° = 60°, therefore ∠D = 180° - ∠B = 120°. Since ⁀{AD} = ⁀{CD}, therefore AD = CD, thus ∠DAC = ∠DCA = 1/2(180° - 120°) = 30°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、D为圆上两点,∠D=34°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on the circle, ∠D = 34°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, because ∠D = 34°, therefore by the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠B = ∠D = 34°. Since OC = OB, therefore ∠OCB = ∠B = 34°, thus ∠BOC = 180° - ∠B - ∠OCB = 112°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A,B,C均在⊙O上,当∠OBC=40°时,∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are all on ⊙O. When ∠OBC = 40°, the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OB = OC, therefore ∠OCB = ∠OBC = 40°, thus ∠BOC = 180° - 40° - 40° = 100°, therefore ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O的直径AB垂直于弦CD,垂足是点E,∠CAO=22.5°,OC=6,则CD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O and is perpendicular to chord CD at point E, ∠CAO = 22.5°, OC = 6, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD ⊥ AB, therefore CE = DE. Since ∠BOC = 2∠A = 2×22.5° = 45°, therefore △OCE is an isosceles right triangle, thus CE = √2/2 OC = √2/2 × 6 = 3√2, therefore CD = 2CE = 6√2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O中,弦BC与半径OA相交于点D,连接AB,OC．若∠A=60°,∠ADC=90°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, chord BC intersects radius OA at point D. Connect AB and OC. If ∠A = 60°, ∠ADC = 90°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ADC = ∠A + ∠B, ∠A = 60°, ∠ADC = 90°, therefore ∠B = 30°, thus ∠AOC = 2∠B = 60°. Since ∠ADC = ∠AOC + ∠C, therefore ∠C = 90° - 60° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点A,B,P是⊙O上的三点,若∠AOB=40°,则∠APB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and P are three points on ⊙O. If ∠AOB = 40°, then the degree of ∠APB is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠APB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 40° = 20°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB,交⊙O于点C,连接OA,OB,BC,若∠ABC=25°,则∠AOB的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB, intersecting ⊙O at point C. Connect OA, OB, and BC. If ∠ABC = 25°, then the size of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OC ⊥ AB, therefore AC = BC, thus ∠AOC = ∠BOC. Since ∠AOC = 2∠ABC = 2×25° = 50°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠AOC = 100°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知圆周角∠A=50°,则∠OBC的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the inscribed angle ∠A = 50°, then the size of ∠OBC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A = 50°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠A = 100°. In △BOC, OB = OC, and ∠BOC = 100°, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = 1/2(180° - ∠BOC) = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的弦,∠ADC=26°,则∠CAB的度数为()
answer_cot: 由圆周角定理得,∠ABC=∠ADC=26°,∵AB为⊙O的直径,∴∠ACB=90°,∴∠CAB=90°-∠ABC=64°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord of ⊙O, ∠ADC = 26°, then the degree of ∠CAB is ()
answer_cot_en: From the theorem of the angle at the circumference, ∠ABC = ∠ADC = 26°. Since AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°, thus ∠CAB = 90° - ∠ABC = 64°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AB是直径,CD是弦,AB⊥CD,垂足为点E,连接CO,AD,若∠BOC=30°,则∠BAD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, CD is a chord, AB ⊥ CD at point E, connect CO and AD, if ∠BOC = 30°, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ⊥ CD, therefore BC = BD, and CE = DE, therefore ∠BAD = 1/2 ∠BOC = 15°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D是圆上两点,且∠AOC=126°,则∠CDB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are two points on the circle, and ∠AOC = 126°, then ∠CDB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOC = 126°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - ∠AOC = 54°. Since ∠CDB = 1/2 ∠BOC = 27°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D在⊙O上,且点C是弧BD的中点,过点C作AD的垂线EF交直线AD于点E,若⊙O的半径为2.5,AC长为4,则CE的长度为()
answer_cot: 连接BC,∵点C是弧BD的中点,∴∠EAC=∠CAB,又∵AB为直径,AE⊥EF,∴∠AEC=∠ACB=90°,∴△EAC∽△CAB,∴\frac{AC}{AB}=\frac{EC}{BC},∴EC=\frac{AC\cdotBC}{AB}=\frac{4×√{5^{2}-4^{2}}}{5}=\frac{12}{5}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O, and point C is the midpoint of arc BD. A perpendicular line EF from point C intersects line AD at point E. If the radius of ⊙O is 2.5 and the length of AC is 4, then the length of CE is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, because point C is the midpoint of arc BD, therefore ∠EAC = ∠CAB. Also, since AB is the diameter and AE ⊥ EF, therefore ∠AEC = ∠ACB = 90°. Therefore, △EAC is similar to △CAB, therefore AC/AB = EC/BC. Therefore, EC = (AC * BC) / AB = (4 * √(5² - 4²)) / 5 = 12/5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点A,B,C在⊙O上,已知∠ABC=130°,则∠AOC=()
answer_cot: 在优弧AC上取点D,连接AD,CD,∵四边形ABCD是圆内接四边形,∠ABC=130°,∴∠D=180°-10°=50°．∵∠D与∠AOC是同弧所对的圆周角与圆心角,∴∠AOC=2∠D=100°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O. It is known that ∠ABC = 130°, then ∠AOC = ()
answer_cot_en: Take point D on the major arc AC, connect AD, CD. Because quadrilateral ABCD is a cyclic quadrilateral, ∠ABC = 130°, therefore ∠D = 180° - 130° = 50°. Since ∠D and ∠AOC are angles on the same arc of the circle and central angle, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠D = 100°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知⊙O的半径为5,弦AB、CD所对的圆心角分别是∠AOB,∠COD,且∠AOB与∠COD互补,弦CD=8,则弦AB的长为()
answer_cot: 解:如图,延长AO交⊙O于点E,连接BE,则∠AOB+∠BOE=180°,又∵∠AOB+∠COD=180°,∴∠BOE=∠COD,∴BE=CD,∵AE为⊙O的直径,∴∠ABE=90°,∴AB=√{AE^{2}-BE^{2}}=√{10^{2}-8^{2}}=6,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5, the central angles corresponding to chords AB and CD are ∠AOB and ∠COD respectively, and ∠AOB and ∠COD are complementary, chord CD = 8, then the length of chord AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Solution: As shown in the figure, extend AO to intersect ⊙O at point E, connect BE, then ∠AOB + ∠BOE = 180°. Also, because ∠AOB + ∠COD = 180°, therefore ∠BOE = ∠COD, therefore BE = CD. Since AE is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ABE = 90°, thus AB = √{AE² - BE²} = √{10² - 8²} = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是圆O的直径,CD是圆O的弦,AB、CD的延长线交于点E,已知AB=2DE,∠E=16°,则∠ABC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of circle O, CD is a chord of circle O, the extended lines of AB and CD intersect at point E, it is known that AB = 2DE, ∠E = 16°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD, because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore AB = 2OD. Since AB = 2DE, therefore OD = DE, thus ∠EOD = ∠E = 16°. Therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠BOD = 8°, thus ∠ABC = ∠C + ∠E = 8° + 16° = 24°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question:
本题考查了圆周角定理,关键是根据同弦所对圆心角与圆周角的关系解答．
4．如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C是⊙O上一点(A、B除外),∠AOD=136°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en:
This question examines the Inscribed Angle Theorem, which is key to solving based on the relationship between the central angle and the inscribed angle subtended by the same arc.
4. As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O (excluding A and B), ∠AOD = 136°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Solution, because ∠AOD = 136°, therefore ∠BOD = 44°, thus ∠C = 22°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D在⊙O上．若∠BOD=130°,则∠ACD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O. If ∠BOD = 130°, then the degree of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BOD = 130°, therefore ∠AOD = 50°, thus ∠ACD = 1/2 ∠AOD = 25°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 绍兴是著名的桥乡．如图,圆拱桥的桥顶到水面的距离CD为8m,桥拱半径OC为5m,则水面宽AB为()
question_en: Shaoxing is known for its bridges. As shown in the figure, the distance CD from the top of the arch bridge to the water surface is 8 m, the radius OC of the bridge arch is 5 m, then the width AB of the water surface is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, as shown in the figure. Because CD ⊥ AB, therefore AD = BD = 1/2 AB. In right triangle ADO, OA = OC = 5m, OD = CD - OC = 3m, ∠ADO = 90°, therefore AD = √(OA² - OD²) = 4m, thus AB = 2AD = 8m. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知∠α=130°,则∠β=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠α = 130°, then ∠β = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠α = 130°, therefore ∠1 = 130° - 90° = 40°, thus ∠β = ∠1 = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,当圆形桥孔中的水面宽度AB为8米时,弧ACB恰为半圆．当水面上涨1米时,桥孔中的水面宽度A′B′为()
answer_cot: 设圆的圆心是O,作弦A′B′的弦心距OE,连接OA′．根据题意,得在直角三角形OA′E中,OA′=4,OE=1．根据勾股定理得A′E=√{15}m．再根据垂径定理得A′B′=2A′E=2√{15}m．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, when the width of the water surface AB in the circular bridge hole is 8 m, the arc ACB is exactly a semicircle. When the water surface rises 1 m, the water surface width A′B′ in the bridge hole is ()
answer_cot_en: Assume the center of the circle is O, draw the chord distance OE of chord A'B', and connect OA'. According to the problem, in right triangle OA'E, OA' = 4, OE = 1. According to the Pythagorean theorem, A'E = √15m. Then, according to the perpendicular diameter theorem, A'B' = 2A'E = 2√15m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 在直角三角形ABC中,∠CAB=90°,∠ABC=72°,AD是∠CAB的角平分线,交边BC于点D,过点C作△ACD中AD边上的高线CE,则∠ECD的度数为()
question_en: In right-angled triangle ABC, ∠CAB = 90°, ∠ABC = 72°, AD is the angle bisector of ∠CAB, intersecting side BC at point D. A perpendicular CE is drawn from point C to side AD in △ACD, then the degree of ∠ECD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠CAB = 90°, and AD is the angle bisector of ∠CAB, therefore ∠CAD = 1/2 × 90° = 45°. Since CE ⊥ AD, therefore ∠ACE = 90° - 45° = 45°. Also, because ∠CAB = 90°, and ∠ABC = 72°, therefore ∠ACB = 90° - 72° = 18°. Thus, ∠ECD = ∠ACE - ∠ACB = 45° - 18° = 27°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AO是圆锥的高,圆锥的底面半径OB=0.7,AB的长为2.5,则AO的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AO is the height of the cone, the radius of the base of the cone OB = 0.7, the length of AB is 2.5, then the length of AO is ()
answer_cot_en: By the Pythagorean theorem, AO = √{AB² - OB²} = 2.4. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,弦AC和BD相交于点E,⁀{AB}=⁀{BC}=⁀{CD},若∠BEC=110°,则∠BDC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, within ⊙O, chords AC and BD intersect at point E, arc AB = arc BC = arc CD, if ∠BEC = 110°, then ∠BDC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ⁀{AB} = ⁀{BC} = ⁀{CD}, therefore ∠BDC = ∠ACB = ∠DBC. Since ∠BEC = 110°, therefore ∠ACB = ∠DBC = 35°. Thus ∠BDC = 35°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,半径为1cm,圆心角为90°的扇形OAB中,分别以OA,OB为直径作半圆,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 过点C作CD⊥OB,CE⊥OA,∵OB=OA,∠AOB=90°,∴△AOB是等腰直角三角形,∵OA是直径,∴∠ACO=90°,∴△AOC是等腰直角三角形,∵CE⊥OA,∴OE=AE,OC=AC,在Rt△OCE与Rt△ACE中,∵≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{OC=AC}\\{OE=AE}\end{array}\right.,∴Rt△OCE≌Rt△ACE,∵S扇形OEC=S扇形AEC,∴➝{0C}与弦OC围成的弓形的面积等于⌒{AC}与弦AC所围成的弓形面积,同理可得,➝{0C}与弦OC围成的弓形的面积等于⌒{BC}与弦BC所围成的弓形面积,∴S阴影=S△AOB=\frac{1}{2}×1×1=\frac{1}{2}cm²．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the sector OAB with a radius of 1 cm and a central angle of 90°, semicircles are made with OA and OB as diameters, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw CD ⊥ OB and CE ⊥ OA through point C. Because OB = OA and ∠AOB = 90°, therefore △AOB is an isosceles right triangle. Since OA is the diameter, ∠ACO = 90°, therefore △AOC is an isosceles right triangle. Since CE ⊥ OA, OE = AE, OC = AC, in Rt△OCE and Rt△ACE, because {OC = AC, OE = AE}, therefore Rt△OCE ≌ Rt△ACE. Since the area of sector OEC equals the area of sector AEC, the area of the bow formed by ➝OC and chord OC equals the area of the bow formed by ⌒AC and chord AC. Similarly, the area of the bow formed by ➝OC and chord OC equals the area of the bow formed by ⌒BC and chord BC. Therefore, the area of the shaded region equals the area of △AOB = 1/2 × 1 × 1 = 1/2 cm². Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 用圆心角为120°,半径为6cm的扇形纸片卷成一个圆锥形无底纸帽(如图所示),则这个纸帽的底面周长是()
question_en: Using a sector with a central angle of 120° and a radius of 6 cm to roll into a cone-shaped paper hat without a bottom (as shown in the figure), then the circumference of the base of this paper hat is ()
answer_cot_en: The circumference of the base of this paper hat = (120 * π * 6) / 180 = 4π (cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图是一顶圆锥形烟囱小纸帽,它的母线长l是13cm,高h为12cm,则制作这顶纸帽所需纸张的面积是(接缝忽略不计)()
answer_cot: ∵圆锥的母线长l是13cm,高h为12cm,∴圆锥的底面半径为r=√{13^{2}-12^{2}}=5cm,∴这张扇形纸板的面积=\frac{1}{2}×2π×5×13=65π(cm^{2})．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, this is a conical chimney paper hat, its slant height l is 13 cm, and the height h is 12 cm, then the area of the paper required to make this paper hat is (ignoring the seam) ()
answer_cot_en: Because the slant height l of the cone is 13cm, and the height h is 12cm, therefore the radius r of the base of the cone is √{13² - 12²} = 5cm, thus the area of this sector-shaped cardboard is 1/2 × 2π × 5 × 13 = 65π (cm²). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 用圆心角为120°,半径为3cm的扇形纸片卷成一个圆锥形无底纸冒(如图所示),则这个纸冒的高是()
answer_cot: 设圆锥的底面半径长为xcm,根据题意得2πx=\frac{120\cdotπ\cdot3}{180}解得x=1,所以这个纸冒的高=√{3^{2}-1^{2}}=2√{2}(cm)．故选:B．
question_en: Using a sector paper with a central angle of 120° and a radius of 3 cm to roll into a cone-shaped paper hat without a bottom (as shown in the figure), then the height of this paper hat is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the radius of the cone's base be x cm. According to the problem, 2πx = (120π3) / 180. Solving this gives x = 1. Therefore, the height of this paper cone = √{3² - 1²} = 2√2 (cm). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,一个圆锥的侧面展开图是半径为10的半圆,则它的底面半径是()
answer_cot: 设圆锥的底面半径为r,根据题意得\frac{1}{2}•2π•r•10=\frac{180\cdotπ\cdot10^{2}}{360},解得r=5,即圆锥的底面半径为5．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the lateral surface development of a cone is a semicircle with a radius of 10, then the radius of its base is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the radius of the cone's base be r. According to the problem, 1/2 * 2π * r * 10 = 180 * π * 10² / 360, solving this gives r = 5, that is, the radius of the cone's base is 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,用一张半径为24cm的扇形纸板制作一顶圆锥形帽子(接缝忽略不计),如果圆锥形帽子的底面半径为10cm,那么这张扇形纸板的面积是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, using a sector cardboard with a radius of 24 cm to make a conical hat (ignoring the seam), if the base radius of the conical hat is 10 cm, then the area of the sector cardboard is ()
answer_cot_en: The area of this sector-shaped cardboard = 1/2 × 2π × 10 × 24 = 240π (cm²). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,圆锥的母线长为5cm,高线长为4cm,则圆锥的底面积是()
answer_cot: 圆锥的底面圆的半径=√{5^{2}-4^{2}}=3,所以圆锥的底面积=π•3^{2}=9π(cm^{2})．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the slant height of the cone is 5 cm, and the height is 4 cm, then the base area of the cone is ()
answer_cot_en: The radius of the base circle of the cone = √{5² - 4²} = 3, so the area of the base of the cone = π•3² = 9π (cm²). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 我国纸伞的制作工艺十分巧妙．如图,伞不管是张开还是收拢,伞柄AP始终平分同一平面内两条伞骨所成的角∠BAC,且AE=AF,DE=DF,从而保证伞圈能沿着伞柄滑动．有一种玩具伞张开时,BDC在同一直线上,若AB=50cm,AD=14cm,则制作一把这样的纸伞需要油纸的面积是(不记接缝)()
question_en: The craftsmanship of Chinese paper umbrellas is very ingenious. As shown in the figure, whether the umbrella is open or closed, the umbrella handle AP always bisects the angle ∠BAC formed by two umbrella ribs in the same plane, and AE = AF, DE = DF, thereby ensuring that the umbrella ring can slide along the umbrella handle. There is a type of toy umbrella that when opened, BDC are on the same straight line. If AB = 50 cm, AD = 14 cm, then the area of oil paper needed to make such a paper umbrella is (seams not included) ().
answer_cot_en: Because AB = 50cm, AD = 14cm, therefore BD = √(AB² - AD²) = √(50² - 14²) = 48cm, the lateral area S = 1/2 lR = 1/2 • 48π × 2 × 50 = 2400π. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图用圆心角为120°,半径为6的扇形围成一个圆锥的侧面(接缝忽略不计),则这个圆锥的高是()
answer_cot: 设圆锥的底面圆的半径为r,根据题意得2πr=\frac{120\cdotπ\cdot6}{180},解得r=2,所以圆锥的高=√{6^{2}-2^{2}}=4√{2}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, using a sector with a central angle of 120° and a radius of 6 to form the lateral surface of a cone (ignoring the seam), then the height of the cone is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the radius of the base circle of the cone be r. According to the problem, 2πr = (120π6) / 180, solving this gives r = 2. Therefore, the height of the cone = √(6² - 2²) = 4√2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=4,BC=3,将△ABC绕AC所在的直线旋转一周得到一个旋转体,则该旋转体的侧面积为()
answer_cot: 由勾股定理得AB=5,BC=3,则圆锥的底面周长=6π,旋转体的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×6π×5=15π,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = 4, BC = 3, rotating △ABC around the straight line where AC is located for one full turn results in a solid of revolution, then the lateral surface area of the solid of revolution is ()
answer_cot_en: By the Pythagorean theorem, AB = 5, BC = 3, so the circumference of the base of the cone is 6π, and the lateral area of the solid of revolution is 1/2 × 6π × 5 = 15π. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在纸上剪下一个圆形和一个扇形的纸片,使之恰好能围成一个圆锥模型．若圆的半径为1,扇形的圆心角等于90°,则扇形的半径是()
answer_cot: 扇形的弧长等于底面圆的周长得出2π．设扇形的半径是r,则\frac{90πr}{180}=2π,解得:r=4．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, cut out a circular piece of paper and a sector piece of paper from the paper, so that they can just form a cone model. If the radius of the circle is 1, and the central angle of the sector is 90°, then the radius of the sector is ()
answer_cot_en: The arc length of the sector is equal to the circumference of the base circle, which is 2π. Let the radius of the sector be r, then (90πr / 180) = 2π, solving this gives: r = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图一个扇形铁皮OAB,已知OA=30cm,∠AOB=120°,工人师傅将OA、OB合拢制成了一个圆锥形的烟囱帽(接缝忽略不计),则烟囱帽的底面圆的半径为()
answer_cot: 扇形的弧长是:\frac{120π×30}{180}=20πcm,设底面半径是r,则2πr=20π,解得:r=10．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a sector iron sheet OAB, it is known that OA = 30 cm, ∠AOB = 120°, the worker master folded OA and OB together to make a conical chimney cap (ignoring the seam), then the radius of the bottom circle of the chimney cap is ()
answer_cot_en: The arc length of the sector is: (120π × 30) / 180 = 20π cm. Let the radius of the base be r, then 2πr = 20π, solving this gives: r = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知圆锥的底面半径为6,母线长为10,则此圆锥的侧面积为()
answer_cot: 底面周长是:2×6π=12π,则圆锥的侧面积是:\frac{1}{2}×12π×10=60π．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the base radius of the cone is 6, and the slant height is 10, then the lateral surface area of the cone is ()
answer_cot_en: The base circumference is: 2×6π = 12π, therefore the lateral area of the cone is: 1/2 × 12π × 10 = 60π. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 露露从纸上剪下一个圆形和一个扇形的纸片(如图),用它们恰好能围成一个圆锥模型,若圆的半径为1．扇形的圆心角等于120°,则此扇形的半径为()
answer_cot: 扇形的弧长是2π．设扇形的半径是r,则\frac{120πr}{180}=2π,解得:r=3．故选:C．
question_en: Lulu cut out a circular piece of paper and a sector piece of paper from a sheet (as shown in the figure), which can just form a cone model. If the radius of the circle is 1, the central angle of the sector is 120°, then the radius of this sector is ()
answer_cot_en: The arc length of the sector is 2π. Suppose the radius of the sector is r, then 120πr/180 = 2π, solving this gives r = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,有一圆心角为120°、半径长为6cm的扇形,若将OA、OB重合后围成一圆锥侧面,那么圆锥底面的直径是()
answer_cot: 扇形的弧长是:\frac{120π×6}{180}=4π,即底面周长是4π．设底面半径是r,则2πr=4π,解得:2r=4cm．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, there is a sector with a central angle of 120° and a radius of 6 cm. If OA and OB are overlapped to form the lateral surface of a cone, then the diameter of the base of the cone is ()
answer_cot_en: The arc length of the sector is: (120π × 6) / 180 = 4π, which means the circumference of the base is 4π. Suppose the radius of the base is r, then 2πr = 4π, solving this gives: 2r = 4cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,圆锥形帐篷顶的母线长AB=10cm,底面半径长BO=5m,这个圆锥形帐篷顶的侧面积(不计接缝)是()
answer_cot: 由题意得,l=10cm,故可得S圆锥形帐篷顶的侧面积=πrl=50πcm^{2}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the slant height AB of the conical tent top is 10 cm, the base radius BO is 5 m, the lateral surface area of this conical tent top (excluding seams) is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, l = 10cm, hence the lateral surface area of the conical tent top can be calculated as S = πrl = 50πcm². Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,弦AB的长为10,圆周角∠ACB=45°,则这个圆的直径AD为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, the length of chord AB is 10, the circumferential angle ∠ACB = 45°, then the diameter AD of this circle is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD, because ∠ACB = 45°, therefore ∠ADB = 45°. Since AD is the diameter, therefore ∠ABD = 90°. Given that AB = 10, therefore AD = 10√2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中．∠C=90°,点D是边BC上一个动点(点D不与点C重合)．以CD为直径的圆交AD于点P．若AC=6．线段BP长度的最小值是2．则AB的长为()
answer_cot: ∵CD为直径,∴∠CPD=90°,∵∠APC=90°,∴点P在以AC为直径的⊙O上,如图,连接OB交⊙O于P′,∵线段BP长度的最小值是2,∴BP′=2,∴OB=2+3=5,在Rt△OBC中,BC=√{5^{2}-3^{2}}=4,在Rt△ABC中,AB=√{4^{2}+6^{2}}=2√{13}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, point D is a moving point on side BC (point D does not coincide with point C). A circle with CD as the diameter intersects AD at point P. If AC = 6, the minimum length of line segment BP is 2, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD is the diameter, therefore ∠CPD = 90°. Since ∠APC = 90°, therefore point P is on circle O with AC as the diameter. As shown in the figure, connect OB to intersect circle O at P′. Since the minimum length of segment BP is 2, therefore BP′ = 2, thus OB = 2 + 3 = 5. In right triangle OBC, BC = √{5² - 3²} = 4. In right triangle ABC, AB = √{4² + 6²} = 2√{13}. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,小明为了测量一凉亭的高度AB(顶端A到水平地面BD的距离),在凉亭的旁边放置一个与凉亭台阶BC等高的台阶DE(DE=BC=0.6米,求A、B、C三点共线),把一面镜子水平放置在平台上的点G处,测得CG=12米,然后沿直线CG后退到点E处,这时恰好在镜子里看到凉亭的顶端A,测得GE=2米,小明身高EF=1.6米,则凉亭的高度AB约为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, to measure the height AB of a pavilion (the distance from the top A to the horizontal ground BD), Xiaoming placed a step DE next to the pavilion that is equal in height to the pavilion's step BC (DE = BC = 0.6 meters, ensuring points A, B, and C are collinear). He placed a mirror horizontally at point G on the platform, measured CG = 12 meters, then retreated along the straight line CG to point E, where he could just see the top of the pavilion A in the mirror, and measured GE = 2 meters. Xiaoming's height EF = 1.6 meters, then the approximate height of the pavilion AB is ().
answer_cot_en: From the problem, ∠AGC = ∠FGE, and since ∠ACG = ∠FEG = 90°, therefore △ACG is similar to △FEG, therefore AC:EF = CG:GE, thus AC/1.6 = 12/2, therefore AC = 9.6 meters, therefore AB = AC + BC = 9.6 + 0.6 = 10.2 meters. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,为了估计荆河的宽度,在荆河的对岸选定一个目标点P,在近岸取点Q和S,使点P、Q、S在一条直线上,且直线PS与河垂直,在过点S且与PS垂直的直线a上选择适当的点T,PT与过点Q且与PS垂直的直线b的交点为R,如果QS=60m,ST=120m,QR=80m,则荆河的宽度PQ为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in order to estimate the width of the Jing River, a target point P is selected on the opposite bank of the Jing River. Points Q and S are taken on the near bank so that points P, Q, and S are on a straight line, and the line PS is perpendicular to the river. On the line a, which is perpendicular to PS and passes through point S, an appropriate point T is chosen. The intersection of PT and the line b, which is perpendicular to PS and passes through point Q, is point R. If QS = 60 m, ST = 120 m, QR = 80 m, then the width of the Jing River PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, we know that QR ∥ ST, therefore △PQR is similar to △PST, thus PQ/PS = QR/ST. Let PQ = x, therefore x/(x+60) = 80/120. Solving this, we get x = 120. Hence, PQ = 120m. Therefore, the answer is: B.

question: 如图是小莹设计用手电来测量某古城墙高度的示意图．在点P处放一水平的平面镜,光线从点A出发经平面镜反射后,刚好射到古城墙CD的顶端C处．已知AB⊥BD,CD⊥BD．且测得AB=1.4米,BP=2.1米,PD=12米．那么该古城墙CD的高度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a horizontal plane mirror is placed at point P, and the light from point A is reflected by the plane mirror and just reaches the top C of the ancient city wall CD. It is known that AB ⊥ BD, CD ⊥ BD, and it is measured that AB = 1.4 meters, BP = 2.1 meters, PD = 12 meters. Then the height of the ancient city wall CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠APB = ∠CPD, ∠ABP = ∠CDP, therefore △ABP is similar to △CDP. Hence, AB/CD = BP/PD, which means 1.4/CD = 2.1/12. Solving this gives: CD = 8 meters. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,点M是⁀{AB}的中点,连结MO并延长,交⊙O于点N,连结BN,若∠AOB=140°,则∠N的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, point M is the midpoint of arc AB, connect MO and extend it to intersect ⊙O at point N, connect BN, if ∠AOB = 140°, then the degree of ∠N is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point M is the midpoint of line segment AB, therefore AM = BM. Since ∠AOB = 140°, therefore ∠BOM = 1/2 ∠AOB = 70°. Thus ∠N = 1/2 ∠BOM = 35°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,某数学学习兴趣小组为了测量树AB的度数,他们测得此树在阳光下的影子BC的长为9m,在相同时刻,他们还测得小亮在阳光下的影长为1.5m,已知小亮的身高为1.8m,则树AB的高为()
answer_cot: ∵同一时刻物高与影长成正比例．∴1.8:1.5=树AB的高:9,∴树AB的高是10.8米．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a math study interest group measured the height of tree AB by measuring the length of its shadow BC to be 9 m in the sunlight. At the same time, they also measured the shadow length of Xiao Liang in the sunlight to be 1.5 m. Knowing that Xiao Liang's height is 1.8 m, then the height of tree AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because at the same time, the height of an object is directly proportional to the length of its shadow. Therefore, 1.8:1.5 = the height of tree AB:9, thus the height of tree AB is 10.8 meters. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示为农村一古老的捣碎器,已知支撑柱AB的高为0.3米,踏板DE长为1米,支撑点A到踏脚D的距离为0.6米,原来捣头点E着地,现在踏脚D着地,则捣头点E上升了()
answer_cot: 如图:∵AB∥EF,∴△DAB∽△DEF,∴AD:DE=AB:EF,∴0.6:1=0.3:EF,∴EF=0.5(米)．∴捣头点E上升了0.5米．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is an ancient rural pounder. It is known that the height of the support column AB is 0.3 meters, the pedal DE is 1 meter long, the distance from the support point A to the footstep D is 0.6 meters, originally the pounding point E touches the ground, now the footstep D touches the ground, then the pounding point E has risen by ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Because AB ∥ EF, therefore △DAB ∼ △DEF, thus AD : DE = AB : EF, therefore 0.6 : 1 = 0.3 : EF, thus EF = 0.5 (meters). Therefore, the pile driver point E has risen by 0.5 meters. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,光源P在横杆AB的正上方,AB在灯光下的影子为CD,AB∥CD,AB=2m,CD=5m,点P到CD的距离是3m,则AB与CD的距离是()m．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the light source P is directly above the crossbar AB, the shadow of AB under the light is CD, AB ∥ CD, AB = 2m, CD = 5m, the distance from point P to CD is 3m, then the distance between AB and CD is () m.
answer_cot_en: Let the distance from point P to AB be xm. Because AB ∥ CD, therefore △PAB ∼ △PCD, thus x/3 = AB/CD = 2/5, solving this gives x = 6/5m. 3 - 6/5 = 9/5m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,小强自制了一个小孔成像装置,其中纸筒的长度为15cm,他准备了一支长为20cm的蜡烛,想要得到高度为4cm的像,蜡烛与纸筒的距离应该为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaoqiang made a pinhole imaging device, where the length of the paper tube is 15 cm. He prepared a candle that is 20 cm long and wants to get an image that is 4 cm high. The distance between the candle and the paper tube should be ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, AB = 20cm, OF = 15cm, CD = 4cm. Since AB ∥ CD, and EF ⊥ AB, therefore EF ⊥ CD. Therefore, △OAB ∽ △ODC, so CD/AB = OF/OE, that is, 4/20 = 15/OE, solving this gives OE = 75cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在一场羽毛球比赛中,站在场内M处的运动员林丹把求从N点击到了对方内的B点,已知网高OA=1.52m,OB=4m,OM=5m,则林丹起跳后击球点离地面的距离NM=()
answer_cot: 根据题意得:AO⊥BM,NM⊥BM,∴AO∥NM,∴△ABO∽△NBM,∴\frac{0A}{NM}=\frac{OB}{BM},∵OA=1.52米,OB=4米,OM=5米,∴BM=OB+OM=4+5=9(米),∴\frac{1.52}{NM}=\frac{4}{9},解得:NM=3.42(米),∴林丹起跳后击球点N离地面的距离NM为3.42米．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in a badminton match, the athlete Lin Dan standing at point M inside the court hits the shuttlecock from point N to point B on the opponent's side. It is known that the net height OA = 1.52 m, OB = 4 m, OM = 5 m, then the distance from the point where Lin Dan jumps and hits the shuttlecock to the ground, NM = ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem: AO ⊥ BM, NM ⊥ BM, therefore AO ∥ NM, therefore △ABO ∽ △NBM, therefore OA/NM = OB/BM. Given that OA = 1.52 meters, OB = 4 meters, OM = 5 meters, therefore BM = OB + OM = 4 + 5 = 9 (meters), therefore 1.52/NM = 4/9, solving this gives: NM = 3.42 (meters), therefore the distance NM from the point N where Lin Dan jumps to hit the ball to the ground is 3.42 meters. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 小明在测量楼高时,先测出楼房落在地面上的影长BA为15米(如图),然后在A处树立一根高2米的标杆,测得标杆的影长AC为3米,则楼高为()
answer_cot: ∵\frac{标杆的高}{标杆的影长}=\frac{楼高}{楼影长}即\frac{2}{3}=\frac{楼高}{15},∴楼高=10米．故选:A．
question_en: Xiaoming measured the height of the building by first measuring the shadow length BA of the building on the ground as 15 meters (as shown in the figure), then erecting a 2-meter-high pole at point A, and measuring the shadow length AC of the pole as 3 meters, then the height of the building is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the ratio of the height of the standard rod to the length of its shadow equals the ratio of the building height to the length of its shadow, that is, 2/3 = building height / 15, therefore the building height = 10 meters. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示:两根竖直的电线杆AB长为6,CD长为3,AD交于BC于点E点,则E到地面的距离EF的长是()
answer_cot: ∵两根电线杆AB、CD都竖直,EF垂直于地面,∴△ABD∽△EFD,△BCD∽△BEF,∴\frac{DF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{AB},\frac{BF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{CD},∴\frac{DF}{BD}+\frac{BF}{BD}=\frac{EF}{CD}+\frac{EF}{AB},即\frac{EF}{6}+\frac{EF}{3}=1,解得EF=2．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure: two vertical utility poles AB is 6 m long, CD is 3 m long, AD intersects BC at point E, then the distance EF from point E to the ground is ()
answer_cot_en: Because both electrical poles AB and CD are vertical, and EF is perpendicular to the ground, therefore △ABD is similar to △EFD, and △BCD is similar to △BEF. Therefore, DF/BD = EF/AB, and BF/BD = EF/CD. Therefore, DF/BD + BF/BD = EF/CD + EF/AB, which is EF/6 + EF/3 = 1. Solving this gives EF = 2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,要在一块△ABC的纸片上截取正方形DEFG模型．其中,G、F在BC边上,D、E分别在AB、AC边上,AH⊥BC交DE于M,若BC=12cm,AH=8cm,则正方形DEFG的边长是()
answer_cot:
假设正方形边长为x厘米,
在△ABC中可得:\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AM}{AH},∵BC=12cm,BC边上的高为8cm,∴AH=8cm,DE=xcm,AM=(8-x)cm代入上式得:\frac{x}{12}=\frac{8-x}{8},
解得:x=4.8cm．∴正方形的边长是4.8cm．
故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, to cut out a square DEFG model on a piece of △ABC paper. Where G and F are on side BC, D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, AH ⊥ BC intersects DE at M, if BC = 12 cm, AH = 8 cm, then the side length of square DEFG is ()
answer_cot_en: Assume the side length of the square is x cm, in △ABC, we can get: DE/BC = AM/AH. Since BC = 12cm, the height on the side BC is 8cm, therefore AH = 8cm, DE = x cm, AM = (8 - x) cm. Substitute these into the equation, we get: x/12 = (8 - x)/8, solving this, we get: x = 4.8 cm. Therefore, the side length of the square is 4.8 cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 2009年l0月27日,上海队小将吴迪在全运会赛场上脱颖而出,以2:0的比分战胜了男子单打头号种子选手曾少眩,勇夺全运会网球男子单打冠军．下图是吴迪在决赛中打的一个球,已知网高0.8米,击球点到网的水平距离为4米,打球时使球恰好能打过网,且落点恰好在离网6米的位置上,则球拍击球的高度h为()
question_en: On October 27, 2009, the young player Wu Di from the Shanghai team emerged in the National Games, defeating the top seed in men's singles, Zeng Shaoxuan, with a score of 2:0 to win the National Games tennis men's singles championship. The following figure shows a shot made by Wu Di in the final. It is known that the net height is 0.8 meters, the horizontal distance from the hitting point to the net is 4 meters, and when hitting the ball, the ball just clears the net, and the landing point is exactly at a position 6 meters from the net, then the height h at which the racket hits the ball is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore △ABE ∼ △CDE, thus CE/AE = CD/AB, therefore 6/10 = 0.8/AB, thus h = AB = 4/3 (meters). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,∠ABO=40°,∠ACO=30°,则∠BOC的度数为()
answer_cot: 过A作⊙O的直径,交⊙O于D；在△OAB中,OA=OB,即∠OBA=∠OAB,则∠BOD=∠ABO+∠OAB=2×40°=80°,同理可得:∠COD=∠ACO+∠OAC=2×30°=60°,故∠BOC=∠BOD+∠COD=140°,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠ABO = 40°, ∠ACO = 30°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw a diameter of ⊙O through A, intersecting ⊙O at D; in △OAB, OA = OB, which means ∠OBA = ∠OAB, then ∠BOD = ∠ABO + ∠OAB = 2×40° = 80°. Similarly, we can get: ∠COD = ∠ACO + ∠OAC = 2×30° = 60°, therefore ∠BOC = ∠BOD + ∠COD = 140°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是斜靠在墙上的梯子,梯脚距墙2米,梯子上的D点距墙1.8米,BD长0.6米,则梯子的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a ladder leaning against the wall, the foot of the ladder is 2 meters from the wall, point D on the ladder is 1.8 meters from the wall, BD is 0.6 meters long, then the length of the ladder is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ⊥ AC, BC ⊥ AC, therefore DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AB/AD = BC/DE, therefore AB = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 某校数学兴趣小组为测量学校旗杆AC的高度,在点F处竖立一根长为1.5米的标杆DF,如图所示,量出DF的影子EF的长度为1米,再量出旗杆AC的影子BC的长度为6米,那么旗杆AC的高度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the math interest group of a school set up a 1.5-meter-long standard pole DF at point F to measure the height of the school's flagpole AC. The length of the shadow EF of DF is measured to be 1 meter, and then the length of the shadow BC of the flagpole AC is measured to be 6 meters, then the height of the flagpole AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the ratio of the height of the standard rod to the length of its shadow equals the ratio of the height of the flagpole to the length of its shadow, that is, 1.5/1 = AC/6, therefore AC = 6 × 1.5 = 9 meters. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,小东用长3.2m的竹竿做测量工具测量学校旗杆的高度,移动竹竿,使竹竿、旗杆顶端的影子恰好落在地面的同一点．此时,竹竿与这一点相距8m,与旗杆相距22m,则旗杆的高为()
answer_cot:
因为BE∥CD,所以△AEB∽△ADC,
于是\frac{AE}{AD}=\frac{BE}{CD},即\frac{8}{22+8}=\frac{3.2}{CD},
解得:CD=12．
旗杆的高为12m．
故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, Xiao Dong uses a 3.2m long bamboo pole as a measuring tool to measure the height of the school flagpole. He moves the bamboo pole so that the shadows of the top of the bamboo pole and the flagpole fall exactly on the same point on the ground. At this time, the bamboo pole is 8m away from this point and 22m away from the flagpole, then the height of the flagpole is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BE is parallel to CD, therefore △AEB is similar to △ADC, so AE/AD = BE/CD, which is 8/(22+8) = 3.2/CD, solving this gives: CD = 12. The height of the flagpole is 12m. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,CD是平面镜子,光线从A点射出,经CD上一点E反射后照射到B点,若入射角为α,AC⊥CD,BD⊥CD,垂足分别为C、D,且AC=3,BD=6,CD=10,则线段ED的长为()
answer_cot:
如图,∵CD是平面镜,α为入射角,∠1为反射角∴α=∠1．∵α+∠AEC=90°,∠1+∠BED=90°∴∠AEC=BED,∵AC⊥CD,BD⊥CD∴∠ACE=∠BDE=90°∴Rt△ACE∽Rt△BDE,∴\frac{AC}{BD}=\frac{CE}{ED},∵AC=3,BD=6,CD=10∴\frac{3}{6}=\frac{10-ED}{ED},
解得ED=\frac{20}{3}．
故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, CD is a plane mirror, the light ray is emitted from point A, reflected at point E on CD, and then illuminates point B. If the angle of incidence is α, AC ⊥ CD, BD ⊥ CD, with the perpendicular feet being C and D respectively, and AC = 3, BD = 6, CD = 10, then the length of line segment ED is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because CD is a plane mirror, α is the angle of incidence, and ∠1 is the angle of reflection, therefore α = ∠1. Because α + ∠AEC = 90°, ∠1 + ∠BED = 90°, therefore ∠AEC = ∠BED. Since AC ⊥ CD, BD ⊥ CD, therefore ∠ACE = ∠BDE = 90°. Therefore, right triangle ACE is similar to right triangle BDE, therefore AC/BD = CE/ED. Given that AC = 3, BD = 6, CD = 10, therefore 3/6 = (10 - ED) / ED, solving this gives ED = 20/3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,小明设计两个直角,来测量河宽BC,他量得AB=2米,BD=\frac{7}{3}米,CE=9米,则河宽BC为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, Xiao Ming designed two right angles to measure the river width BC. He measured AB = 2 meters, BD = \(\frac{7}{3}\) meters, CE = 9 meters, then the river width BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BD ∥ CE, therefore △ABD is similar to △ACE. Given that AB = 2, BD = 7/3, CE = 9, therefore AC = (AB * CE) / BD = (2 * 9) / (7/3) = 54/7. Thus, BC = AC - AB = 54/7 - 2 = 40/7 meters. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,一同学在湖边看到一棵树,他目测出自己与树的距离为20m,树的顶端在水中的倒影距自己5m远,该同学的身高为1.7m,则树高为()m．
answer_cot:
由相似三角形的性质,设树高x米,
则\frac{5}{20-5}=\frac{1.7}{x},∴x=5.1m．
故选:B．
