answer_cot_en: Because AP and BP respectively tangent ⊙O at points A and B, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, thus ∠AOB = 360° - 60° - 90° - 90° = 120°, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,P是⊙O的直径AB延长线上一点,PC切⊙O于C,∠P=50°,∠A为()
answer_cot: 连接OP,∵CP为圆O的切线,∴OC⊥CP,在Rt△OPC中,∠P=50°,∴∠POC=40°,∵OA=OC,∴∠A=∠OCA,∵∠POC为△AOC的外角,∴∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠POC=20°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on the extension line of the diameter AB of ⊙O, PC is a tangent to ⊙O at C, ∠P = 50°, then ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OP, because CP is a tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CP. In right triangle OPC, ∠P = 50°, therefore ∠POC = 40°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠OCA. Because ∠POC is an exterior angle of △AOC, therefore ∠A = 1/2 ∠POC = 20°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,切点为A、B,若∠OAB=30°,则∠P的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, with A and B being the tangent points. If ∠OAB = 30°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠OAB = 30°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 2×30° = 120°. Since PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, thus ∠P = 360° - 90° - 90° - 120° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA,PB是⊙O是切线,A,B为切点,AC是O的直径,若∠BAC=25°,则∠P为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents to ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, if ∠BAC = 25°, then ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Since OA = OB and ∠BAC = 25°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 2∠BAC = 130°. Also, since ∠OAP + ∠OBP + ∠AOB + ∠P = 360°, therefore ∠P = 360° - ∠OAP - ∠OBP - ∠AOB = 360° - 90° - 90° - 130° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线BC与⊙O相切于点A,AD是⊙O的弦,连接OD,若∠DAC=50°,则∠ODA的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line BC is tangent to ⊙O at point A, AD is a chord of ⊙O. Connect OD, if ∠DAC = 50°, then the degree of ∠ODA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line BC is tangent to ⊙O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ BC, thus ∠OAC = 90°. Since ∠DAC = 50°, therefore ∠OAD = 40°. Given that OD = OA, therefore ∠ODA = ∠OAD = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,某宾馆大厅要铺圆环形的地毯,工人师傅只测量了与小圆相切的大圆的弦AB的长,就计算出了圆环的面积．若测量得AB的长为8米,则圆环的面积为()
answer_cot: 过O作OC⊥AB于C,连OA,如图,∴AC=BC,而AB=8米,∴AC=4米,∵AB与小圆相切,∴OC为小圆的半径,∴圆环的面积=π•OA²-π•OC²=π(OA²-OC²)=π•AC²=16π(平方米)．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in a hotel lobby that requires a circular ring carpet, the worker master only measured the length of the chord AB of the large circle tangent to the small circle and calculated the area of the ring. If the measured length of AB is 8 meters, then the area of the ring is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw OC ⊥ AB at C, connect OA, as shown in the figure, therefore AC = BC, and AB = 8 meters, therefore AC = 4 meters. Since AB is tangent to the small circle, therefore OC is the radius of the small circle, therefore the area of the annulus = π•OA² - π•OC² = π(OA² - OC²) = π•AC² = 16π (square meters). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD切于点D,AB的延长线交CD于点C,若∠ACD=40°,则∠A=()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OD．∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD切于点D,∴∠CDO=90°．又∵∠ACD=40°,∴∠COD=50°．∴∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠COD=25°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is tangent at point D, and the extended line of AB intersects CD at point C. If ∠ACD = 40°, then ∠A = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect OD. Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, and CD is tangent at point D, therefore ∠CDO = 90°. Also, since ∠ACD = 40°, therefore ∠COD = 50°. Thus, ∠A = 1/2 ∠COD = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点D在AB的延长线上,DC切⊙O于点C,若∠A=26°,则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point D is on the extension of AB, DC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, if ∠A = 26°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure on the right, connect BC. Because AB is the diameter, therefore ∠BCA = 90°. Given that ∠A = 26°, therefore ∠CBA = 90° - 26° = 64°. Since DC is a tangent, therefore ∠BCD = ∠A = 26°, thus ∠D = ∠CBA - ∠BCD = 64° - 26° = 38°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC中,AB=AC,∠BA0=45°,△ABC内接于⊙O,D为⊙O上一点,过点D作⊙O的切线交BC的延长线于E,若DE⊥BC,AD=2√{2},则DE的长为()
answer_cot: 过点A作AH⊥BC于点H,连接OC,OD,∵AB=AC,∴AH=CH,∴AH过点O,∵DE是⊙O的切线,∴OD⊥DE,∵DE⊥BC,∴∠OHE=∠E=∠EDO=90°,∴四边形ODEH是矩形,∴∠AOD=90°,∵AD=2√{2},∴OA=OD=2,∵∠BAC=45°,∴∠COH=45°,∵OC=2,∴OH=CH=√{2},∴DE=OH=√{2}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠BAC = 45°, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, D is a point on ⊙O, a tangent from point D intersects the extension of BC at E. If DE ⊥ BC and AD = 2√2, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw AH ⊥ BC at point H through point A, connect OC, OD. Because AB = AC, therefore AH = CH, therefore AH passes through point O. Since DE is the tangent of ⊙O, therefore OD ⊥ DE. Since DE ⊥ BC, therefore ∠OHE = ∠E = ∠EDO = 90°, thus quadrilateral ODEH is a rectangle, therefore ∠AOD = 90°. Since AD = 2√2, therefore OA = OD = 2. Since ∠BAC = 45°, therefore ∠COH = 45°. Since OC = 2, therefore OH = CH = √2, therefore DE = OH = √2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,AO与⊙O交于点C,若∠BAO=40°,则∠OCB的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,∴OB⊥AB,即∠OBA=90°,∵∠BAO=40°,∴∠O=50°,∵OB=OC(都是半径),∴∠OCB=\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠O)=65°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, B is the tangent point, AO intersects ⊙O at point C, if ∠BAO = 40°, then the degree of ∠OCB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the tangent to ⊙O, and B is the point of tangency, therefore OB ⊥ AB, which means ∠OBA = 90°. Since ∠BAO = 40°, therefore ∠O = 50°. Since OB = OC (both are radii), therefore ∠OCB = 1/2 (180° - ∠O) = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O与AB切于点C,∠BCE=60°,DC=6,DE=4,则S_{△CDE}为()
answer_cot: 过C作CF⊥DE,交DE于点F,∵AB与圆O相切,CE为圆O的弦,∴∠CDE=∠BCE=60°,在Rt△CDF中,DC=6,∠CDE=60°,∴CF=DCsin60°=3√{3},又DE=4,则S_{△CDE}=\frac{1}{2}DE•CF=6√{3}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is tangent to AB at point C, ∠BCE = 60°, DC = 6, DE = 4, then the area of △CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw CF ⊥ DE through C, intersecting DE at point F. Because AB is tangent to circle O, and CE is a chord of circle O, therefore ∠CDE = ∠BCE = 60°. In right triangle CDF, DC = 6, ∠CDE = 60°, therefore CF = DCsin60° = 3√3. Also, DE = 4, then the area of △CDE = 1/2 DE•CF = 6√3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB切⊙O于B,割线ACD经过圆心O,若∠BCD=70°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at B, the secant line ACD passes through the center O, if ∠BCD = 70°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OB = OC, and ∠BCD = 70°, therefore ∠OBC = ∠BCD = 70°, thus ∠BOC = 180° - ∠BCD - ∠OBC = 40°. Since AB is tangent to ⊙O at B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, thus ∠ABO = 90°, therefore ∠A = 90° - ∠BOC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=15,AC=12,BC=9,经过点C且与边AB相切的动圆与CB、CA分别相交于点E、F,则线段EF长度的最小值是()
answer_cot: 结合题意,易知△ABC为RT△,∠C=90°,即知EF为圆的直径,设圆与AB的切点为D,连接CD,当CD垂直于AB时,即CD是圆的直径的时候,EF长度最小,最小值是\frac{9×12}{15}=\frac{36}{5}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 15, AC = 12, BC = 9, a moving circle passing through point C and tangent to side AB intersects CB and CA at points E and F, respectively, then the minimum value of the length of line segment EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Combining the problem, it is easy to know that △ABC is a right triangle, ∠C = 90°, which means EF is the diameter of the circle. Assume the tangent point of the circle and AB is D, connect CD, when CD is perpendicular to AB, that is, when CD is the diameter of the circle, the length of EF is the smallest, the minimum value is 9×12/15 = 36/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,BC与⊙O相切于点C,BO的延长线交⊙O于点A,连结AC,若∠ACB=120°,则∠A的度数等于()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OC．∵BC与⊙O相切于点C,∴OC⊥BC,即∠OCB=90°．∵A=OC,∴∠A=∠ACO=∠ACB-∠OCB=120°-90°=30°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, BC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, the extension line of BO intersects ⊙O at point A, connect AC, if ∠ACB = 120°, then the degree of ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect OC. Because BC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, therefore OC ⊥ BC, that is ∠OCB = 90°. Since A = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠ACO = ∠ACB - ∠OCB = 120° - 90° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,一块四边形绿化园地,四角都做有半径为2的圆形喷水池,则这四个喷水池占去的绿化园地的面积为()
answer_cot: 圆形喷水池形成四边形,四边形的内角和为360°,阴影部分的面积和为一个圆面积,故圆形喷水池的面积为π•2²=4π．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a quadrilateral green space has circular fountains with a radius of 2 at each corner, then the area occupied by these four fountains in the green space is ()
answer_cot_en: The circular fountain forms a quadrilateral, the sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral is 360°, the sum of the areas of the shaded parts is equal to the area of a circle, hence the area of the circular fountain is π•2²=4π. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在边长为4的正方形ABCD中,先以点A为圆心,AD的长为半径画弧,再以AB边的中点为圆心,AB长的一半为半径画弧,则两弧之间的阴影部分面积是()(结果保留π)．
answer_cot: 根据题意得,S_{阴影部分}=S_{扇形BAD}-S_{半圆BA},∵S_{扇形BAD}=\frac{90π\cdot4^{2}}{360}=4πS_{半圆BA}=\frac{1}{2}•π•2²=2π,∴S_{阴影部分}=4π-2π=2π．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD with a side length of 4, first draw an arc with point A as the center and the length of AD as the radius, then draw an arc with the midpoint of side AB as the center and half the length of AB as the radius, then the area of the shaded part between the two arcs is () (keep the result in terms of π).
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, the area of the shaded part, S_{shaded} = S_{sector BAD} - S_{semi-circle BA}. Since the area of sector BAD, S_{sector BAD} = (90π * 4²) / 360 = 4π, and the area of semi-circle BA, S_{semi-circle BA} = 1/2 * π * 2² = 2π, therefore the area of the shaded part, S_{shaded} = 4π - 2π = 2π. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AE=3,AC=9,AD=4,则AB的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AE = 3, AC = 9, AD = 4, then the value of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, that is 4/AB = 3/9, therefore AB = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AD与BC相交于点O,若AO=2,DO=4,BO=3,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AD intersects BC at point O. If AO = 2, DO = 4, BO = 3, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore the ratio of BO to CO equals the ratio of AO to DO. Given that AO = 2, DO = 4, BO = 3, therefore the ratio of 3 to CO equals the ratio of 2 to 4. Solving this gives: CO = 6, therefore BC = BO + CO = 3 + 6 = 9. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知a∥b∥c,AB=1,BC=2,EF=4,则DE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that a ∥ b ∥ c, AB = 1, BC = 2, EF = 4, then DE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because a is parallel to b which is parallel to c, AB = 1, BC = 2, EF = 4, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is 1/2 = DE/4, DE = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线a、b、c分别与直线m、n交于点A、B、C、D、E、F．已知直线a∥b∥c,若AB=2,BC=3,则\frac{DE}{EF}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, lines a, b, and c intersect with lines m and n at points A, B, C, D, E, and F respectively. It is known that line a ∥ b ∥ c, if AB = 2, BC = 3, then the value of \(\frac{DE}{EF}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line a is parallel to b which is parallel to c, therefore DE/EF = AB/BC = 2/3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,若AD=1,DB=2,则\frac{AE}{AC}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if AD = 1, DB = 2, then the value of \(\frac{AE}{AC}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = 1, DB = 2, therefore AB = 3, thus AD/AB = 1/3. Since AD/DB = AE/AC, therefore AE/AC = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,M是AC的中点,E是AB上一点,AE=\frac{1}{4}AB,连接EM并延长,交BC的延长线于D,则\frac{BC}{CD}=()
answer_cot: 如图,过C点作CP∥AB,交DE于P,∵PC∥AE,∴△AEM∽△CPM,∴\frac{PC}{AE}=\frac{CM}{AM},∵M是AC的中点,∴AM=CM,∴PC=AE,∵AE=\frac{1}{4}AB,∴CP=\frac{1}{4}AB,∴CP=\frac{1}{3}BE,∵CP∥BE,∴△DCP∽△DBE,∴\frac{CP}{BE}=\frac{CD}{BD}=\frac{1}{3},∴BD=3CD,∴BC=2CD,即\frac{BC}{CD}=2．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, M is the midpoint of AC, E is a point on AB, AE = 1/4 AB, connect EM and extend it, intersecting the extension line of BC at D, then BC/CD = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, draw CP parallel to AB, intersecting DE at P. Because PC is parallel to AE, therefore △AEM is similar to △CPM, therefore PC/AE = CM/AM. Since M is the midpoint of AC, therefore AM = CM, therefore PC = AE. Since AE = 1/4 AB, therefore CP = 1/4 AB, therefore CP = 1/3 BE. Since CP is parallel to BE, therefore △DCP is similar to △DBE, therefore CP/BE = CD/BD = 1/3, therefore BD = 3CD, therefore BC = 2CD, that is, BC/CD = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在矩形ABCD中,AB=3,BC=4,点M在BC边上,且满足BM=1,过D作DN⊥AM交AM于点N,则DN的长为()
answer_cot: 连接DM,如图所示:∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴∠B=90°,AD=BC=4,△AMD底边AD上的高为AB,AM=√{AB^{2}+BM^{2}}=√{3^{2}+1^{2}}=√{10},∵△ADM的面积=\frac{1}{2}AM×DN=\frac{1}{2}AD×AB,∴DN=\frac{AD×AB}{AM}=\frac{4×3}{√{10}}=\frac{6√{10}}{5}；故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 3, BC = 4, point M is on side BC, and BM = 1, draw DN ⊥ AM intersecting AM at point N, then the length of DN is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect DM, as shown in the figure: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rectangle, therefore ∠B = 90°, AD = BC = 4, the height of △AMD on the base AD is AB, AM = √{AB² + BM²} = √{3² + 1²} = √{10}, because the area of △ADM = 1/2 AM × DN = 1/2 AD × AB, therefore DN = AD × AB / AM = 4 × 3 / √{10} = 6√{10} / 5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 已知如图,在△ABC中,点D、点E分别在AB、BC边上,且DE∥AC,BE=2,CE=1,△BDE的面积为4,则△ABC的面积为()
question_en: As known from the figure, in △ABC, point D and point E are on sides AB and BC respectively, and DE ∥ AC, BE = 2, CE = 1, the area of △BDE is 4, then the area of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BE = 2, CE = 1, therefore BC = BE + CE = 2 + 1 = 3. Since DE ∥ AC, therefore △BDE is similar to △BAC, therefore BE/BC = BD/AB = 2/3, therefore the area ratio of △BDE to △ABC is (2/3)^2 = 4/9. Given that the area of △BDE is 4, therefore the area of △ABC = 9/4 * 4 = 9. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,若AB=7cm,AC=5cm,AD=3cm,则DE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if AB = 7cm, AC = 5cm, AD = 3cm, then DE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = 7, AD = 3, therefore BD = BA - AD = 4. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore △BDE is similar to △BAC, therefore BD/BA = DE/AC, that is 4/7 = DE/5, solving this, we get DE = 20/7 (cm). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,点E在边AD上,CE交BD于点F,若EF=\frac{1}{3}FC,则\frac{AE}{ED}=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, point E is on side AD, CE intersects BD at point F, if EF = 1/3 FC, then AE/ED = ()
answer_cot_en: In ▱ABCD, because AD is parallel to BC, and AD equals BC, therefore △DEF is similar to △BCF, therefore DE/BC = EF/FC = 1/3, therefore DE/AD = 1/3, therefore AE/ED = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知点M为平行四边形ABCD边AB的中点,线段CM交BD于点E,S△BEM=2,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴S△DMB=S△CBM,∴S△DEM=S△CEB,∵AM=BM=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}CD,∴\frac{CE}{EM}=\frac{CD}{BM}=2,∴S△CEB=2S△BME=4,∴S阴=4+4=8,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point M is the midpoint of side AB of parallelogram ABCD, segment CM intersects BD at point E, the area of △BEM is 2, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, and AB ∥ CD, therefore the area of △DMB equals the area of △CBM, thus the area of △DEM equals the area of △CEB. Since AM = BM = 1/2 AB = 1/2 CD, therefore CE/EM = CD/BM = 2, thus the area of △CEB = 2 times the area of △BME = 4, therefore the shaded area = 4 + 4 = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,对角线AC、BD相交于O,若\frac{S_{iangleADO}}{S_{iangleDOC}}=\frac{1}{3},则的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AD ∥ BC, diagonals AC and BD intersect at O, if \(\frac{S_{\triangle ADO}}{S_{\triangle DOC}} = \frac{1}{3}\), then the value of \(\angle AOC\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the ratio of the area of △ADO to △DOC is 1/3, therefore the ratio of OA to OC is 1/3. Since AD is parallel to BC, therefore △ADO is similar to △CBO, thus the ratio of AD to BC is equal to the ratio of OA to OC, which is 1/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,▱ABCD中,∠C=120°,AB=AE=5,AE与BD交于点F,AF=2EF．则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠C = 120°, AB = AE = 5, AE intersects BD at point F, AF = 2EF. Then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD = BC, and AD is parallel to BC, therefore △AFD is similar to △EFB, therefore BE/AD = EF/AF. Given that AF = 2EF, therefore AD = BC = 2BE. Given that BE = 5, therefore BC = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,D,E为△ABC的边AB,AC上的点,DE∥BC,若AD:DB=1:3,AE=2,则AC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D and E are points on the sides AB and AC of △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if AD:DB = 1:3, AE = 2, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB = 1/(3+1) = 1/4. Since AE = 2, therefore AC = 8. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CD∥EF,AD:AF=3:5,BE=15,那么CE的长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AD:AF = 3:5, BE = 15, then the length of CE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore BC/BE = AD/AF, that is BC/15 = 3/5, therefore BC = 9, thus CE = BE - BC = 15 - 9 = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C,D,E,F,\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=6,则EF的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l1 and l2 intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C, D, E, F, \(\frac{AB}{BC} = \frac{2}{3}\), DE = 6, then the value of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is, 6/EF = 2/3, therefore EF = 9. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m,n与a,b,c分别交于点A,C,E,B,D,F,若AC=4,AE=10,BD=3,则DF的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m and n intersect a, b, and c at points A, C, E, B, D, F respectively. If AC = 4, AE = 10, BD = 3, then the value of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a∥b∥c, therefore AC/AE = BD/BF, that is 4/10 = 3/BF, solving this, we get BF = 15/2, then DF = BF - BD = 4.5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,若AD=1,DB=2,则\frac{AD}{AB}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if AD = 1, DB = 2, then the value of \(\frac{AD}{AB}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = 1, DB = 2, therefore AB = 3, thus AD/AB = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与a、b、c分别交于点A、C、E和B、D、F,若AC=4,AE=10,BF=\frac{15}{2},则DF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m and n intersect a, b, and c at points A, C, E and B, D, F respectively. If AC = 4, AE = 10, BF = \(\frac{15}{2}\), then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC = 4, AE = 10, therefore CE = 6. Since line a is parallel to b which is parallel to c, therefore AE/CE = BF/DF, that is 10/6 = 15/2 / DF, therefore DF = 9/2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知a∥b∥c,AC=6,AB=2,EF=5,则DF的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that a ∥ b ∥ c, AC = 6, AB = 2, EF = 5, then the value of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line a is parallel to b which is parallel to c, AC = 6, AB = 2, EF = 5, therefore AB/AC = DE/DF, that is 2/6 = (DF - 5)/DF, solving this gives DF = 15/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{1}{2},DE=4,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{1}{2}\), DE = 4, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD/DB = 1/2, therefore AD/AB = 1/3. Since in △ABC, DE is parallel to BC, therefore DE/BC = AD/AB = 1/3. Given that DE = 4, therefore BC = 3DE = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC,已知EC=6,\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{2}{3},则AE的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, it is known that EC = 6, \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{2}{3}\), then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC. Given that EC = 6, and AD/DB = 2/3, therefore AE/6 = 2/3. Solving this gives: AE = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D,E分别是AB和AC上的点,满足AD=3,AE=2,EC=1,DE∥BC,则AB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on AB and AC respectively, satisfying AD = 3, AE = 2, EC = 1, DE ∥ BC, then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore the ratio of AD to DB equals the ratio of AE to EC. Given that AD = 3, AE = 2, EC = 1, therefore the ratio of 3 to DB equals the ratio of 2 to 1, thus DB equals 3 divided by 2, which is 1.5. Therefore, AB equals AD plus DB, which is 3 plus 1.5, equals 4.5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD∥EF,AC与BD相交于点E,若CE=5,CF=4,AE=BC,则\frac{CD}{AB}的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AC intersects BD at point E. If CE = 5, CF = 4, AE = BC, then the value of \(\frac{CD}{AB}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Let AE = x, then BC = x. Because EF ∥ AB, therefore CE/CA = CF/CB, which is 5/(5+x) = 4/x. Solving this gives x = 20, so AE = 20. Because CD ∥ AB, therefore △ECD ∼ △EAB, thus CD/AB = CE/AE = 5/20 = 1/4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC边上,DE∥BC．若\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},AD=9,则AB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC. If \(\frac{AE}{AC} = \frac{3}{4}\), AD = 9, then AB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC = 3/4. Given that AD = 9, therefore AB = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},已知:AB=4,BC=6,DE=3,则EF=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, it is known: AB = 4, BC = 6, DE = 3, then EF = ()
answer_cot_en: Because l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is 4/6 = 3/EF, therefore EF = 9/2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,F是边AB上的点,DF交AC于点E,如果CD=10,\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{2}{5},那么BF的长是()
answer_cot: 如右图所示,∵四边形ABCD是▱,∴AB∥CD,∴△AEF∽△CED,∴AE:CE=AF:CD,又∵\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{2}{5},∴AF=4,∴BF=AB-AF=10-4=6．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, F is a point on side AB, DF intersects AC at point E, if CD = 10, \(\frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{2}{5}\), then the length of BF is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure on the right, because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ CD, therefore △AEF is similar to △CED, therefore AE:CE = AF:CD. Given that AE/EC = 2/5, therefore AF = 4, therefore BF = AB - AF = 10 - 4 = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,E是平行四边形ABCD的AD边上一点,过点E作EF∥AB交BD于F,若DE:EA=2:3,EF=4,则CD的长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE:EA=2:3,∴DE:DA=2:5,∵EF∥AB,∴\frac{DE}{DA}=\frac{EF}{AB},∵EF=4,∴\frac{2}{5}=\frac{4}{AB},解得:AB=10,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴CD=AB=10．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, E is a point on the side AD of the parallelogram ABCD, through point E draw EF ∥ AB intersecting BD at F. If DE:EA = 2:3, EF = 4, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE:EA = 2:3, therefore DE:DA = 2:5. Since EF ∥ AB, therefore DE/DA = EF/AB. Given that EF = 4, therefore 2/5 = 4/AB. Solving this gives: AB = 10. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore CD = AB = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},如果AB:BC=2:3,DE=4,则EF的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, if AB:BC = 2:3, DE = 4, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, therefore the ratio of AB to BC equals the ratio of DE to EF. Given that the ratio of AB to BC is 2:3, and DE equals 4, therefore EF equals 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图DE∥BC,AD=3,DB=4,AE=1.5,则EC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE ∥ BC, AD = 3, DB = 4, AE = 1.5, then EC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/BD = AE/EC. Given that AD = 3, DB = 6, AE = 2, therefore 3/4 = 1.5/EC, thus EC = 2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在边AB、AC上,DE∥BC,且AE=1,AC=5,AB=6,则AD的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, and AE = 1, AC = 5, AB = 6, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE is parallel to BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB. Given that AE = 1, AC = 5, AB = 6, therefore 1/5 = AD/6. Solving this gives: AD = 6/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,D、E是△ABC边AB、AC上的点,且DE∥BC,若DE:BC=3:5,AD=6,则AB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D and E are points on the sides AB and AC of △ABC, and DE ∥ BC. If DE:BC = 3:5, AD = 6, then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore DE/BC = AD/AB = 3/5, thus 6/AB = 3/5, therefore AB = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC∽△AED,∠ADE=80°,∠A=60°,则∠B等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ∽ △AED, ∠ADE = 80°, ∠A = 60°, then ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ADE + ∠A + ∠AED = 180°, therefore ∠AED = 180° - ∠ADE - ∠A = 180° - 80° - 60° = 40°. Also, since △ABC is similar to △AED, therefore ∠B = ∠AED = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,BC=3,AC=4,若△ABC∽△BDC,则CD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, BC = 3, AC = 4, if △ABC ∽ △BDC, then CD = ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is similar to △BDC, therefore BC/CD = AC/BC, that is, 3/CD = 4/3, solving this gives CD = 9/4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC∽△DEF,相似比为1:2,若EF=2,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ∽ △DEF, the similarity ratio is 1:2, if EF = 2, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is similar to △DEF, and the ratio of similarity is 1:2, therefore BC/EF = 1/2, thus BC = 1/2 EF = 1. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,DE是△ABC的中位线,已知△ABC的面积为8cm^{2},则△ADE的面积为()cm^{2}．
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE is the midline of △ABC, it is known that the area of △ABC is 8 cm², then the area of △ADE is () cm².
answer_cot_en: Because DE is the median, therefore DE ∥ BC, DE = 1/2 BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △ADE to △ABC is 1:4. Given that the area of △ABC is 8cm², therefore the area of △ADE is 2cm². Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,D是△ABC的边BC上一点,已知AB=6,AD=3,AC=4,∠DAC=∠B,则BD长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D is a point on the side BC of △ABC, it is known that AB = 6, AD = 3, AC = 4, ∠DAC = ∠B, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DAC = ∠B, ∠C = ∠C, therefore △ACD is similar to △BCA. Given that AB = 6, AD = 3, AC = 4, therefore AC/BC = AD/AB, that is 4/BC = 3/6, we can get: BC = 8. Since △ACD is similar to △BCA, therefore CD/AC = AC/BC, that is CD/4 = 4/8, we can get: CD = 2. Therefore, BD = BC - CD = 8 - 2 = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,若△ABC∽△ACD,∠A=60°,∠ACD=40°,则∠BCD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if △ABC ∽ △ACD, ∠A = 60°, ∠ACD = 40°, then the degree of ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is similar to △ACD, ∠A = 60°, ∠ACD = 40°, therefore ∠B = ∠ACD = 40°, thus ∠ACB = 180° - ∠A - ∠B = 80°, therefore ∠BCD = ∠ACB - ∠ACD = 80° - 40° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,两条直线被三条平行线所截,AB=2,BC=3,则\frac{EF}{EG}等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines are intersected by three parallel lines, AB = 2, BC = 3, then \(\frac{EF}{EG}\) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AE ∥ BF ∥ CG, therefore EF/EG = AB/AC. Given that AB = 2, BC = 3, therefore AC = AB + BC = 5, thus EF/EG = 2/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{AE}{AC}=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{1}{3}\), then \(\frac{AE}{AC} = \)
answer_cot_en: In △ABC, because DE ∥ BC, and AD/AB = 1/3, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,C、M是线段AB上的两点,且点M是线段AC的中点,若AB=8cm,BC=2cm,则AM的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】:由图形可知AC=AB-BC=8-2=6cm,∵M是线段AC的中点,∴AM=AC=3cm．故AM的长为3cm．
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and M are two points on the line segment AB, and point M is the midpoint of the line segment AC. If AB = 8 cm, BC = 2 cm, then the length of AM is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】: From the figure, we know that AC = AB - BC = 8 - 2 = 6cm. Since M is the midpoint of line segment AC, therefore AM = AC = 3cm. Hence, the length of AM is 3cm.

question: 如图,C,D是线段AB上两点,若CB=4cm,DB=7cm,且D是AC的中点,则AC的长等于()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由线段的和差,得DC=DB-CB=7-4=3cm,由D是AC中点,得AC=2DC=6cm．
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the line segment AB. If CB = 4 cm, DB = 7 cm, and D is the midpoint of AC, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: By the sum and difference of line segments, we get DC = DB - CB = 7 - 4 = 3cm. Since D is the midpoint of AC, we get AC = 2DC = 6cm.

question: 如图,BC=\frac{1}{2}AB,D为AC的中点,若DC=3,则AB的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BC = \(\frac{1}{2}\)AB, D is the midpoint of AC, if DC = 3, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because D is the midpoint of AC, and DC = 3, therefore AC = 2DC = 2×3 = 6. Since BC = 1/2 AB, therefore AB = 2/3 AC = 2/3 × 6 = 4.

question: 如图,小林从P点向西直走12米后,向左转,转动的角度为α,再走12米,如此重复,小林共走了108米回到点P,则α-5的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaolin walks 12 meters straight west from point P, then turns left by an angle of α, and walks another 12 meters, repeating this until Xiaolin has walked a total of 108 meters back to point P, then the value of α - 5 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Let's assume the number of sides is n. According to the problem, n = 108 ÷ 12 = 9, therefore α = 360° ÷ 9 = 40°. So, α - 5 = 35°.

question: 如图,已知AD是△ABC的中线,且△ABD的周长比△ACD的周长大3cm,则AB与AC的差为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵AD是△ABC的中线,∴BD=DC,∴△ABD与△ACD的周长之差=(AB+AD+BD)-(AC+AD+CD)=AB-AC,∵△ABD比△ACD的周长大3cm,∴AB与AC的差为3cm．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AD is the median of △ABC, and the perimeter of △ABD is 3 cm greater than the perimeter of △ACD, then the difference between AB and AC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AD is the median of △ABC, therefore BD = DC, therefore the difference in the perimeters of △ABD and △ACD = (AB + AD + BD) - (AC + AD + CD) = AB - AC. Since the perimeter of △ABD is 3cm larger than △ACD, therefore the difference between AB and AC is 3cm.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,M,N分别是AB,AC的中点,D,E为BC上的点,连结DN,EM．若AB=13cm,BC=10cm,DE=5cm,则图中阴影部分面积为cm2．()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接MN,过点A作AF⊥BC于F,则MN是△ABC的中位线,因此MN=\frac{1}{2}BC=5cm；则AF=√{AB²-BF²}=12cm．∵图中阴影部分的三个三角形的底长都是5cm,且高的和为12cm；因此S阴影=\frac{1}{2}×5×12=30cm2．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, M and N are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, D and E are points on BC, connect DN and EM. If AB = 13 cm, BC = 10 cm, DE = 5 cm, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is cm². ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Connect MN, draw AF ⊥ BC at point F, then MN is the median of △ABC, therefore MN = 1/2 BC = 5cm; then AF = √{AB² - BF²} = 12cm. Since the base lengths of the three triangles in the shaded area are all 5cm, and the sum of the heights is 12cm; therefore, the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 5 × 12 = 30cm².

question: 如图,C是以AB为直径的半圆O上一点,连结AC,BC,分别以AC,BC为边向外作正方形ACDE,BCFG．DE,FG,⁀{\mathrm{AC}},⁀{\mathrm{BC}}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q．若MP+NQ=14,AC+BC=18,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接OP,OQ,∵DE,FG,⁀{\mathrm{AC}},⁀{\mathrm{BC}}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q,∴OP⊥AC,OQ⊥BC,∴H、I是AC、BD的中点,∴OH+OI=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=9,∵MH+NI=AC+BC=18,MP+NQ=14,∴PH+QI=18-14=4,∴AB=OP+OQ=OH+OI+PH+QI=9+4=13,
question_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on the semicircle O with AB as the diameter. Connect AC and BC, and construct squares ACDE and BCFG externally on sides AC and BC, respectively. The midpoints of DE, FG, arc AC, and arc BC are M, N, P, and Q, respectively. If MP + NQ = 14, and AC + BC = 18, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect OP, OQ, because the midpoints of DE, FG, AC, and BC are respectively M, N, P, Q, therefore OP ⊥ AC, OQ ⊥ BC, therefore H, I are the midpoints of AC, BD, therefore OH + OI = 1/2 (AC + BC) = 9, since MH + NI = AC + BC = 18, MP + NQ = 14, therefore PH + QI = 18 - 14 = 4, therefore AB = OP + OQ = OH + OI + PH + QI = 9 + 4 = 13.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,点P是对角线BD的中点,点E、F分别是AB、CD的中点,AD=BC,∠FPE=136°,则∠PFE的度数是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵P是对角线BD的中点,E是AB的中点,∴EP=\frac{1}{2}AD,同理,FP=\frac{1}{2}BC,∵AD=BC,∴PE=PF,∵∠FPE=136°,∴∠PFE=∠PEF=22°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, point P is the midpoint of diagonal BD, points E and F are the midpoints of AB and CD respectively, AD = BC, ∠FPE = 136°, then the degree of ∠PFE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because P is the midpoint of the diagonal BD, and E is the midpoint of AB, therefore EP = 1/2 AD. Similarly, FP = 1/2 BC. Since AD = BC, therefore PE = PF. Given that ∠FPE = 136°, therefore ∠PFE = ∠PEF = 22°.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线d与它们分别垂直且相交于A,B,C三点,若AB=3,AC=8,则平行线b,c之间的距离是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵直线a∥b∥c,直线d与它们分别垂直且相交于A,B,C三点,∴AB长为直线a和b之间的距离,BC长为直线b和c之间的距离,AC长为直线a和c之间的距离,又∵AB=3,AC=8,∴BC=8-3=5,即直线b与直线c之间的距离为5．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line a ∥ b ∥ c, line d is perpendicular to them and intersects at points A, B, C respectively. If AB = 3, AC = 8, then the distance between the parallel lines b and c is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because lines a, b, and c are parallel, and line d is perpendicular to them and intersects at points A, B, and C, therefore the length of AB is the distance between lines a and b, the length of BC is the distance between lines b and c, and the length of AC is the distance between lines a and c. Given that AB = 3, AC = 8, therefore BC = 8 - 3 = 5, which means the distance between line b and line c is 5.

question: 如图,已知∠1＋∠2=100°,则∠3=()．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠1 + ∠2 = 100°, then ∠3 = ().
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 + ∠2 = 100°, and ∠1 = ∠2, therefore ∠1 = 50°, thus ∠3 = 180° - ∠1 = 130°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,有一池塘,要测池塘两端A,B间的距离,可先在平地上取一个不经过池塘可以直接到达点A和B的点C,连接AC并延长至D,使CD=CA,连接BC并延长至E,使CE=CB,连接ED．若量出DE=58米,则A,B间的距离为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, there is a pond. To measure the distance between points A and B at the ends of the pond, one can first take a point C on flat ground that does not pass through the pond and can directly reach points A and B, connect AC and extend it to D, making CD = CA, connect BC and extend it to E, making CE = CB, connect ED. If DE is measured to be 58 meters, then the distance between A and B is ()
answer_cot_en: In △ABC and △DEC, AC = CD and ∠ACD = ∠DCE, BC = CE, therefore △ABC is congruent to △DEC (SAS), thus AB = DE = 58 meters. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,平行线a、b被直线c所截,若∠1=50°,则∠2的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, parallel lines a and b are intersected by line c. If ∠1 = 50°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line a is parallel to b, ∠1 = 50°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 50°, thus ∠2 = 180° - ∠3 = 180° - 50° = 130°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知∠1=60°,∠A+∠B+∠C+∠D+∠E+∠F=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠1 = 60°, ∠A + ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E + ∠F = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 + ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E = 180°, ∠1 + ∠A + ∠F = 180°, and ∠1 = 60°, therefore ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E = 120°, ∠A + ∠F = 120°, thus ∠A + ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E + ∠F = 240°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,等腰三角形ABC中,AB=AC,BD是AC边上的高,若∠A=36°,则∠DBC的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the isosceles triangle ABC, AB = AC, BD is the height on side AC. If ∠A = 36°, then the size of ∠DBC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 72°. Since BD is the height on side AC, therefore BD ⊥ AC, thus ∠DBC = 90° - 72° = 18°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,若a∥b,∠1=115°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if a ∥ b, ∠1 = 115°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because a is parallel to b, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 180°. Given that ∠1 = 115°, therefore ∠2 = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中∠A=80°．点D是BC延长线上一点,∠ACD=150°,则∠B=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 80°. Point D is a point on the extension line of BC, ∠ACD = 150°, then ∠B = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACD = ∠A + ∠B, ∠A = 80°, ∠ACD = 150°, therefore ∠B = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,a∥b,点B在直线a上,且AB⊥BC,∠1=35°,那么∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, point B is on line a, and AB ⊥ BC, ∠1 = 35°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because AB ⊥ BC, ∠1 = 35°, therefore ∠3 = 90° - 35° = 55°. Since a is parallel to b, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线AB与CD相交于E,在∠CEB的平分线上有一点F,FM∥AB．当∠3=10°时,∠F的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line AB intersects CD at E, there is a point F on the bisector of ∠CEB, FM ∥ AB. When ∠3 = 10°, the degree of ∠F is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠3 = 180°, and ∠3 = 10°, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 170°, that is ∠CEB = 170°. Since EF bisects ∠CEB, therefore ∠1 = ∠2 = 85°, thus FM ∥ AB, therefore ∠F = ∠2 = 85°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知直线a、b被直线c所截．若a∥b,∠1=120°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that lines a and b are intersected by line c. If a ∥ b, ∠1 = 120°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, ∠3 = 180° - ∠1 = 180° - 120° = 60°. Since a is parallel to b, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,C、D是以线段AB为直径的⊙O上两点,若CA=CD,且∠CAB=25°,则∠ACD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on ⊙O with the line segment AB as the diameter. If CA = CD, and ∠CAB = 25°, then the degree of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD is the diameter, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠CAB = 25°, therefore ∠ABC = 65°, thus ∠ADC = 65°. Since CA = CD, therefore ∠CAD = ∠ADC = 65°, thus ∠ACD = 180° - 2×65° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥EF,CD⊥EF于点D,若∠BCD=140°,则∠ABC的度数为()
answer_cot: 过点C作CG//AB,由题意可得:AB//EF//CG,故∠B=∠BCG,∵CD⊥EF于点D,∴∠GCD=90°∵∠BCD=140°.∴∠BCG=50^{°},∴∠ABC=50^{°},故选:B.
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ EF, CD ⊥ EF at point D, if ∠BCD = 140°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw line CG through point C parallel to AB, according to the problem, we have AB // EF // CG, hence ∠B = ∠BCG. Since CD is perpendicular to EF at point D, therefore ∠GCD = 90°. Given that ∠BCD = 140°, therefore ∠BCG = 50°, thus ∠ABC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=40°,过点C作CD∥AB,∠ACD=65°,则∠ACB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = 40°, through point C draw CD ∥ AB, ∠ACD = 65°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD ∥ AB, therefore ∠A = ∠ACD = 65°, thus ∠ACB = 180° - ∠A - ∠B = 180° - 65° - 40° = 75°, that is, the degree of ∠ACB is 75°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 将一副直角三角板如图放置,使含30°角的三角板的直角边和含45°角的三角板的一条直角边在同一条直线上,则∠1的度数为()
answer_cot: 方法一:∠1的对顶角所在的三角形中另两个角的度数分别为60°,45°,∴∠1=180°-(60°+45°)=75°.方法二:∠1可看作是某个三角形的外角,根据三角形的外角等于与它不相邻的两个内角的和计算.故选A.
question_en: Place a pair of right-angled triangles as shown in the figure, so that the right-angled side of the triangle containing the 30° angle and one of the right-angled sides of the triangle containing the 45° angle are on the same line, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Method one: In the triangle where the vertical angle of ∠1 is located, the degrees of the other two angles are 60° and 45°, therefore ∠1 = 180° - (60° + 45°) = 75°. Method two: ∠1 can be considered as an exterior angle of a triangle, calculated based on the principle that the exterior angle of a triangle equals the sum of the two non-adjacent interior angles. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 已知直线a∥b,一块直角三角板如图所示放置,若∠1=37°,则∠2的度数是()
question_en: Given that line a is parallel to line b, and a right-angled triangle board is placed as shown in the figure, if ∠1 = 37°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw line AB parallel to a, because a is parallel to b, therefore AB is parallel to a and b. Since AB is parallel to a, therefore ∠1 = ∠3. Since AB is parallel to b, therefore ∠2 = ∠4. Because ∠3 + ∠4 = 90°, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 90°. Given that ∠1 = 37°, therefore ∠2 = 90° - 37° = 53°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,矩形ABCD的对角线AC、BD相交于点O,CE∥BD,DE∥AC,若AB=4,BC=3,则四边形CODE的周长是()
answer_cot: 首先由CE||BD,DE||AC,可证得四边形CODE是平行四边形,又由四边形ABCD是矩形,根据矩形的性质,易得OC=OD=2,即可判定四边形CODE是菱形,继而求得答案.解:∵CE||BD1DE||AC,∴四边形CODE是平行四边形,.四边形ABCD是矩形,∴AC=BD=4,OA=OC,OB=OD,∴OD=OC,AC=√{AB²+BC²}=√{4²+3²}=5.∴四边形CODE是菱形,且OC=\frac{1}{2}AC=2.5∴四边形CODE的周长为:2.5×4=10.故选A
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals AC and BD of rectangle ABCD intersect at point O, CE ∥ BD, DE ∥ AC, if AB = 4, BC = 3, then the perimeter of quadrilateral CODE is ()
answer_cot_en: Firstly, since CE || BD and DE || AC, it can be proven that quadrilateral CODE is a parallelogram. Also, since quadrilateral ABCD is a rectangle, according to the properties of a rectangle, it is easy to conclude that OC = OD = 2, which can determine that quadrilateral CODE is a rhombus, and then the answer can be obtained. Solution: Because CE || BD and DE || AC, therefore quadrilateral CODE is a parallelogram. Quadrilateral ABCD is a rectangle, therefore AC = BD = 4, OA = OC, OB = OD, therefore OD = OC, AC = √{AB² + BC²} = √{4² + 3²} = 5. Therefore, quadrilateral CODE is a rhombus, and OC = 1/2 AC = 2.5. Therefore, the perimeter of quadrilateral CODE is: 2.5 × 4 = 10. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,将含30°角的三角板的直角顶点放在直尺的一边上,若∠1=35°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when the right-angle vertex of the triangular plate with a 30° angle is placed on one side of the ruler, if ∠1 = 35°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because ∠1 = 35°, ∠3 = 30°, therefore ∠4 = 115°. Since ∠2 + ∠4 = 180°, therefore ∠2 = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,F是AD上的一点,CF=CD.若∠B=72°,则∠AFC的度数是()
answer_cot: 已知四边形ABCD是平行四边形,根据平行四边形的性质可得∠D=∠B=72°,再因CF=CD,根据等腰三角形的性质可得∠DFC=∠D=72°,所以∠AFC=180°∠DFC=108°1故选B
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, F is a point on AD, CF = CD. If ∠B = 72°, then the degree of ∠AFC is ()
answer_cot_en: Given that quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, according to the properties of a parallelogram, we know that ∠D = ∠B = 72°. Also, since CF = CD, according to the properties of an isosceles triangle, we know that ∠DFC = ∠D = 72°. Therefore, ∠AFC = 180° - ∠DFC = 108°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 从棱长为4的正方体毛坯的一角,挖去一个棱长为2的小正方体,得到一个如图所示的零件,则这个零件的表面积为()
answer_cot: 棱长为4的正方体毛坯的一角挖去一个棱长为2的小正方体,得到的图形与原图形表面积相等,则表面积是4×4×6=96,故答案为:96
question_en: From a cube blank with an edge length of 4, a small cube with an edge length of 2 is removed from one corner, resulting in a part as shown in the figure, then the surface area of this part is ()
answer_cot_en: A small cube with an edge length of 2 is cut from the corner of a raw cube with an edge length of 4. The surface area of the resulting figure is equal to the original figure, which is 4×4×6=96. Hence, the answer is: 96.

question: 如图,点B,O,D在同一直线上,若∠1=15°,∠2=105°,则∠AOC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points B, O, and D are on the same straight line. If ∠1 = 15°, ∠2 = 105°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠2 = 105°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - ∠2 = 75°. Thus ∠AOC = ∠1 + ∠BOC = 15° + 75° = 90°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,将两块三角板的直角顶点重合后叠放在一起,若∠1=40°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, after overlapping two set squares with their right-angle vertices coinciding, if ∠1 = 40°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Because ∠1 + ∠BOC = 90°, and ∠2 + ∠BOC = 90°, therefore ∠2 = ∠1 = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,一辆汽车经过一段公路两次拐弯后,和原来的行驶方向相同,也就是拐弯前后的两条路互相平行.第一次拐的角∠B等于142°,第二次拐的角∠C的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵拐弯前后的两条路互相平行,∴∠C=∠B=142°(两直线平行,内错角相等).故选B
question_en: As shown in the figure, a car after turning twice on a section of the road, is in the same driving direction as before, which means the two roads before and after the turn are parallel to each other. The angle of the first turn ∠B is 142°, then the degree of the second turn ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the two roads before and after the turn are parallel to each other, therefore ∠C = ∠B = 142° (when two lines are parallel, the alternate interior angles are equal). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AD平分∠BAC交BC于D,DE垂直AB于E,若DE=1.5cm,BD=3cm,则BC=()
answer_cot: ∠ACB=90^{°},DE垂直AB于E,AD平分∠BAC交BC于D,所以DC=DE=1.5.BD=3cm∴BC=4.5cm所以选D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AD bisects ∠BAC and intersects BC at D, DE is perpendicular to AB at E. If DE = 1.5 cm, BD = 3 cm, then BC = ()
answer_cot_en: ∠ACB = 90°, DE is perpendicular to AB at E, AD bisects ∠BAC and intersects BC at D, so DC = DE = 1.5. BD = 3cm, therefore BC = 4.5cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,AB=AC,AD=AE,∠BAC=∠DAE,∠1=25°,∠2=30°,则∠3=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB = AC, AD = AE, ∠BAC = ∠DAE, ∠1 = 25°, ∠2 = 30°, then ∠3 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAC = ∠DAE, therefore ∠BAC - ∠DAC = ∠DAE - ∠DAC, thus ∠1 = ∠EAC. In △BAD and △EAC, AB = AC, ∠BAD = ∠EAC, and AD = AE, therefore △BAD ≌ △EAC (SAS). ∠2 = ∠ABD = 30°, since ∠1 = 25°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 + ∠ABD = 25° + 30° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=46°,∠C=54°,AD平分∠BAC,交BC于D,则∠BAD的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = 46°, ∠C = 54°, AD bisects ∠BAC, and intersects BC at D, then the size of ∠BAD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠B = 46° and ∠C = 54°. ∠BAC = 180° - ∠B - ∠C = 180° - 46° - 54° = 80°, AD bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠BAD = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知D为BC上一点,∠B=∠1,∠BAC=78°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that D is a point on BC, ∠B = ∠1, ∠BAC = 78°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠2 = ∠B + ∠BAD, and ∠BAC = ∠1 + ∠BAD, and since ∠B = ∠1, therefore ∠2 = ∠BAC. Given that ∠BAC = 78°, therefore ∠2 = 78°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,沿CD折叠△CBD,使点B恰好落在AC边上的点E处．若∠A=24°,则∠BDC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, fold △CBD along CD so that point B falls exactly on point E on side AC. If ∠A = 24°, then the degree of ∠BDC is ()
answer_cot_en: In △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠A = 24°, ∠B = 90° - ∠A = 66°. By the property of folding, we can get: ∠BCD = 1/2 ∠ACB = 45°. Therefore, ∠BDC = 180° - ∠BCD - ∠B = 69°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,DE为△ABC的边BC的垂直平分线,交BC于E,交AB于D,且∠B=40°,∠A=60°,则∠ACD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE is the perpendicular bisector of side BC of △ABC, intersects BC at E, intersects AB at D, and ∠B = 40°, ∠A = 60°, then the degree of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠B = 40°, ∠A = 60°, therefore ∠ACB = 180° - 60° - 40° = 80°. Since DE is the perpendicular bisector of side BC of △ABC, therefore ∠BCD = ∠B = 40°, thus ∠ACD = ∠ACB - ∠BCD = 80° - 40° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在半径为5cm的⊙O中,AB为一条弦,OC⊥AB于点C,且OC=3cm,则AB的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O with a radius of 5 cm, AB is a chord, OC ⊥ AB at point C, and OC = 3 cm, then the value of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, OC ⊥ AB, point O is the center of the circle, therefore AB = 2AC, ∠ACO = 90°, thus AC = √{OA² - OC²} = √{5² - 3²} = 4cm, therefore AB = 8cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 已知如图,在⊙O中,OA⊥OB,∠A=35°,则弧CD的度数为()
question_en: As known from the figure, in ⊙O, OA ⊥ OB, ∠A = 35°, then the degree measure of arc CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because OA ⊥ OB, therefore ∠AOB = 90°. Since ∠A = 35°, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = 55°. Thus OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = 55°, thus ∠COB = 70°. Therefore, the degree of arc CD is 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE是AC的垂直平分线,AE=3cm,△ABD的周长为13cm,则△ABC的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE是AC的垂直平分线,AE=3cm,∴AE=CE=3cm,AD=DC,又△ABD的周长为13cm,即AB+BD+AD=13cm,△ABC的周长=AB+BC+AC=AB+BD+DC+2AE=AB+BD+AD+2AE=13+6=19cm故选C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE is the perpendicular bisector of AC, AE = 3 cm, the perimeter of △ABD is 13 cm, then the perimeter of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE is the perpendicular bisector of AC, AE = 3cm, therefore AE = CE = 3cm, AD = DC. Also, the perimeter of △ABD is 13cm, that is AB + BD + AD = 13cm. The perimeter of △ABC = AB + BC + AC = AB + BD + DC + 2AE = AB + BD + AD + 2AE = 13 + 6 = 19cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊿ABC内接于⊙O,若∠OAB=28°则∠C的大小为()
answer_cot: 连接OB,∵OA=OB,∠OAB=28°∠OBA=∠OAB=28°,∴∠AOB=180°-28°-28°=124°,∵∠ACB、∠AOB是\hat{AB}所对的圆周角和圆心角,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=62^{°},故选C
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊿ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, if ∠OAB = 28°, then the size of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, because OA = OB, ∠OAB = 28°, ∠OBA = ∠OAB = 28°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 28° - 28° = 124°. Since ∠ACB and ∠AOB are the inscribed angle and central angle on the same arc AB, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 62°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知PA、PB是⊙O的切线,A、B为切点,AC是⊙O的直径,∠P=40°,则∠BAC的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接BC,OB,AC是直径,则∠ABC=90°PA、PB是⊙O的切线,A、B为切点,则∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=140°由圆周角定理知,∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=70^{°},∴∠BAC=90°-∠C=20°.故选B.
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠P = 40°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, OB, AC is the diameter, then ∠ABC = 90°. PA, PB are tangents to ⊙O, A, B are the points of tangency, then ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 140°. According to the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 70°, therefore ∠BAC = 90° - ∠C = 20°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠B=90°,AB=6,AC=10将△ABC沿ED折叠,使点C与点A重合,则△ABE的周长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠B = 90°, AB = 6, AC = 10. Fold △ABC along ED so that point C coincides with point A, then the perimeter of △ABE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: In right triangle △ABC, BC = √{AC² - AB²} = √{10² - 6²} = 8cm. Since AE = EC, therefore the perimeter of △ABE = AB + BE + AE = AB + BE + EC = AB + BC = 6 + 8 = 14(cm). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,一把矩形直尺沿直线断开并错位,点E、D、B、F在同一条直线上,若∠ADE=125°,则∠DBC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a rectangular ruler is broken along a straight line and misaligned, points E, D, B, and F are on the same straight line, if ∠ADE = 125°, then the degree of ∠DBC is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend CB, because AD is parallel to CB, therefore ∠1 = ∠ADE = 145°, thus ∠DBC = 180° - ∠1 = 180° - 125° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,圆心角∠AOB=60∘,则圆周角∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the central angle ∠AOB = 60°, then the degree of the inscribed angle ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB = 60°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠A=90°,AB=AC,BD平分∠ABE,DE⊥BC,如果BC=10cm,则△DEC的周长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 90°, AB = AC, BD bisects ∠ABE, DE ⊥ BC, if BC = 10 cm, then the perimeter of △DEC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BD bisects ∠ABE, DE ⊥ BC, DA ⊥ AB and AD = DE. Also, since BD = BD, therefore △BAD ≌ △BED (HL), AB = BE. Also, since AB = AC, BE = AC. BC = BE + EC = AC + EC = AD + DC + EC = DE + DC + EC = 10cm. Therefore, the perimeter of △DEC is 10cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,圆外切等腰梯形ABCD的中位线EF=15cm,那么等腰梯形ABCD的周长等于()
answer_cot: 根据梯形的中位线等于两底和的一,得梯形的两底和等于梯形的中位线的2倍,即30cm;根据圆外切四边形的两组对边和相等,得梯形的两腰的和等于两底和,即30cm.则梯形的周长等于30+30=60(cm).故选:D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, the midline EF of the circumscribed isosceles trapezoid ABCD is 15 cm, then the perimeter of the isosceles trapezoid ABCD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: According to the median of the trapezoid being equal to the half sum of the bases, the sum of the bases of the trapezoid is twice the median, which is 30cm; according to the sum of the opposite sides of the circumscribed quadrilateral being equal, the sum of the two legs of the trapezoid is equal to the sum of the bases, which is 30cm. Therefore, the perimeter of the trapezoid is 30 + 30 = 60(cm). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,若CB=4cm,DB=7cm,且D是AC的中点,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if CB = 4 cm, DB = 7 cm, and D is the midpoint of AC, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CB = 4cm, DB = 7cm, therefore CD = 7 - 4 = 3cm; Since D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AD = CD = 3cm, thus AC = AD + DC = 3 + 3 = 6cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC=120°,若DE、FG分别垂直平分AB、BC,那么∠EBF的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ABC = 120°, if DE and FG are the perpendicular bisectors of AB and BC respectively, then the degree of ∠EBF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE and FG respectively bisect AB and BC perpendicularly, therefore AE = BE, BF = CF, therefore ∠A = ∠ABE, ∠C = ∠CBF. Since ∠A + ∠C + ∠ABC = 180°, and ∠ABC = 120°, therefore ∠A + ∠C = 60°. Thus ∠ABE + ∠CBF = 60°. Therefore ∠EBF = 120° - 60° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,将△ABC绕点A顺时针旋转90°后得到△AB′C′(点B的对应点是点B′,点C的对应点是点C′),连接CC′,若∠CC′B′=33°,则∠B的大小是()
answer_cot: ∵将△ABC绕点A顺时针旋转90°后得到△AB'C'∴AC=AC',∠CAC'=90°,∠AB'C'=∠B∴∠ACC'=45°∵∠AB'C'=∠ACC'+∠CC'B'∴∠AB'C=45°+33°=78°∴∠B=78°故选D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, rotate △ABC 90° clockwise around point A to get △AB′C′ (the corresponding point of B is B′, the corresponding point of C is C′), connect CC′, if ∠CC′B′ = 33°, then the size of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because after rotating △ABC 90° clockwise around point A, we get △AB'C', therefore AC = AC', ∠CAC' = 90°, ∠AB'C' = ∠B, thus ∠ACC' = 45°. Since ∠AB'C' = ∠ACC' + ∠CC'B', therefore ∠AB'C = 45° + 33° = 78°. Hence, ∠B = 78°. Therefore, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,点C在线段AB上,点D是AC的中点,如果CD=3cm,AB=10cm,那么BC的长度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is on line segment AB, point D is the midpoint of AC, if CD = 3 cm, AB = 10 cm, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Because point D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AC = 2CD = 2×3 = 6cm, thus BC = AB - AC = 10 - 6 = 4cm.

question: 如图,AD是△ABC的中线,已知△ABD的周长为22cm,AB比AC长3cm,则△ACD的周长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由题意得,AB=AC+3,∵AD是△ABC的中线,∴BD=DC,∵△ABD的周长为22,∴AB+BD+AD=AC+3+DC+AD=22,则AC+DC+AD=19,∴△ACD的周长=AC+DC+AD=19(cm),
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD is the median of △ABC, it is known that the perimeter of △ABD is 22 cm, AB is 3 cm longer than AC, then the perimeter of △ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, AB = AC + 3, since AD is the median of △ABC, therefore BD = DC. Since the perimeter of △ABD is 22, therefore AB + BD + AD = AC + 3 + DC + AD = 22, then AC + DC + AD = 19, therefore the perimeter of △ACD = AC + DC + AD = 19(cm).

question: 如图,线段AB=20,C为AB的中点,D为CB上一点,E为DB的中点,且EB=3,则CD等于()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵E为DB的中点,且EB=3,∴BD=2BE=6,∵线段AB=20,C为AB的中点,∴CB=AC=10,∵CD=BC-BD∴CD=4
question_en: As shown in the figure, line segment AB = 20, C is the midpoint of AB, D is a point on CB, E is the midpoint of DB, and EB = 3, then CD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because E is the midpoint of DB, and EB = 3, therefore BD = 2BE = 6. Because the line segment AB = 20, and C is the midpoint of AB, therefore CB = AC = 10. Since CD = BC - BD, therefore CD = 4.

question: 如图,C,D是线段AB上两点．若CB=4cm,DB=7cm,且D是AC的中点,则AB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the line segment AB. If CB = 4 cm, DB = 7 cm, and D is the midpoint of AC, then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Because CB = 4cm, DB = 7cm, therefore CD = 7 - 4 = 3cm; Since D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AD = CD = 3cm, therefore AB = AD + DB = 3 + 7 = 10cm.

question: 如图,一辆超市购物车放置在水平地面上,其侧面四边形ABCD与地面某条水平线在同一平面内,且AB∥l,若∠A=93°,∠D=111°,则直线CD与l所夹锐角的度数为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:如图所示,根据题意可知直线CD与l所夹锐角即为∠AED,据题意可得∠ADE=180°-∠ADC=69°,∠DAE=180°-∠BAD=87°,∴∠AED=180°-∠ADE-∠DAE=24°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a supermarket shopping cart is placed on the horizontal ground, its side quadrilateral ABCD is in the same plane as a certain horizontal line on the ground, and AB ∥ l, if ∠A = 93°, ∠D = 111°, then the acute angle between line CD and l is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: As shown in the figure, according to the problem, the acute angle between line CD and l is ∠AED. From the problem, we can get ∠ADE = 180° - ∠ADC = 69°, ∠DAE = 180° - ∠BAD = 87°, therefore ∠AED = 180° - ∠ADE - ∠DAE = 24°.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=∠C,D为BC边上一点,E点在AC边上,∠ADE=∠AED,若∠BAD=24°,则∠CDE=()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵∠ADC是△ABD的外角,∴∠ADC=∠B+∠BAD=∠B+24°,∵∠AED是△CDE的外角,∴∠AED=∠C+∠EDC,∵∠B=∠C,∠ADE=∠AED,∴∠C+∠EDC=∠ADC-∠EDC=∠B+24°-∠EDC,解得∠EDC=12°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = ∠C, D is a point on side BC, E is a point on side AC, ∠ADE = ∠AED, if ∠BAD = 24°, then ∠CDE = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠ADC is the exterior angle of △ABD, therefore ∠ADC = ∠B + ∠BAD = ∠B + 24°. Because ∠AED is the exterior angle of △CDE, therefore ∠AED = ∠C + ∠EDC. Since ∠B = ∠C and ∠ADE = ∠AED, therefore ∠C + ∠EDC = ∠ADC - ∠EDC = ∠B + 24° - ∠EDC. The solution gives ∠EDC = 12°.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB于点D,交⊙O于点C,若半径为5,OD=3,则弦AB的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接AO,∵OC⊥AB,∴D为AB的中点,即AD=BD=\frac{1}{2}AB,在Rt△AOD中,OA=5,OD=3,根据勾股定理得:AD=√{AO²-DO²}=4,则AB=2AD=8．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB at point D, and intersects ⊙O at point C. If the radius is 5, OD = 3, then the length of chord AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect AO, because OC ⊥ AB, therefore D is the midpoint of AB, that is, AD = BD = 1/2 AB. In right triangle AOD, OA = 5, OD = 3, according to the Pythagorean theorem, we get: AD = √(AO² - DO²) = 4, then AB = 2AD = 8.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,O是圆心,弦CD⊥AB于E,AB=10,CD=8,则OE的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接OC,∵直径AB=10,∴OC=5,∵CD⊥AB,AB为直径,∴CD=2CE=8,∠OEC=90°,∴CE=4,由勾股定理得:OE=√{5²-4²}=3．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, O is the center of the circle, chord CD ⊥ AB at E, AB = 10, CD = 8, then the length of OE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Connect OC, because the diameter AB = 10, therefore OC = 5. Since CD ⊥ AB, and AB is the diameter, therefore CD = 2CE = 8, ∠OEC = 90°, therefore CE = 4. By the Pythagorean theorem, we get: OE = √{5² - 4²} = 3.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为OA=5,以A为圆心,OA为半径的弧交⊙O于B,C两点,则弦BC等于()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接AB,OB,∵⊙O的半径为OA=5,以A为圆心,OA为半径的弧交⊙O于B,C两点,∴OA=AB=OB,BC⊥OA,∴∠BOA=60°,∵BC⊥OA,∴BC=5√{3}．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is OA = 5. With A as the center and OA as the radius, the arc intersects ⊙O at points B and C, then the chord BC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect AB, OB, because the radius of ⊙O is OA = 5, the arc of the circle with A as the center and OA as the radius intersects ⊙O at points B and C, therefore OA = AB = OB, BC ⊥ OA, therefore ∠BOA = 60°. Since BC ⊥ OA, therefore BC = 5√3.

question: 如图,C、D是线段AB上两点,若BC=3cm,BD=5cm,且D是AC的中点,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the segment AB. If BC = 3 cm, BD = 5 cm, and D is the midpoint of AC, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BC = 3cm, BD = 5cm, therefore CD = BD - BC = 2cm. Since D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AC = 2CD = 4cm.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AB是弦,OC⊥AB,垂足为C,若AB=16,OC=6,则⊙O的直径等于()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵在⊙O中,AB是弦,OC⊥AB,垂足为C,AB=16,∴AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×16=8,在Rt△AOC中,∵OC=6,AC=8,∴OA=√{OC²+AC²}=√{6²+8²}=10,∴⊙O的直径=2OA=2×10=20．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AB is a chord, OC ⊥ AB, and the foot of the perpendicular is C. If AB = 16, OC = 6, then the diameter of ⊙O is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because in ⊙O, AB is a chord, OC ⊥ AB, with the foot of the perpendicular being C, and AB = 16, therefore AC = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 16 = 8. In right triangle AOC, because OC = 6, AC = 8, therefore OA = √(OC² + AC²) = √(6² + 8²) = 10, therefore the diameter of ⊙O = 2OA = 2 × 10 = 20.

question: 如图,在半径为10的⊙O中,半径OC垂直于弦AB于点D,AB=16,则CD的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接OA,∵半径OC垂直于弦AB,AB=16,∴AD=8,∠ADO=90°,∵OA=10,∴在Rt△ADO中,由勾股定理得:OD=6,∴CD=10-6=4,
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the circle ⊙O with a radius of 10, the radius OC is perpendicular to chord AB at point D, AB = 16, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect OA, because the radius OC is perpendicular to the chord AB, and AB = 16, therefore AD = 8, ∠ADO = 90°. Since OA = 10, therefore in right triangle ADO, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: OD = 6, therefore CD = 10 - 6 = 4.

question: 如图所示,P是⊙O的弦AB上的一点,AB=10cm,AP=4cm,OP=5cm,则⊙O的半径为cm．()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:过O作OD⊥AB,D为垂足,连接OB,∵AB=10cm,AP=4cm,∴BD=5cm,DP=1cm,在Rt△ODP中,OD=√{OP²-DP²}=√{5²-1²}=2√{6}；在Rt△ODB中,OB=√{OD²+BD²}=√{(2√{6})²+5²}=7cm．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on the chord AB of ⊙O, AB = 10 cm, AP = 4 cm, OP = 5 cm, then the radius of ⊙O is cm. ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Draw OD ⊥ AB through O, where D is the foot of the perpendicular, connect OB. Since AB = 10cm, AP = 4cm, therefore BD = 5cm, DP = 1cm. In right triangle ODP, OD = √{OP² - DP²} = √{5² - 1²} = 2√{6}; In right triangle ODB, OB = √{OD² + BD²} = √{(2√{6})² + 5²} = 7cm.

question: 如图,矩形与⊙O相交,若AB=4,BC=5,DE=3,则EF的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:作OM⊥BC于M,交EF于N点,则OM⊥EF．∵OM⊥BC,∴BM=CM=\frac{1}{2}BC=2.5,∴AM=AB+BM=6.5,由题意得:四边形ADNM是矩形,∴DN=AM=6.5,∴EN=3.5,∵ON⊥EF,∴EF=2EN=7,
question_en: As shown in the figure, the rectangle intersects with ⊙O. If AB = 4, BC = 5, DE = 3, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Draw OM ⊥ BC at M, intersecting EF at point N, then OM ⊥ EF. Because OM ⊥ BC, therefore BM = CM = 1/2 BC = 2.5, therefore AM = AB + BM = 6.5. From the problem, we know that quadrilateral ADNM is a rectangle, therefore DN = AM = 6.5, therefore EN = 3.5. Since ON ⊥ EF, therefore EF = 2EN = 7.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦,AB⊥CD,垂足为点E,连接OD、CB、AC,∠DOB=60°,EB=2,那么CD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord, AB ⊥ CD at point E. Connect OD, CB, and AC, ∠DOB = 60°, EB = 2, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠DOB = 60°, therefore ∠BCE = 30°. In right triangle BCE, since BE = 2, and ∠BCE = 30°, therefore BC = 4, CE = √{BC² - BE²} = √{4² - 2²} = 2√3. Since AB is the diameter of circle O, and AB ⊥ CD, therefore CD = 2CE = 4√3.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦,AB⊥CD于点E,若半径为5,OE=3,则CD的长是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦,AB⊥CD于点E,∴CE=\frac{1}{2}CD．在Rt△OCE中,∵OC=5,OE=3,∴CE=√{OC²-OE²}=√{5²-3²}=4,∴CD=2CE=8．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord, AB ⊥ CD at point E. If the radius is 5, OE = 3, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is the chord, and AB ⊥ CD at point E, therefore CE = 1/2 CD. In right triangle OCE, since OC = 5, OE = 3, therefore CE = √(OC² - OE²) = √(5² - 3²) = 4, therefore CD = 2CE = 8.

question: 如图,半径为5的圆O中,弦AB的长为8,则圆心O到弦AB的距离为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:连接AO,∵OC⊥AB,OC过O,∴AC=BC=\frac{1}{2}AB=4,在Rt△OAC中,由勾股定理得:OC=√{5²-4²}=3,
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the circle O with a radius of 5, the length of chord AB is 8, then the distance from the center O to chord AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect AO, because OC ⊥ AB and OC passes through O, therefore AC = BC = 1/2 AB = 4. In right triangle OAC, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: OC = √{5² - 4²} = 3.

question: 如图,AB=8cm,AD=BC=5cm,则CD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB = 8 cm, AD = BC = 5 cm, then CD equals ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 8cm, AD = 5cm, therefore BD = AB - AD = 3cm. Since BC = 5cm, therefore CD = CB - BD = 2cm.

question: 如图,C,D是线段AB上两点,若CB=4cm,DB=7cm,且D是AC的中点,则AB的长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the segment AB. If CB = 4 cm, DB = 7 cm, and D is the midpoint of AC, then the length of AB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Because CB = 4cm, DB = 7cm, therefore CD = 7 - 4 = 3cm; Since D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AD = CD = 3cm, therefore AB = AD + DB = 3 + 7 = 10cm.

question: 如图,点C在线段AB上,点E是AC中点,点D是BC中点．若ED=6,则线段AB的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵点E是AC中点,点D是BC中点,∴AE=CE=\frac{1}{2}AC,CD=BD=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴CE+CD=\frac{1}{2}AC+\frac{1}{2}BC,即ED=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴AB=2ED=12；
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is on line segment AB, point E is the midpoint of AC, point D is the midpoint of BC. If ED = 6, then the length of line segment AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because point E is the midpoint of AC, and point D is the midpoint of BC, therefore AE = CE = 1/2 AC, and CD = BD = 1/2 BC, thus CE + CD = 1/2 AC + 1/2 BC, that is, ED = 1/2 (AC + BC) = 1/2 AB, therefore AB = 2ED = 12.

question: 如图,已知∠1=40°,∠A+∠B=140°,则∠C+∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠1 = 40°, ∠A + ∠B = 140°, then the degree of ∠C + ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Connect CD, as shown in the figure: Because ∠1 = 40°, ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠3 = 180°, therefore ∠2 + ∠3 = 180° - 40° = 140°. Because ∠A + ∠B + ∠ADC + ∠BCD = 360°, ∠A + ∠B = 140°, therefore ∠ADC + ∠BCD = 360° - 140° = 220°. Therefore, ∠BCE + ∠ADE = (∠ADC + ∠BCD) - (∠2 + ∠3) = 220° - 140° = 80°.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD的对角线AC⊥BD,垂足为O,且AC=12,BD=9,则四边形ABCD的面积是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals AC and BD of quadrilateral ABCD are perpendicular to each other at point O, and AC = 12, BD = 9, then the area of quadrilateral ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AC ⊥ BD, AC = 12, BD = 9, therefore the area of quadrilateral ABCD equals the sum of the areas of △AOD, △COD, △BOC, and △AOB, which equals 1/2 OA·OD + 1/2 OC·OD + 1/2 OC·OB + 1/2 OB·OA = 1/2 OD(OA + OC) + 1/2 OB(OA + OC) = 1/2 OD·AC + 1/2 OB·AC = 1/2 AC·(OD + OC) = 1/2 AC·BD = 1/2 × 12 × 9 = 54.

question: 如图,已知△ABC,点D在BC的延长线上,∠ACD=140°,∠ABC=50°,则∠A的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that △ABC, point D is on the extension line of BC, ∠ACD = 140°, ∠ABC = 50°, then the size of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Because ∠ACD = ∠A + ∠ABC, therefore ∠A = ∠ACD - ∠ABC. Given that ∠ACD = 140° and ∠ABC = 50°, therefore ∠A = 140° - 50° = 90°.

question: 如图,点O在直线AB上,若∠2=140°,则∠1的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point O is on the straight line AB, if ∠2 = 140°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠1 + ∠2 = 180° and ∠2 = 140°, therefore ∠1 = 40°.

question: 如图所示,线段AB=10,M为线段AB的中点,C为线段MB的中点,N为线段AM的一点,且MN=1,线段NC的长()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵线段AB=10,M为线段AB的中点,∴MB=\frac{1}{2}AB=5,∵C为线段MB的中点,∴MC=\frac{1}{2}BM=2.5,∴NC=NM+MC=3.5．
question_en: As shown in the figure, line segment AB = 10, M is the midpoint of line segment AB, C is the midpoint of line segment MB, N is a point on line segment AM, and MN = 1, the length of line segment NC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: Because line segment AB = 10, and M is the midpoint of line segment AB, therefore MB = 1/2 AB = 5. Since C is the midpoint of line segment MB, therefore MC = 1/2 BM = 2.5, thus NC = NM + MC = 3.5.

question: 设BF交AC于点P,AE交DF于点Q．若∠APB=126°,∠AQF=100°,则∠A-∠F=()
question_en: Let BF intersect AC at point P, AE intersect DF at point Q. If ∠APB = 126°, ∠AQF = 100°, then ∠A - ∠F = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Answer】Solution: As shown in the figure: Because ∠1 = ∠APB - ∠A = 126° - ∠A, ∠2 = 180° - ∠AQF - ∠F = 180° - 100° - ∠F = 80° - ∠F; Since ∠1 = ∠2, therefore 126° - ∠A = 80° - ∠F; Therefore, ∠A - ∠F = 46°.

question: 如图,BD,CE分别是△ABC的高线和角平分线,且相交与点O,若∠BCA=70°,则∠BOE的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD and CE are respectively the altitude and angle bisector of △ABC, and they intersect at point O. If ∠BCA = 70°, then the degree of ∠BOE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because B ⊥ AC, therefore ∠BDC = 90°. Since CE bisects ∠ACB, and ∠ACB = 70°, therefore ∠DCO = 35°, thus ∠BOE = ∠COD = 90° - 35° = 55°.

question: 如图,已知点A、B、C在同一直线上,AB=7,BC=3,点D为线段AC的中点,线段DB的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that points A, B, and C are on the same straight line, AB = 7, BC = 3, point D is the midpoint of line segment AC, the length of line segment DB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 7, BC = 3, therefore AC = AB + BC = 10. Since point D is the midpoint of line segment AC, therefore CD = 1/2 AC = 5, thus DB = CD - BC = 2.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,∠DAB的角平分线与∠ABC的外角平分线相交于点P,且∠∠D+∠C=200°,则∠P=()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:如图,∵∠D+∠C=200°,∠DAB+∠ABC+∠C+∠D=360°,∴∠DAB+∠ABC=160°．又∵∠DAB的角平分线与∠ABC的外角平分线相交于点P,∴∠PAB+∠ABP=\frac{1}{2}∠DAB+∠ABC+\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠ABC)=90°+\frac{1}{2}(∠DAB+∠ABC)=170°,∴∠P=180°-(∠PAB+∠ABP)=10°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, the angle bisector of ∠DAB and the external angle bisector of ∠ABC intersect at point P, and ∠D + ∠C = 200°, then ∠P = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】As shown in the figure, because ∠D + ∠C = 200°, ∠DAB + ∠ABC + ∠C + ∠D = 360°, therefore ∠DAB + ∠ABC = 160°. Also, because the bisector of ∠DAB intersects with the external bisector of ∠ABC at point P, therefore ∠PAB + ∠ABP = 1/2 ∠DAB + ∠ABC + 1/2 (180° - ∠ABC) = 90° + 1/2 (∠DAB + ∠ABC) = 170°, thus ∠P = 180° - (∠PAB + ∠ABP) = 10°.

question: 如图,BP平分∠ABC交CD于点F,DP平分∠ADC交AB于点E,若∠A=40°,∠P=38°,则∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BP bisects ∠ABC and intersects CD at point F, DP bisects ∠ADC and intersects AB at point E, if ∠A = 40°, ∠P = 38°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BP bisects ∠ABC, DP bisects ∠ADC, therefore ∠ADP = ∠PDF, ∠CBP = ∠PBA. Since ∠A + ∠ADP = ∠P + ∠ABP, ∠C + ∠CBP = ∠P + ∠PDF, therefore ∠A + ∠C = 2∠P. Given that ∠A = 40°, ∠P = 38°, therefore ∠C = 2×38° - 40° = 36°.

question: 如图,延长长度为8的线段AB到C,使BC=4,M、N分别是AB、BC的中点,则MN的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, extend the line segment AB with a length of 8 to C, making BC = 4, M and N are the midpoints of AB and BC, respectively, then the length of MN is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because M and N are the midpoints of AB and BC respectively, therefore MB = 1/2 AB = 4, BN = 1/2 BC = 2, thus MN = MB + BN = 4 + 2 = 6.

question: 如图,A,B,C,D四点都在⊙O上,∠BOD=110°,则∠BCD的度数为()
answer_cot: 由圆周角定理得,∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠BOD=55°,∵四边形ABCD是圆内接四边形,∴∠BCD=180°-∠A=125°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, C, and D are all on ⊙O, ∠BOD = 110°, then the degree of ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: From the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOD = 55°. Since quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral, therefore ∠BCD = 180° - ∠A = 125°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD为⊙O的内接四边形,∠BCD=110°,则∠BOD的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD为⊙O的内接四边形,∠BCD=110°,∴∠A=180°-∠BCD=70°,由圆周角定理得,∠BOD=2∠A=140°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, ∠BCD = 110°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in circle O, and ∠BCD = 110°, therefore ∠A = 180° - ∠BCD = 70°. According to the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠BOD = 2∠A = 140°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,某货船以24海里/时的速度从A处向正东方向的D处航行,在点A处测得某岛C在北偏东60°的方向．该货船航行30分钟后到达B处,此时测得该岛在北偏东30°的方向上．则货船在航行中离小岛C的最短距离是()
answer_cot: 作CE⊥AB交AB的延长线于E,由题意得,AB=24×\frac{1}{2}=12,∠CBE=60°,∠CAE=30°,∴∠ACB=30°,∴∠CAE=∠ACB,∴BC=AB=12,在Rt△CBE中,sin∠CBE=\frac{CE}{BC},∴CE=BC×sin∠CBE=12×\frac{√{3}}{2}=6√{3}(海里),故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a cargo ship sails from point A towards point D in the due east direction at a speed of 24 nautical miles per hour. At point A, an island C is observed to be in the direction of 60° northeast. After sailing for 30 minutes, the ship reaches point B, where the island is observed to be in the direction of 30° northeast. Then the shortest distance from the cargo ship to the island C during the voyage is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw CE ⊥ AB and intersect the extension line of AB at E. According to the problem, AB = 24 × 1/2 = 12, ∠CBE = 60°, ∠CAE = 30°, therefore ∠ACB = 30°, thus ∠CAE = ∠ACB, therefore BC = AB = 12. In right triangle CBE, sin∠CBE = CE/BC, therefore CE = BC × sin∠CBE = 12 × √3/2 = 6√3 (nautical miles). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA,PB切⊙O于点A,B,点C是⊙O上一点,且∠P=36°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 如图所示,连接OA、OB．p<(\phi,7)∵PA、PB都为圆O的切线,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°．∵∠P=36°,∴∠AOB=144°．∴∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}=72°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B, point C is a point on ⊙O, and ∠P = 36°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect OA, OB. p<(\phi,7) Because PA and PB are both tangents to circle O, therefore ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°. Since ∠P = 36°, therefore ∠AOB = 144°. Thus, ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 = 72°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A,B两点,∠C=55°,则∠P等于()
answer_cot: 连接OB、OA,如图,∵PA、PB分别与圆O相切于A、B两点,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P,∵∠C=55°,∴∠AOB=2∠C=110°,∴∠P=180°-110°=70°,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B respectively, ∠C = 55°, then ∠P is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, OA as shown in the figure. Because PA and PB are tangent to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, thus ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P. Given that ∠C = 55°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠C = 110°. Thus, ∠P = 180° - 110° = 70°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在边长为1的正方形网格中,连接格点D、N和E、C,DN和EC相交于点P,tan∠CPN为()
answer_cot: 连接格点MN、DM,如图所示:则四边形MNCE是平行四边形,△DAM和△MBN都是等腰直角三角形,∴EC∥MN,∠DMA=∠NMB=45°,DM=√{2}AD=2√{2},MN=√{2}BM=√{2},∴∠CPN=∠DNM,∴tan∠CPN=tan∠DNM,∵∠DMN=180°-∠DMA-∠NMB=180°-45°-45°=90°,∴tan∠CPN=tan∠DNM=\frac{DM}{MN}=\frac{2√{2}}{√{2}}=2,故选:B．\lbrack\frac{D}{M}\rbrack:\frac{c}{\omega}≥q\rbrace
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the square grid with side length 1, connect grid points D, N, and E, C. DN and EC intersect at point P, tan∠CPN is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect grid points MN, DM as shown in the figure: then quadrilateral MNCE is a parallelogram, △DAM and △MBN are both isosceles right triangles, therefore EC ∥ MN, ∠DMA = ∠NMB = 45°, DM = √2 AD = 2√2, MN = √2 BM = √2, therefore ∠CPN = ∠DNM, thus tan∠CPN = tan∠DNM. Since ∠DMN = 180° - ∠DMA - ∠NMB = 180° - 45° - 45° = 90°, therefore tan∠CPN = tan∠DNM = DM / MN = 2√2 / √2 = 2. Hence, the answer is: B. [D/M]: [c/ω] ≥ q.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AB=10,AC=8,则sinB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, AB = 10, AC = 8, then sinB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, in right triangle ABC, ∠C = 90°, AB = 10, AC = 8. Therefore, sinB = AC / AB = 8 / 10 = 4 / 5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的外切四边形,且AB=10,CD=12,则四边形ABCD的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是⊙O的外切四边形,∴AD+BC=AB+CD=22,∴四边形ABCD的周长=AD+BC+AB+CD=44,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is a circumscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, and AB = 10, CD = 12, then the perimeter of quadrilateral ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a circumscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, therefore AD + BC = AB + CD = 22, thus the perimeter of quadrilateral ABCD = AD + BC + AB + CD = 44. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 已知水平放置的圆柱形排水管道,管道截面半径是1m,若水面高0.2m．则排水管道截面的水面宽度为()
answer_cot: 作OC⊥AB于C,交⊙O于D,连接OB,如图所示:则AB=2BC,∠OCB=90°,OB=OD=1m,CD=0.2m,∴OC=OD-CD=0.8m,∴BC=√{0B^{2}-0c^{2}}=√{1^{2}-0.8^{2}}=0.6(m),∴AB=2AC=1.2m,∴排水管道截面的水面宽度为1.2m,故选:C．
question_en: Given a horizontally placed cylindrical drainage pipe with a cross-sectional radius of 1 m, if the water level is 0.2 m, then the width of the water surface in the cross-section of the drainage pipe is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw OC ⊥ AB at C, intersecting ⭕O at D, and connect OB, as shown in the figure: then AB = 2BC, ∠OCB = 90°, OB = OD = 1m, CD = 0.2m, therefore OC = OD - CD = 0.8m, therefore BC = √{OB² - OC²} = √{1² - 0.8²} = 0.6m, therefore AB = 2AC = 1.2m, therefore the width of the water surface in the cross section of the drainage pipe is 1.2m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上的三点,AB,AC的圆心O的两侧,若∠ABO=20°,∠ACO=30°,则∠BOC的度数为()
answer_cot: 过A作⊙O的直径,交⊙O于D．在△OAB中,OA=OB,则∠BOD=∠ABO+∠OAB=2×20°=40°,同理可得:∠COD=∠ACO+∠OAC=2×30°=60°,故∠BOC=∠BOD+∠COD=100°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, with AB and AC on opposite sides of the center O. If ∠ABO = 20°, ∠ACO = 30°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw a diameter of ⊙O through A, intersecting ⊙O at D. In △OAB, since OA = OB, then ∠BOD = ∠ABO + ∠OAB = 2×20° = 40°. Similarly, ∠COD = ∠ACO + ∠OAC = 2×30° = 60°. Therefore, ∠BOC = ∠BOD + ∠COD = 100°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在直角坐标系xOy中,点A在y轴正半轴上,点B、C在x正半轴上,且∠BAC=∠ACB=30°,AC=4,点D是x轴上的一个动点,点D关于直线AB、AC的对称点为E、F,则线段EF的最小值等于()
answer_cot: 如图,连接AD,AE．AF．由题意,AD=AE=AF,∠DAB=∠BAE,∠DAC=∠CAF,∵∠BAC=∠ACB=30°,AC=4,∠AOC=90°,∴OA=≥ft.\begin{array}{l}{x_{1}^{′}\cdots\cdots\cdotsf^{r}}\\{\frac{i}{o}:;}{√[3]{f}AC=2,∠OAC=60°,∠CAE+∠EAB=30°,∴∠EAF=∠CAE+∠CAF=∠CAE+∠CAE+∠DAE=2(∠CAE+∠BAE)=60°,∵AE=AF,∴△AEF是等边三角形,轨迹垂线段最短可知,当点D与O重合时,AD的值最小,∴AE的最小值=OA=2,∴EF的最小值为2,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the Cartesian coordinate system xOy, point A is on the positive half-axis of y, points B and C are on the positive half-axis of x, and ∠BAC = ∠ACB = 30°, AC = 4. Point D is a moving point on the x-axis, and the points E and F are the symmetric points of point D with respect to lines AB and AC, then the minimum value of the line segment EF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect AD, AE, and AF. According to the problem, AD = AE = AF, ∠DAB = ∠BAE, ∠DAC = ∠CAF. Since ∠BAC = ∠ACB = 30°, AC = 4, ∠AOC = 90°, therefore OA = 2. Given that ∠OAC = 60°, ∠CAE + ∠EAB = 30°, therefore ∠EAF = ∠CAE + ∠CAF = ∠CAE + ∠CAE + ∠DAE = 2(∠CAE + ∠BAE) = 60°. Since AE = AF, therefore △AEF is an equilateral triangle. From the trajectory of the perpendicular segment being the shortest, it is known that when point D coincides with O, the value of AD is the smallest, therefore the smallest value of AE = OA = 2, therefore the smallest value of EF is 2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,∠BAC=110°,若A,B关于直线MP对称,A,C关于直线NQ对称,则∠PAQ的大小是()
answer_cot: ∵∠BAC=110°,∴∠B+∠C=70°,∵A,B关于直线MP对称,A,C关于直线NQ对称,又∵MP,NQ为AB,AC的垂直平分线,∴∠BAP=∠B,∠QAC=∠C,∴∠BAP+∠CAQ=70°,∴∠PAQ=∠BAC-∠BAP-∠CAQ=110°-70°=40°故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠BAC = 110°, if A and B are symmetrical about line MP, A and C are symmetrical about line NQ, then the size of ∠PAQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAC = 110°, therefore ∠B + ∠C = 70°. Since A, B are symmetrical about line MP, and A, C are symmetrical about line NQ, and given that MP, NQ are the perpendicular bisectors of AB, AC, therefore ∠BAP = ∠B, ∠QAC = ∠C, thus ∠BAP + ∠CAQ = 70°, therefore ∠PAQ = ∠BAC - ∠BAP - ∠CAQ = 110° - 70° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,BE垂直平分AD,DC=BC,若∠A=70°,则∠C=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, BE perpendicularly bisects AD, DC = BC, if ∠A = 70°, then ∠C = ()
answer_cot_en: Because BE perpendicularly bisects AD, therefore AB = DB, thus ∠ABE = ∠DBE. Given that ∠A = 70°, therefore ∠ABE = 20°, thus ∠ABD = 40°. Since AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠CDB = ∠ABD = 40°. Given that DC = BC, therefore ∠C = 180° - 2×40° = 100°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=10cm,AC=18cm,点M从点A出发以每秒2cm的速度向点B运动,点N从点C出发以每秒3cm的速度向点A运动,其中一个动点到达端点,另一个动点也随之停止,当△AMN是以MN为底边的等腰三角形时,运动的时间是()
answer_cot: 设运动的时间为x,在△ABC中,AB=10cm,AC=18cm,点M从点A出发以每秒2cm的速度向点B运动,点N从点C出发以每秒3cm的速度向点A运动,当△AMN是等腰三角形时,AM=AN,AN=18-3x,AM=2x即18-3x=2x,解得x=3.6．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 10 cm, AC = 18 cm, point M starts from point A and moves towards point B at a speed of 2 cm per second, point N starts from point C and moves towards point A at a speed of 3 cm per second. When one of the moving points reaches the endpoint, the other moving point also stops. When △AMN is an isosceles triangle with MN as the base, the time of motion is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the time of motion be x. In △ABC, AB = 10cm, AC = 18cm. Point M starts from point A and moves towards point B at a speed of 2cm per second, while point N starts from point C and moves towards point A at a speed of 3cm per second. When △AMN is an isosceles triangle, AM = AN. AN = 18 - 3x, AM = 2x, so 18 - 3x = 2x. Solving this gives x = 3.6. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC=110°,AM=AN,CN=CP,则∠MNP=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ABC = 110°, AM = AN, CN = CP, then ∠MNP = ()

question: 如图,已知▱ABCD的四个内角的平分线分别相交于点E、F、G、H,连接AC．若EF=2,FG=GC=5,则AC的长是()
