answer_cot: 如图,作AP⊥CH交CH的延长线与P．∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,▱ABCD的四个内角的平分线分别相交于点E、F、G、H,∴易证四边形EFGH是矩形,四边形AEHP是矩形,△ABE≌△CDG,可得PA=FG=5,AE=PH=CG=5,CP=CG+PH+GH=2+10=12,在Rt△APC中,AC=∠\beta=∠ZZN=√{PA^{2}+PC^{2}}=13．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the bisectors of the four interior angles of rectangle ABCD intersect at points E, F, G, and H, respectively. Connect AC. If EF = 2, FG = GC = 5, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, construct AP ⊥ CH intersecting the extension of CH at P. Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, the bisectors of the four interior angles of ▱ABCD intersect at points E, F, G, H, therefore it is easy to prove that quadrilateral EFGH is a rectangle, quadrilateral AEHP is a rectangle, △ABE ≅ △CDG, it can be obtained that PA = FG = 5, AE = PH = CG = 5, CP = CG + PH + GH = 2 + 10 = 12, in right triangle △APC, AC = ∠β = ∠ZZN = √{PA² + PC²} = 13. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,▱ABCD中,点E、F分别在AD、AB上,依次连接EB、EC、FC、FD,图中阴影部分的面积分别为S~1~、S~2~、S~3~、S~4~,已知S~1~=2、S~2~=12、S~3~=3,则S~4~的值是()
answer_cot: 设平行四边形的面积为S,则S~△CBE~=S~△CDF~=\frac{1}{2}S,由图形可知,△CDF面积+△CBE面积+(S~1~+S~4~+S~3~)-S~2~=平行四边形ABCD的面积∴S=S~△CBE~+S~△CDF~+2+S~4~+3-12,即S=\frac{1}{2}S+\frac{1}{2}S+2+S~4~+3-12,解得S~4~=7,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, points E and F are on AD and AB respectively. Connect EB, EC, FC, and FD. The areas of the shaded parts in the figure are S~1~, S~2~, S~3~, and S~4~ respectively. It is known that S~1~ = 2, S~2~ = 12, S~3~ = 3, then the value of S~4~ is ()
answer_cot_en: Assume the area of the parallelogram is S, then the area of △CBE and △CDF is 1/2S. From the figure, we know that the sum of the areas of △CDF, △CBE, and (S1 + S4 + S3) minus S2 equals the area of parallelogram ABCD. Therefore, S = S△CBE + S△CDF + 2 + S4 + 3 - 12, which is S = 1/2S + 1/2S + 2 + S4 + 3 - 12. Solving this gives S4 = 7. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,对角线AC,BD相交于点O,点E,F分别是AB,AO的中点,连接EF,若EF=3,则BD的长为()
answer_cot: ∵点E,F分别是AB,AO的中点,连接EF,EF=3,∴EF是△OAB的中位线,则OB=2EF=6,∵在▱ABCD中,∴BD=2OB=12,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, points E and F are the midpoints of AB and AO respectively. Connect EF, if EF = 3, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because points E and F are the midpoints of AB and AO respectively, connect EF, EF = 3, therefore EF is the median of △OAB, then OB = 2EF = 6. Since in ▱ABCD, therefore BD = 2OB = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,▱ABCD的对角线AC,BD相交于O,EF经过点O,分别交AD,BC于E,F,已知▱ABCD的面积是20cm^2^,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,OA=OC,∴∠OAE=∠OCF,∵∠AOE=∠COF,∴△AOE≌△COF,∴S~阴~=S~△BOC~=\frac{1}{4}S~平行四边形ABCD~=5(cm^2^),故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals AC and BD of rectangle ABCD intersect at O, EF passes through point O, and intersects AD and BC at E and F, respectively. It is known that the area of rectangle ABCD is 20 cm², then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, and OA = OC, therefore ∠OAE = ∠OCF. Since ∠AOE = ∠COF, therefore △AOE ≅ △COF, thus the area of the shaded region equals the area of △BOC, which is 1/4 of the area of parallelogram ABCD, equals 5(cm²). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,∠BCD的平分线交AD于点E,交BA的延长线于点F,BF=4AF,BC=12,则AF的长度是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD为平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AB∥DC,AB=CD,AD=BC=12,∴∠DEC=∠ECB,∵CF平分∠BCD,∴∠ECD=∠ECB,∴∠DEC=∠ECD,∴DE=DC,∴AE=AD-DE=12-DE,∵BF∥CD,∴△AEF∽△DEC,∵BF=4AF,∴\frac{AF}{CD}=\frac{AE}{DE},即\frac{1}{3}=\frac{12-DE}{DE},则DE=9．∴DE=DC=AB=9,∴AF=3,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, the bisector of ∠BCD intersects AD at point E, and intersects the extension line of BA at point F, BF = 4AF, BC = 12, then the length of AF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, AB ∥ DC, AB = CD, AD = BC = 12, therefore ∠DEC = ∠ECB. Since CF bisects ∠BCD, therefore ∠ECD = ∠ECB, thus ∠DEC = ∠ECD, therefore DE = DC, therefore AE = AD - DE = 12 - DE. Since BF ∥ CD, therefore △AEF ∽ △DEC. Since BF = 4AF, therefore AF/CD = AE/DE, that is 1/3 = (12 - DE) / DE, then DE = 9. Therefore DE = DC = AB = 9, therefore AF = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=10cm,AD=15cm,AC、BD相交于点O．OE⊥BD交AD于E,则△ABE的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵在▱ABCD中,点O是BD中点,EO⊥BD,∴EO是线段BD的中垂线,∴BE=ED,∴△ABE的周长=AB+AE+BE=AB+AD=10+15=25(cm)．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 10 cm, AD = 15 cm, AC and BD intersect at point O. OE ⊥ BD intersects AD at E, then the perimeter of △ABE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in square ABCD, point O is the midpoint of BD, and EO is perpendicular to BD, therefore EO is the perpendicular bisector of line segment BD, therefore BE = ED, therefore the perimeter of △ABE = AB + AE + BE = AB + AD = 10 + 15 = 25(cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,E,F分别是AD,BC的中点,P是边DC上的动点,G,H分别是PE,PF的中点,已知DC=10cm,则GH的长是()
answer_cot: 连接EF,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AD=BD,AD∥BC,∵E,F分别是AD,BC的中点,∴AE=BF,∴四边形ABFE是平行四边形,∴AB=EF=10cm,∵G,H分别是PE,PF的中点,∴GH是△PEF的中位线,∴GH=\frac{1}{2}EF=\frac{1}{2}×10=5cm,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E and F are the midpoints of AD and BC, respectively, P is a moving point on side DC, G and H are the midpoints of PE and PF, respectively, given that DC = 10 cm, then the length of GH is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect EF, because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, AD = BD, and AD ∥ BC. Since E and F are the midpoints of AD and BC respectively, therefore AE = BF, thus quadrilateral ABFE is a parallelogram, therefore AB = EF = 10cm. Since G and H are the midpoints of PE and PF respectively, therefore GH is the median of △PEF, thus GH = 1/2 EF = 1/2 × 10 = 5cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,对角线AC、BD相交于点O,点E是边CD的中点,连接OE．若平行四边形ABCD的周长为24,BD=8,则△DOE的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵平行四边形ABCD的周长为24,∴BC+CD=12．∵O是BD中点,E是CD中点,∴OE=\frac{1}{2}BC,DE=\frac{1}{2}CD,OD=\frac{1}{2}BD=4∴△DOE周长=OE+DE+OD=6+4=10．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, point E is the midpoint of side CD, connect OE. If the perimeter of the parallelogram ABCD is 24, BD = 8, then the perimeter of △DOE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD is 24, therefore BC + CD = 12. Since O is the midpoint of BD, and E is the midpoint of CD, therefore OE = 1/2 BC, DE = 1/2 CD, OD = 1/2 BD = 4. Therefore, the perimeter of △DOE = OE + DE + OD = 6 + 4 = 10. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,点E是AB边上一点,连接DE、CE．若DE、CE分别是∠ADC、∠BCD的角平分线,且AB=4,则平行四边形ABCD的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE、CE分别是∠ADC、∠BCD的平分线,∴∠ADE=∠CDE,∠DCE=∠BCE,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥DC,AD=BC,CD=AB=4,∴∠CDE=∠DEA,∠DCE=∠CEB,∴∠ADE=∠AED,∠BCE=∠CEB,∴AD=AE,BE=BC,∴AD+BC=AE+BE=AB=4,∴平行四边形ABCD的周长=2(AB+AD)=3AB=12；故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, point E is a point on side AB, connect DE and CE. If DE and CE are the angle bisectors of ∠ADC and ∠BCD respectively, and AB = 4, then the perimeter of the parallelogram ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE and CE are the bisectors of ∠ADC and ∠BCD respectively, therefore ∠ADE = ∠CDE, ∠DCE = ∠BCE. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ DC, AD = BC, CD = AB = 4, therefore ∠CDE = ∠DEA, ∠DCE = ∠CEB, therefore ∠ADE = ∠AED, ∠BCE = ∠CEB, therefore AD = AE, BE = BC, therefore AD + BC = AE + BE = AB = 4, therefore the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD = 2(AB + AD) = 3AB = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,过三角形内一点分别作三边的平行线,如果三角形的周长为6cm,则图中三个阴影三角形的周长和为()
answer_cot: ∵EN∥BC,PM∥AB,DQ∥AC,∴四边形EFBP,FQCN,ADFM是平行四边形,∴DF=AM,FM=AD,EF=BP,PF=BE,FQ=NC,FN=CQ,∴三个阴影三角形的周长和为:DE+EF+FD+FM+FN+MN+FP+PQ+FQ=DE+BP+AM+AD+QC+MN+BE+PQ+NC=(AD+DE+BE)+(BP+PQ+CQ)+(NC+MN+AM)=AB+BC+AC=6(cm)．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, if a point inside a triangle is used to draw parallel lines to the three sides of the triangle, and the perimeter of the triangle is 6 cm, then the sum of the perimeters of the three shaded triangles in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Because EN ∥ BC, PM ∥ AB, DQ ∥ AC, therefore quadrilaterals EFBP, FQCN, ADFM are parallelograms, thus DF = AM, FM = AD, EF = BP, PF = BE, FQ = NC, FN = CQ. Therefore, the sum of the perimeters of the three shaded triangles is: DE + EF + FD + FM + FN + MN + FP + PQ + FQ = DE + BP + AM + AD + QC + MN + BE + PQ + NC = (AD + DE + BE) + (BP + PQ + CQ) + (NC + MN + AM) = AB + BC + AC = 6(cm). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,过顶点A的直线DE∥BC,∠ABC、∠ACB的平分线分别交DE于点E、D,若AC=3,AB=4,则DE的长为()
answer_cot: 由分析得:∠EBC=∠ABE,∠ACD=∠DCB；根据平行线的性质得:∠DCB=∠CDE,∠EBC=∠BED；所以∠ADC=∠ACD,∠ABE=∠AEB,则AD=AC,AB=AE；所以DE=AD+AE=AB+AC=3+4=7；故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the straight line DE through vertex A is parallel to BC, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect DE at points E and D respectively. If AC = 3, AB = 4, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: From the analysis, we have: ∠EBC = ∠ABE, ∠ACD = ∠DCB; According to the properties of parallel lines, we have: ∠DCB = ∠CDE, ∠EBC = ∠BED; Therefore, ∠ADC = ∠ACD, ∠ABE = ∠AEB, then AD = AC, AB = AE; Therefore, DE = AD + AE = AB + AC = 3 + 4 = 7; Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示．△ABC中,∠B=∠C,D在BC上,∠BAD=50°,AE=AD,则∠EDC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = ∠C, D is on BC, ∠BAD = 50°, AE = AD, then the degree of ∠EDC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AED = ∠EDC + ∠C, ∠ADC = ∠B + ∠BAD. Since AD = AE, therefore ∠AED = ∠ADE. Since ∠B = ∠C, therefore ∠B + ∠BAD = ∠EDC + ∠C + ∠EDC, that is, ∠BAD = 2∠EDC. Given that ∠BAD = 50°, therefore ∠EDC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,BF平分∠ABC,交AD于点F,CE平分∠BCD,交AD于点E,AB=8,CD=6,EF=2,则AD长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AD ∥ BC, BF bisects ∠ABC, intersects AD at point F, CE bisects ∠BCD, intersects AD at point E, AB = 8, CD = 6, EF = 2, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BF bisects ∠ABC and CE bisects ∠BCD, therefore ∠ABF = ∠CBF and ∠DCE = ∠BCE. Since AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠CBF = ∠AFB and ∠DEC = ∠BCE, thus ∠ABF = ∠AFB and ∠DCE = ∠DEC. Therefore, AB = AF = 8 and CD = DE = 6. Given that EF = 2, therefore AD = AF + DE - EF = 8 + 6 - 2 = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=10,AC=6,过点A的直线DE∥CB,∠ABC与∠ACB的平分线分别交DE于E,D,则DE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 10, AC = 6, the straight line DE through point A is parallel to CB, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect DE at E and D, respectively, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore ∠E = ∠EBC. Since BE bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABE = ∠EBC, thus ∠E = ∠ABE, therefore AB = AE = 10. Similarly, it can be concluded that AD = AC = 6, therefore DE = AD + AE = AB + AC = 16. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知等腰△ABC的一腰AB长为4厘米,过底边BC上任意一点D作两腰的平行线,分别交两腰于E、F,则四边形AEDF的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that one side AB of the isosceles △ABC is 4 cm long. A parallel line to the two sides is drawn through any point D on the base BC, intersecting the two sides at E and F, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral AEDF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC, and DF ∥ AB, therefore ∠EDB = ∠C, ∠FDC = ∠B. Since AB = AC, therefore ∠B = ∠C, thus ∠EDB = ∠B, ∠FDC = ∠C. Therefore, DE = BE, DF = FC. Hence, the perimeter of quadrilateral AEDF is AE + ED + DF + AF = AE + BE + CF + AF = AB + AC = 2AB = 2×4 = 8 cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在等边△ABC中,BD平分∠ABC交AC于点D,过点D作DE⊥BC于点E,且CE=1.5,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠ABC=∠C=60°,AB=BC=AC,∵DE⊥BC,∴∠CDE=30°,∵EC=1.5,∴CD=2EC=3,∵BD平分∠ABC交AC于点D,∴AD=CD=3,∴AB=AC=AD+CD=6．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the equilateral △ABC, BD bisects ∠ABC and intersects AC at point D. Draw DE ⊥ BC at point E, and CE = 1.5, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore ∠ABC = ∠C = 60°, and AB = BC = AC. Since DE ⊥ BC, therefore ∠CDE = 30°. Given that EC = 1.5, therefore CD = 2EC = 3. Since BD bisects ∠ABC and intersects AC at point D, therefore AD = CD = 3, thus AB = AC = AD + CD = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 一艘轮船由海平面上A地出发向南偏西40°的方向行驶40海里到达B地,再由B地向北偏西20°的方向行驶40海里到达C地,则A、C两地相距()
answer_cot: 由题意得∠ABC=60°,AB=BC,∴△ABC是等边三角形,∴AC=AB=40海里．故选:B．
question_en: A ship departs from location A on the sea level and sails 40 nautical miles in a south-southwest direction at 40° to reach location B, then sails 40 nautical miles from location B in a north-northwest direction at 20° to reach location C, then the distance between locations A and C is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠ABC = 60°, AB = BC, therefore △ABC is an equilateral triangle, thus AC = AB = 40 nautical miles. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图是"人字形"钢架,其中斜梁AB=AC,顶角∠BAC=120°,跨度BC=10m,AD为支柱(即底边BC的中线),两根支撑架DE⊥AB,DF⊥AC,则DE+DF等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is a "herringbone" steel frame, where the inclined beams AB = AC, the apex angle ∠BAC = 120°, the span BC = 10m, AD is the column (that is, the midline of the base BC), the two braces DE ⊥ AB, DF ⊥ AC, then DE + DF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and ∠BAC = 120°, therefore ∠B = ∠C = 30°. Since DE ⊥ AB, and DF ⊥ AC, with E and F being the feet of the perpendiculars, therefore DE = 1/2 BD, and DF = 1/2 DC. Thus, DE + DF = 1/2 BD + 1/2 DC = 1/2 (BD + DC) = 1/2 BC. Therefore, DE + DF = 1/2 BC = 1/2 × 10 = 5m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 将△ABC沿CB向右平移得到△DEF,若四边形ABED的面积等于32,则平移距离等于()
answer_cot: 设平移的距离为x,即AD=BE=x,∵∠C=90°,∠ABC=30°,∴AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=8,由平移的性质可知,四边形ABED的平行四边形,则8x=32,解答,x=4,故选:A．
question_en: Moving △ABC to the right along CB results in △DEF. If the area of quadrilateral ABED equals 32, then the moving distance equals ()
answer_cot_en: Let the distance of translation be x, that is, AD = BE = x. Because ∠C = 90°, ∠ABC = 30°, therefore AC = 1/2 AB = 8. According to the property of translation, quadrilateral ABED is a parallelogram, then 8x = 32, solving this, x = 4. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,∠ABC=60°,BD平分∠ABC,P点是BD的中点,若BD=6,则CP的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠ABC = 60°, BD bisects ∠ABC, point P is the midpoint of BD, if BD = 6, then the length of CP is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 90°, ∠ABC = 60°, therefore ∠A = 30°. Since BD bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠CBD = ∠DBA = 30°, thus BD = AD = 6. Since point P is the midpoint of BD, therefore CP = 1/2 BD = 3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,一辆货车车厢底板离地面的高度为\frac{3}{2}米,为了方便下货,常用一块木板搭成一个斜面,要使斜面与水平地面的夹角不大于30°,则这块木板的长度至少为()
answer_cot: 如图:AC为车厢底板离地面的高度\frac{3}{2}米,AB是要求木板的长度,因为在直角三角形ABC中,∠B=30°,所以AB=2AC=2×\frac{3}{2}=3(米)．故选:A．z=\lambda^{2}-|➝{ZI}|^{-2}
question_en: As shown in the figure, the height of the floor of a truck's cargo compartment from the ground is \(\frac{3}{2}\) meters. To facilitate unloading, a wooden board is often used to form a ramp. To ensure that the angle between the ramp and the horizontal ground does not exceed 30°, the length of this wooden board must be at least ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: AC is the height of the carriage floor from the ground, which is 3/2 meters, AB is the required length of the plank. Because in right triangle ABC, ∠B = 30°, so AB = 2AC = 2×3/2 = 3 (meters). Hence, the answer is: A. z = λ² - |➝{ZI}|⁻².

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=6,BC=8,AD是∠BAC的平分线．若P,Q分别是AD和AC上的动点,则PC+PQ的最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,过点C作CM⊥AB交AB于点M,交AD于点P,过点P作PQ⊥AC于点Q,∵AD是∠BAC的平分线．∴PQ=PM,这时PC+PQ有最小值,即CM的长度,∵AC=6,BC=8,∠ACB=90°,∴AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=√{6^{2}+8^{2}}=10．∵S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}AB•CM=\frac{1}{2}AC•BC,∴CM=\frac{AC\cdotBC}{AB}=\frac{6×8}{10}=\frac{24}{5},即PC+PQ的最小值为\frac{24}{5}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = 6, BC = 8, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC. If P and Q are moving points on AD and AC respectively, then the minimum value of PC + PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, draw CM ⊥ AB from point C intersecting AB at point M and intersecting AD at point P. Draw PQ ⊥ AC from point P at point Q. Since AD is the bisector of ∠BAC, therefore PQ = PM. At this time, PC + PQ has a minimum value, which is the length of CM. Since AC = 6, BC = 8, ∠ACB = 90°, therefore AB = √{AC² + BC²} = √{6² + 8²} = 10. Since the area of △ABC = 1/2 AB•CM = 1/2 AC•BC, therefore CM = AC•BC / AB = 6×8 / 10 = 24/5, which is the minimum value of PC + PQ. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,∠BAD=130°,∠B=∠D=90°,点E,F分别是线段BC,DC上的动点．当△AEF的周长最小时,则∠EAF的度数为()
answer_cot: 作A关于BC和CD的对称点A′,A″,连接A′A″,交BC于E,交CD于F,则A′A″即为△AEF的周长最小值．作DA延长线AH,∵∠DAB=130°,∴∠HAA′=50°,∴∠AA′E+∠A″=∠HAA′=50°,∵∠EA′A=∠EAA′,∠FAD=∠A″,∴∠EAA′+∠A″AF=50°,∴∠EAF=130°-50°=80°,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, ∠BAD = 130°, ∠B = ∠D = 90°, points E and F are moving points on line segments BC and DC, respectively. When the perimeter of △AEF is the smallest, then the degree of ∠EAF is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct point A' which is symmetrical to A about BC, and point A″ which is symmetrical to A about CD. Connect A' and A″, intersecting BC at E and CD at F, then the length of A'A″ is the minimum perimeter of △AEF. Extend line DA to AH, because ∠DAB = 130°, therefore ∠HAA' = 50°, therefore ∠AA'E + ∠A″ = ∠HAA' = 50°. Since ∠EA'A = ∠EAA' and ∠FAD = ∠A″, therefore ∠EAA' + ∠A″AF = 50°, thus ∠EAF = 130° - 50° = 80°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC的周长为16．点D是AB边的中点,BD=2,过点D作AB的垂线l,E是l上任意一点,则△AEC的周长最小值为()
answer_cot: ∵点D是AB边的中点,BD=2,∴AB=2BD=4,∵△ABC的周长为16,∴AC+BC=12,如图,连接BE,∵点D是AB边的中点,l⊥AB,∴l是AB的垂直平分线,∴AE=BE,∴AE+CE=BE+CE,∵BE+CE≥BC,∴当B,E,C在同一直线上时,BE+CE的最小值等于BC的长,而AC长不变,∴△AEC的周长最小值等于AC+BC=12,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of △ABC is 16. Point D is the midpoint of side AB, BD = 2, a perpendicular line l is drawn from point D to AB, E is any point on line l, then the minimum perimeter of △AEC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point D is the midpoint of side AB, and BD = 2, therefore AB = 2BD = 4. Since the perimeter of △ABC is 16, therefore AC + BC = 12. As shown in the figure, connect BE. Because point D is the midpoint of side AB, and l ⊥ AB, therefore l is the perpendicular bisector of AB, therefore AE = BE, therefore AE + CE = BE + CE. Since BE + CE ≥ BC, therefore when B, E, C are on the same line, the minimum value of BE + CE equals the length of BC, and the length of AC remains unchanged, therefore the minimum value of the perimeter of △AEC equals AC + BC = 12. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,OA、OB分别是线段MC、MD的垂直平分线,MD=5cm,MC=7cm,CD=10cm,一只小蚂蚁从点M出发爬到OA边上任意一点E,再爬到OB边上任意一点F,然后爬回M点处,则小蚂蚁爬行的路径最短可为()
answer_cot: 设CD与OA的交点为E,与OB的交点于F,∵OA、OB分别是线段MC、MD的垂直平分线,∴ME=CE,MF=DF,∴小蚂蚁爬行的路径最短=CD=10cm,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, OA and OB are the perpendicular bisectors of line segments MC and MD, respectively, MD = 5 cm, MC = 7 cm, CD = 10 cm. A little ant starts from point M, crawls to any point E on side OA, then crawls to any point F on side OB, and then crawls back to point M. The shortest path the ant can crawl is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the intersection of CD and OA be E, and the intersection of CD and OB be F. Since OA and OB are the perpendicular bisectors of segments MC and MD respectively, therefore ME = CE, MF = DF. Therefore, the shortest path for the ant to crawl is CD = 10cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,BF平分∠ABC,过A点作AF⊥BF,垂足为F并延长交BC于点G,D为AB中点,连接DF延长交AC于点E．若AB=12,BC=20,则线段EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BF bisects ∠ABC, AF is drawn perpendicular to BF at foot F and extended to intersect BC at point G, D is the midpoint of AB, DF is extended to intersect AC at point E. If AB = 12, BC = 20, then the length of line segment EF is ()
answer_cot_en: In △BFA and △BFG, we have ∠ABF = ∠GBF, BF = BF, and ∠BFA = ∠BFG. Therefore, △BFA ≌ △BFG (ASA). Thus, BG = AB = 12, AF = FG, so GC = BC - BG = 8. Since AF = FG and AE = EC, therefore EF = 1/2 GC = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别是AB、AC的中点,若DE=1.5,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, if DE = 1.5, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because points D and E are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, therefore BC = 2DE = 3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,BD、CE是角平分线,AM⊥BD于点M,AN⊥CE于点N．△ABC的周长为30,BC=12．则MN的长是()
answer_cot: 证明:∵△ABC的周长为30,BC=12．∴AB+AC=30-BC=18．延长AN、AM分别交BC于点F、G．如图所示:∵BN为∠ABC的角平分线,∴∠CBN=∠ABN,∵BN⊥AG,∴∠ABN+∠BAN=90°,∠G+∠CBN=90°,∴∠BAN=∠AGB,∴AB=BG,∴AN=GN,同理AC=CF,AM=MF,∴MN为△AFG的中位线,GF=BG+CF-BC,∴MN=\frac{1}{2}(AB+AC-BC)=\frac{1}{2}(18-12)=3．故选:D．z\in\hat{x}(\lambda)
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BD and CE are the angle bisectors, AM ⊥ BD at point M, AN ⊥ CE at point N. The perimeter of △ABC is 30, BC = 12. Then the length of MN is ()
answer_cot_en: Proof: Because the perimeter of △ABC is 30, and BC = 12. Therefore, AB + AC = 30 - BC = 18. Extend AN and AM to intersect BC at points F and G, as shown in the figure: Because BN is the angle bisector of ∠ABC, therefore ∠CBN = ∠ABN. Since BN ⊥ AG, therefore ∠ABN + ∠BAN = 90°, ∠G + ∠CBN = 90°, therefore ∠BAN = ∠AGB, therefore AB = BG, therefore AN = GN. Similarly, AC = CF, AM = MF, therefore MN is the median of △AFG, GF = BG + CF - BC, therefore MN = 1/2 (AB + AC - BC) = 1/2 (18 - 12) = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,D,E分别是BC,AC的中点,BF平分∠ABC,交DE于点F,若BC=6,则DF的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are the midpoints of BC and AC respectively, BF bisects ∠ABC, and intersects DE at point F. If BC = 6, then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because D and E are the midpoints of BC and AC respectively, therefore DE ∥ AB, thus ∠BFD = ∠ABF. Since BF bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠DBF = ∠ABF, thus ∠BFD = ∠DBF, therefore DF = DB = 1/2 BC = 3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 同学们都玩过跷跷板的游戏,如图是一个跷跷板的示意图,立柱OC与地面垂直,OA=OB．当跷跷板的一头A着地时,∠AOA′=50°,则当跷跷板的另一头B着地时,∠COB′等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, students have all played the seesaw game. This is a schematic diagram of a seesaw, where the column OC is perpendicular to the ground, and OA = OB. When one end A of the seesaw touches the ground, ∠AOA′ = 50°, then when the other end B of the seesaw touches the ground, ∠COB′ is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OB = 1/2 AB, therefore OA' = OB' = 1/2 A'B', since AB = A'B', therefore OA = OB'. Because ∠AOA' = 50°, therefore ∠AOB' = 180° - 50° = 130°. Since OC ⊥ AB', therefore ∠COB' = 1/2 ∠AOB' = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,∠A=40°,DE垂直平分AC,则∠BCD的度数等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠A = 40°, DE is perpendicular to the bisector of AC, then the degree of ∠BCD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and ∠A = 40°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 70°. Since DE perpendicularly bisects AC, therefore AD = CD, thus ∠A = ∠ACD = 40°. Therefore ∠BCD = ∠ACB - ∠ACD = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB是半径为1的⊙O的两条切线,点A、B分别为切点,∠APB=60°,OP与弦AB交于点C,与⊙O交于点D．则图中阴影部分的面积是()
answer_cot: ∵PA、PB是半径为1的⊙O的两条切线,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,OP平分∠APB,而∠APB=60°,∴∠APO=30°,∠POA=90°-30°=60°,又∵OP垂直平分AB,∴△AOC≌△BOC,∴S~△AOC~=S~△BOC~,∴S~阴影部分~=S~扇形OAD~=\frac{60π×1^{2}}{360}=\frac{π}{6}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are two tangents of ⊙O with a radius of 1, points A and B are the tangent points respectively, ∠APB = 60°, OP intersects chord AB at point C, and intersects ⊙O at point D. Then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are two tangents of ⊙O with a radius of 1, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, OP bisects ∠APB, and ∠APB = 60°, therefore ∠APO = 30°, ∠POA = 90° - 30° = 60°. Since OP bisects AB perpendicularly, therefore △AOC ≌ △BOC, thus the area of △AOC equals the area of △BOC, therefore the area of the shaded part equals the area of the sector OAD = (60π × 1²) / 360 = π / 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠A=90°,AB=AC=3,现将△ABC绕点B逆时针旋转一定角度,点C′恰落在边BC上的高所在的直线上,则边BC在旋转过程中所扫过的面积为()
answer_cot: 作高AD,则C′点在AD的反向延长线上,如图,∵∠A=90°,AB=AC=3,∴△ABC为等腰直角三角形,∴BC=√{2}AB=3√{2},BD=CD,∵△ABC绕点B逆时针旋转一定角度,点C′恰落在边BC上的高所在的直线上,∴BC′=BC=3√{2},∴BD=\frac{1}{2}BC′,∴∠BC′D=30°,∴∠DBC′=60°,∴边BC在旋转过程中所扫过的面积=\frac{60\cdotπ\cdot(3√{2})^{2}}{360}=3π．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 90°, AB = AC = 3. Now, rotate △ABC counterclockwise around point B by a certain angle, so that point C′ falls exactly on the line where the altitude on side BC is located. Then, the area swept by side BC during the rotation is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw the height AD, then point C' is on the extension line of AD. As shown in the figure, because ∠A = 90°, AB = AC = 3, therefore △ABC is an isosceles right triangle, thus BC = √2AB = 3√2, BD = CD. Because △ABC rotates a certain angle counterclockwise around point B, point C' just falls on the line where the height of side BC is, thus BC' = BC = 3√2, therefore BD = 1/2 BC', thus ∠BC'D = 30°, therefore ∠DBC' = 60°, therefore the area swept by side BC during the rotation = (60 * π * (3√2)²) / 360 = 3π. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,圆心角都是90°的扇形OAB与扇形OCD叠放在一起,OA=3,OC=1,分别连接AC、BD,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 由图可知,将△OAC顺时针旋转90°后可与△ODB重合,∴S~△OAC~=S~△OBD~；因此S_{阴影}=S~扇形OAB~+S~△OBD~-S~△OAC~-S~扇形OCD~=S~扇形OAB~-S~扇形OCD~=\frac{1}{4}π×(9-1)=2π．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, sector OAB with a central angle of 90° and sector OCD with a central angle of 90° are stacked together, OA = 3, OC = 1, connect AC and BD respectively, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: From the figure, we know that by rotating △OAC 90° clockwise, it can coincide with △ODB, therefore the area of △OAC equals the area of △ODB. Hence, the area of the shaded part equals the area of sector OAB plus the area of △ODB minus the area of △OAC and the area of sector OCD, which equals the area of sector OAB minus the area of sector OCD, which equals 1/4π*(9-1) = 2π. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,为了绿化环境,在矩形空地的四个角划出四个半径为1的扇形空地进行绿化,则绿化的总面积是()
answer_cot: 利用扇形面积可得,一个小扇形的面积=\frac{90π×1}{360}=\frac{π}{4},则四个图形的面积就是π,故选B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in order to green the environment, four quarter-circle green spaces with a radius of 1 are demarcated at the four corners of the rectangular open space, then the total area of the green space is ()
answer_cot_en: By using the area of a sector, the area of a small sector can be calculated as (90π×1)/360 = π/4. Therefore, the area of the four shapes is π. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 某楼梯的侧面如图所示,已测得AB的长为3米,楼梯斜坡BC的坡度比是1:2,则该楼梯的斜坡BC长为()
question_en: The side view of a staircase is shown in the figure, it has been measured that the length of AB is 3 meters, the slope ratio of the staircase slope BC is 1:2, then the length of the staircase slope BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the length of AB is 3 meters, and the slope ratio of the stair ramp BC is 1:2, therefore AB/AC = 1/2, thus AC = 2AB = 6 meters, therefore BC = √(AB² + BC²) = √(3² + 6²) = 3√5 (meters). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 某时刻海上点P处有一客轮,测得灯塔A位于P的北偏东30°方向,且相距50海里．客轮以60海里/小时的速度沿北偏西60°方向航行$\frac{2}{3}$小时到达B处,那么tan∠BAP=()
answer_cot: ∵灯塔A位于客轮P的北偏东30°方向,且相距50海里．∴AP=50,∵客轮以60海里/小时的速度沿北偏西60°方向航行$\frac{2}{3}$小时到达B处,∴∠APB=90°,BP=60$×\frac{2}{3}=$40,∴tan∠BAP$=\frac{BP}{AP}=\frac{40}{50}=\frac{4}{5}$；故选:A．
question_en: At a certain moment, there is a passenger ship at point P at sea, it is measured that lighthouse A is in the direction of 30° northeast of P, and it is 50 nautical miles away. The passenger ship sails in the direction of 60° northwest at a speed of 60 nautical miles per hour for $\frac{2}{3}$ hours to reach point B, then tan∠BAP = ()
answer_cot_en: Because lighthouse A is located 30° north-east of passenger ship P, and is 50 nautical miles away. Therefore, AP = 50. Since the ship sails at a speed of 60 nautical miles per hour in a direction 60° north-west for 2/3 hour to reach point B, therefore ∠APB = 90°, BP = 60 × 2/3 = 40, therefore tan∠BAP = BP / AP = 40 / 50 = 4 / 5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知灯塔M方圆一定范围内有镭射辅助信号,一艘轮船在海上从南向北方向以一定的速度匀速航行,轮船在A处测得灯塔M在北偏东30°方向,行驶1小时后到达B处,此时刚好进入灯塔M的镭射信号区,测得灯塔M在北偏东45°方向,则轮船通过灯塔M的镭射信号区的时间为()
answer_cot: 连接MC,过M点作MD⊥AC于D．在Rt△ADM中,∵∠MAD=30°,∴AD$=√{3}$MD,在Rt△BDM中,∵∠MBD=45°,∴BD=MD,∴BC=2MD,∴BC:AB=2MD:($√{3}-$1)MD=2:$√{3}+$1．故轮船通过灯塔M的镭射信号区的时间为($√{3}+$1)小时．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the lighthouse M has a laser-assisted signal within a certain range. A ship sails from south to north at a constant speed on the sea. At point A, the ship measures that lighthouse M is in the direction of 30° northeast. After sailing for 1 hour to point B, the ship just enters the laser signal area of lighthouse M and measures that lighthouse M is in the direction of 45° northeast. Then the time the ship passes through the laser signal area of lighthouse M is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect MC, draw MD ⊥ AC at point D. In right triangle ADM, because ∠MAD = 30°, therefore AD = √3 MD. In right triangle BDM, because ∠MBD = 45°, therefore BD = MD, thus BC = 2MD, therefore the ratio of BC to AB is 2MD : (√3 - 1)MD = 2 : √3 + 1. Hence, the time for the ship to pass through the laser signal area of the lighthouse M is (√3 + 1) hours. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,上午8时,一艘船从A处出发,以15海里/时的速度向正北方向航行,9时40分到达B处,从A处测得灯塔C在北偏西26°方向,从B处测得灯塔C在北偏西52°方向,则B处到灯塔C的距离是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, at 8 a.m., a ship departs from point A, sailing northward at a speed of 15 nautical miles per hour, and arrives at point B at 9:40 a.m. From point A, the lighthouse C is observed to be in the direction of 26° west of north, and from point B, the lighthouse C is observed to be in the direction of 52° west of north, then the distance from point B to lighthouse C is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠A = 26°, ∠DBC = 52°. Since ∠DBC = ∠A + ∠C, therefore ∠A = ∠C = 26°, thus AB = BC. Given that AB = 15 * (5/3) = 25, therefore BC = 25 (nautical miles). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 上午9时,一船从A处出发,以每小时40海里的速度向正东方向航行,9时30分到达B处,如图所示,从A,B两处分别测得小岛M在北偏东45°和北偏东15°方向,那么B处与小岛M的距离为()
answer_cot: 由已知得,AB=40$×\frac{1}{2}=$20海里,∠ABM=105°．过点B作BN⊥AM于点N．在直角△ABN中,BN=AB•sin45°=10$√{2}$；在直角△BNM中,∠MBN=60°,则∠M=30°,∴BM=2BN=20$√{2}$(海里)．故选:B．
question_en: At 9:00 AM, a boat departs from point A, traveling at a speed of 40 nautical miles per hour towards the due east direction, and arrives at point B at 9:30 AM. As shown in the figure, the small island M is measured from points A and B to be in the northeast direction at 45° and 15° respectively, then the distance between point B and the small island M is ()
answer_cot_en: From the given information, AB = 40 × 1/2 = 20 nautical miles, ∠ABM = 105°. Draw BN ⊥ AM at point N. In right triangle △ABN, BN = AB•sin45° = 10√2; In right triangle △BNM, ∠MBN = 60°, then ∠M = 30°, therefore BM = 2BN = 20√2 (nautical miles). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 为了测量两岸平行的河宽AB,测得∠ACB=30°,∠ADB=60°,CD=60m,则河宽AB为()
question_en: To measure the width of a river AB with parallel banks, it was measured that ∠ACB = 30°, ∠ADB = 60°, CD = 60 m, then the width of the river AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 30°, ∠ADB = 60°, therefore ∠CAD = 30°, thus AD = CD = 60m. In right triangle ABD, AB = AD•sin∠ADB = 60 × √3/2 = 30√3 (m). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知一渔船上的渔民在A处看见灯塔M在北偏东60°方向,这艘渔船以28海里/时的速度向正东方向航行,半小时后到达B处,在B处看见灯塔M在北偏东15°方向,此时灯塔M与渔船的距离是()
answer_cot: 由已知得,AB=\frac{1}{2}×28=14海里,∠A=30°,∠ABM=105°．过点B作BN⊥AM于点N．∵在直角△ABN中,∠BAN=30°∴BN=\frac{1}{2}AB=7海里．在直角△BNM中,∠MBN=45°,则直角△BNM是等腰直角三角形．即BN=MN=7海里,∴BM=√{BN^{2}+MN^{2}}=√{7^{2}+7^{2}}=7√{2}海里．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that a fisherman on a fishing boat sees the lighthouse M in the direction of 60° northeast from point A. The fishing boat sails eastward at a speed of 28 nautical miles per hour, and half an hour later it arrives at point B. From point B, the lighthouse M is seen in the direction of 15° northeast. At this time, the distance between the lighthouse M and the fishing boat is ()
answer_cot_en: From the given information, AB = 1/2 × 28 = 14 nautical miles, ∠A = 30°, ∠ABM = 105°. Draw BN ⊥ AM at point N. Because in right triangle △ABN, ∠BAN = 30°, therefore BN = 1/2 AB = 7 nautical miles. In right triangle △BNM, ∠MBN = 45°, then right triangle △BNM is an isosceles right triangle. That is, BN = MN = 7 nautical miles, therefore BM = √(BN² + MN²) = √(7² + 7²) = 7√2 nautical miles. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知\frac{OA}{DO}=\frac{BO}{CO}=\frac{1}{2},△AOB的面积是100cm²,则△DOC的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that \(\frac{OA}{DO} = \frac{BO}{CO} = \frac{1}{2}\), the area of △AOB is 100 cm², then the area of △DOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA/DO = BO/CO = 1/2, and ∠AOB = ∠COD, therefore △AOB is similar to △COD, thus the ratio of the area of △AOB to the area of △COD is (OA/DO)², therefore the area of △DOC is 400. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AD⊥BC于D,若AB=3,BC=5,则DC的长度()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, AD ⊥ BC at D, if AB = 3, BC = 5, then the length of DC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠B = ∠B, ∠ADB = ∠CAB = 90°, therefore △ABD is similar to △ABC, therefore AB² = BD•BC, therefore BD = 9/5. Thus, DC = BC - BD = 5 - 9/5 = 16/5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AE:EB=1:2,S~△AEF~=3,则S~△FCD~为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,AE:EB=1:2,∴AE:CD=1:3,∵AB∥CD,∴∠EAF=∠DCF,∵∠DFC=∠AFE,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∵S~△AEF~=3,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupFCD}}=\frac{3}{S_{\bigtriangleupFCD}}=(\frac{1}{3})²,解得S~△FCD~=27．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE:EB = 1:2, the area of △AEF is 3, then the area of △FCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, and the ratio of AE to EB is 1:2, therefore the ratio of AE to CD is 1:3. Since AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠EAF = ∠DCF. Since ∠DFC = ∠AFE, therefore △AEF is similar to △CDF. Given that the area of △AEF is 3, therefore the ratio of the area of △AEF to the area of △FCD is 3 / area of △FCD = (1/3)². Solving this gives the area of △FCD as 27. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AE=EB,AF=2,则FC的值为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴∠CDE=∠AED,∠DCA=∠CAB,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∴AF:CF=AE:CD,∵AE=EB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}CD,即AE:CD=1:2,∵AF=2,∴CF=4,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE = EB, AF = 2, then the value of FC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, and AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠CDE = ∠AED, ∠DCA = ∠CAB, thus △AEF is similar to △CDF, therefore AF:CF = AE:CD. Since AE = EB, therefore AE = 1/2 AB, thus AE = 1/2 CD, that is AE:CD = 1:2. Given that AF = 2, therefore CF = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AD⊥BC于D,DE⊥AB于E,AD=3,DE=2,则CD的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, AD ⊥ BC at D, DE ⊥ AB at E, AD = 3, DE = 2, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ⊥ BC, DE ⊥ AB, therefore ∠ADC = ∠AED = 90°. Since ∠BAC = 90°, therefore ∠DAE = ∠C. Therefore, right triangle ACD is similar to right triangle DAE, thus AD/AC = DE/AD. Given that AD = 3, DE = 2, therefore 3/AC = 2/3, thus AC = 9/2. In right triangle ACD, CD² + AD² = AC², therefore CD = √{(9/2)² - 3²} = 3√5/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知点D是AB边的中点,AF∥BC,CG:GA=3:1,BC=8,则AF等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point D is the midpoint of side AB, AF ∥ BC, CG:GA = 3:1, BC = 8, then AF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AF ∥ BC, therefore △AFD is similar to △BED, thus the ratio of AF to BE equals the ratio of AD to BD. Since D is the midpoint of AB, therefore the ratio of AF to BE is 1, that is, AF equals BE. Because AF ∥ BC, therefore △AFG is similar to △CEG, thus the ratio of CE to AF equals the ratio of CG to GA, which is 3:1, therefore CE equals 3 times AF, therefore BC equals 2 times AF, which is 8, therefore AF equals 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知⊙O的半径为6,M是⊙O外一点,且OM=12,过M的直线与⊙O交于A、B,点A、B关于OM的对称点分别为C、D,AD与BC交于点P,则OP的长为()
answer_cot: 如图所示,连接AC,与MO交于点N,连接OA,OC,根据对称性可知:MN⊥AC且AN=CN,∴点P在MN上；则AP=CP,∴∠APN=∠CPN,∴∠BPM=∠APO,根据垂径定理知:∠AON=∠CON=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC,又∠ABC=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC(同弧圆周角是圆心角的一半),∴∠AON=∠ABC,∵∠AON=180°-(∠OAM+∠AMO),∠ABC=180°-(∠BPM+∠AMO),∴∠OAM=∠BPM,∴∠OAM=∠APO．又∠AOP=∠MOA,∵△AOP∽△MOA,∴\frac{OP}{OA}=\frac{OA}{OM}；即\frac{OP}{6}=\frac{6}{12},解得:OP=3．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of ⊙O is 6, M is a point outside ⊙O, and OM = 12. A line passing through M intersects ⊙O at points A and B. The points C and D are the symmetric points of A and B with respect to OM, respectively. AD and BC intersect at point P, then the length of OP is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect AC, intersect with MO at point N, connect OA, OC, according to symmetry: MN ⊥ AC and AN = CN, therefore point P is on MN; then AP = CP, therefore ∠APN = ∠CPN, thus ∠BPM = ∠APO, according to the perpendicular radius theorem: ∠AON = ∠CON = 1/2 ∠AOC, also ∠ABC = 1/2 ∠AOC (the angle subtended by an arc at the circumference is half that subtended at the center), therefore ∠AON = ∠ABC, because ∠AON = 180° - (∠OAM + ∠AMO), ∠ABC = 180° - (∠BPM + ∠AMO), therefore ∠OAM = ∠BPM, thus ∠OAM = ∠APO. Also ∠AOP = ∠MOA, because △AOP ∽ △MOA, therefore OP/OA = OA/OM; that is OP/6 = 6/12, solving gives: OP = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,E为CD的中点,AE交BD于点O,S~△DCE~=12,则S~△AOD~等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, E is the midpoint of CD, AE intersects BD at point O, the area of △DCE is 12, then the area of △AOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in square ABCD, E is the midpoint of CD, therefore DE ∥ AB, DE = 1/2 AB. In triangles DOE and BOA, ∠DOE = ∠BOA, ∠OBA = ∠ODE, therefore triangle DOE is similar to triangle BOA, therefore EO/AO = DE/BA = 1/2, therefore the area of triangle AOD is twice the area of triangle DOE, which is 2 x 12 = 24. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,D是AB上一点,连接CD,∠ACD=∠B,若BC=13cm,CD=5cm,则BD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, D is a point on AB, connect CD, ∠ACD = ∠B, if BC = 13 cm, CD = 5 cm, then BD = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A = ∠A, and ∠ACD = ∠B, therefore △ADC is similar to △ACB; thus ∠BDC = ∠ACB = 90°, therefore BD = √(BC² - CD²) = √(13² - 5²) = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知D、E分别是△ABC中AB、AC边上的点,DE∥BC且\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3},△ADE的周长2,则△ABC的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that D and E are points on the sides AB and AC of △ABC, respectively, DE ∥ BC and \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{1}{3}\), the perimeter of △ADE is 2, then the perimeter of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore (AD + DE + AE) / (AB + BC + AC) = AD / AB = 1/3. Given that AD + DE + AE = 2, therefore AB + BC + AC = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中D为AC边上一点,若∠DBC=∠A,BC=3,AC=6,则CD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is a point on side AC, if ∠DBC = ∠A, BC = 3, AC = 6, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DBC = ∠A, and ∠C = ∠C, therefore △BCD is similar to △ACB, thus CD/BC = BC/AC. Therefore, CD/3 = 3/6, thus CD = 3/2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,DE∥BC,BD,CE相交于O,\frac{EO}{OC}=\frac{1}{3},AE=3,则EB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE ∥ BC, BD and CE intersect at O, \(\frac{EO}{OC} = \frac{1}{3}\), AE = 3, then EB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △EOD is similar to △COB, and △AED is similar to △ABC, thus DE/BC = EO/OC = 1/3, and DE/BC = AE/AB. Given that AE = 3, therefore BE = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,一束光线从点A(-3,3)出发,经过y轴上的点C反射后经过点B(-1,0),则光线从点A到点B经过的路线长是()
answer_cot: 如图所示,延长AC交x轴于B′．则点B、B′关于y轴对称,CB=CB′．作AD⊥x轴于D点．则AD=3,DB′=3+1=4．∴AB′=AC+CB′=AC+CB=√{3²+4²}=5．即光线从点A到点B经过的路径长为5．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ray of light starts from point A(-3,3), reflects off point C on the y-axis, and then passes through point B(-1,0), then the length of the path taken by the light from point A to point B is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, extend AC to intersect the x-axis at B'. Then points B and B' are symmetrical about the y-axis, and CB equals CB'. Draw AD perpendicular to the x-axis at point D. Then AD equals 3, and DB' equals 3 + 1 = 4. Therefore, AB' equals AC + CB' equals AC + CB equals √(3² + 4²) = 5. That is, the path length of the light from point A to point B is 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,若DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3},DE=4cm,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, if DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{1}{3}\), DE = 4 cm, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of AD to AB equals the ratio of DE to BC, thus 4/BC = 1/3, therefore BC = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知D、E、F分别为等腰△ABC边BC、CA、AB上的点,如果AB=AC,∠FDE=∠B,BD=2,CD=3,CE=4,AE=1,那么AF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that D, E, and F are points on the sides BC, CA, and AB of the isosceles triangle ABC, respectively. If AB = AC, ∠FDE = ∠B, BD = 2, CD = 3, CE = 4, AE = 1, then the length of AF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, therefore ∠B = ∠C; also because ∠FDE = ∠B, therefore ∠BFD + ∠BDF = ∠BDF + ∠CDE, thus ∠BFD = ∠CDE, and ∠B = ∠C, therefore △BDF is similar to △CED, thus BD:CE = BF:DC, and BD = 2, CD = 3, CE = 4, therefore BF = 1.5, because AB = AC = 1 + 4 = 5, therefore AF = 5 - 1.5 = 3.5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,一小型水库堤坝的横断面为直角梯形,坝顶BC宽6m,坝高14m,斜坡CD的坡度i=1:2,则坝底AD的长为()
answer_cot: 过点C作CE⊥AD于点E,∵BC=6m,坝高为14m,∴AE=6m,CE=14m,∵斜坡CD的坡度i=1:2,∴CE:DE=1:2,∴DE=28m,则AD=AE+DE=6+28=34(m)．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the cross-section of a small reservoir dam is a right trapezoid, the top of the dam BC is 6 m wide, the height of the dam is 14 m, the slope of the slope CD is i = 1:2, then the length of the bottom of the dam AD is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw CE ⊥ AD through point C, because BC = 6m, and the dam height is 14m, therefore AE = 6m, CE = 14m. Since the slope of the ramp CD is 1:2, therefore CE:DE = 1:2, thus DE = 28m, then AD = AE + DE = 6 + 28 = 34(m). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,传送带和地面所成斜坡的坡度为1:2,它把物体从地面点A处送到离地面2米高的B处,则物体从A到B所经过的路程为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the slope of the conveyor belt to the ground is 1:2, it transports the object from point A on the ground to point B, which is 2 meters above the ground, then the distance the object travels from A to B is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: from the given information, BC = 8, BC/AC = 1/2, therefore AC = 16, BC = 8, therefore AB = √(AC² + BC²) = 2√5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,AB=AC=18,BC=12,正方形DEFG的顶点E,F在△ABC内,顶点D,G分别在AB,AC上,AD=AG,DG=6,则点F到BC的距离为()
answer_cot: 过点A作AM⊥BC于点M,交DG于点N,延长GF交BC于点H,∵AB=AC,AD=AG,∴AD:AB=AG:AC,∵∠BAC=∠DAG,∴△ADG∽△ABC,∴∠ADG=∠B,∴DG∥BC,∵四边形DEFG是正方形,∴FG⊥DG,∴FH⊥BC,AN⊥DG,∵AB=AC=18,BC=12,∴BM=\frac{1}{2}BC=6,∴AM=√{AB²-BM²}=12√{2},∴\frac{AN}{AM}=\frac{DG}{BC},∴\frac{AN}{12√{2}}=\frac{6}{12},∴AN=6√{2},∴MN=AM-AN=6√{2},∴FH=MN-GF=6√{2}-6．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC = 18, BC = 12, the vertices E, F of the square DEFG are inside △ABC, the vertices D, G are respectively on AB, AC, AD = AG, DG = 6, then the distance from point F to BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw AM ⊥ BC at point M, intersect DG at point N, extend GF to intersect BC at point H. Since AB = AC, AD = AG, therefore AD:AB = AG:AC. Since ∠BAC = ∠DAG, therefore △ADG ∽ △ABC, thus ∠ADG = ∠B, therefore DG ∥ BC. Since quadrilateral DEFG is a square, therefore FG ⊥ DG, thus FH ⊥ BC, AN ⊥ DG. Given that AB = AC = 18, BC = 12, therefore BM = 1/2 BC = 6, thus AM = √{AB² - BM²} = 12√{2}, therefore AN/AM = DG/BC, thus AN/12√{2} = 6/12, therefore AN = 6√{2}, thus MN = AM - AN = 6√{2}, thus FH = MN - GF = 6√{2} - 6. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在边长为9的正方形ABCD中,F为AB上一点,连接CF．过点F作FE⊥CF,交AD于点E,若AF=3,则AE等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD with a side length of 9, F is a point on AB, connect CF. Draw FE ⊥ CF, intersecting AD at point E, if AF = 3, then AE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a square, therefore AD = AB = BC = 9, ∠A = ∠B = 90°. Since FE ⊥ CF, therefore ∠EFC = 90°, thus ∠AEF + ∠EFA = 90°, ∠AFE + ∠CFB = 90°, therefore ∠AEF = ∠CFB, thus △AEF ∽ △BFC, therefore AE/BF = AF/BC, thus AE/(9-3) = 3/9, therefore AE = 2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AB=2,AC=3,D为BC的中点,动点E,F分别在AB,AC上,分别过点EG∥AD∥FH,交BC于点G、H,若EF∥BC,则EF+EG+FH的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, AB = 2, AC = 3, D is the midpoint of BC, moving points E and F are respectively on AB and AC, passing through points EG ∥ AD ∥ FH, intersecting BC at points G and H, if EF ∥ BC, then the value of EF + EG + FH is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAC = 90°, AB = 2, AC = 3, therefore BC = √(AB² + AC²) = √13. Since ∠BAC = 90°, D is the midpoint of BC, therefore DA = DB = DC, thus ∠B = ∠DAB, ∠C = ∠DAC. Since EF ∥ BC, EG ∥ AD ∥ FH, therefore ∠BEG = ∠DAB, ∠CFH = ∠DAC, EF = GH, therefore ∠B = ∠BEG, ∠C = ∠CFH, thus BG = EG, FH = HC, therefore EF + EG + FH = GH + BG + HC = BC = √13. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D、E分别是AB、AC上的点,且DE∥BC,若AD=5,DB=3,DE=4,则BC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on AB and AC respectively, and DE ∥ BC. If AD = 5, DB = 3, DE = 4, then BC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AD/AB = DE/BC. Given that AD = 5, DB = 3, DE = 4, therefore AB = AD + DB = 8, thus BC = AB * DE / AD = 32/5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,E为DC的中点,△DEF的面积为2,则△ABF的面积为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,AB=CD,∴△DEF∽△BAF,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupBAF}}={(\frac{DE}{AB})}²,∵E为DC的中点,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}CD,∴DE:AB=1:2,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupBAF}}={(\frac{1}{2})}²,∵△DEF的面积为2,∴△ABF的面积为8．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the midpoint of DC, the area of △DEF is 2, then the area of △ABF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ CD, and AB = CD. Therefore, △DEF is similar to △BAF, so the ratio of the area of △DEF to the area of △BAF is (DE/AB)². Since E is the midpoint of DC, therefore DE = 1/2 CD, so the ratio of DE to AB is 1:2. Therefore, the ratio of the area of △DEF to the area of △BAF is (1/2)². Given that the area of △DEF is 2, therefore the area of △ABF is 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,\frac{AO}{OD}=\frac{2}{3},则△AOB的周长与△DOC的周长比是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, \(\frac{AO}{OD} = \frac{2}{3}\), then the perimeter ratio of △AOB to △DOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠A = ∠D, ∠B = ∠C, thus △AOB is similar to △DOC, therefore the ratio of the area of △AOB to the area of △DOC equals the ratio of AO to OD, which is 2/3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AC、BD交于O,BO=6,DO=3,AC=12,则AO长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AC and BD intersect at O, BO = 6, DO = 3, AC = 12, then the length of AO is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠C = ∠A, ∠B = ∠D, thus △DOC is similar to △BOA, therefore DO/BO = OC/AO, thus 3/6 = (12 - AO) / AO, therefore AO = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,E、F分别是AB,AC的中点,若△AEF的面积为1,则四边形EBCF的面积为()
answer_cot: ∵E、F分别是AB,AC的中点,∴EF∥BC,∴△AEF∽△ABC,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABC}}={(\frac{EF}{BC})}²={(\frac{1}{2})}²=\frac{1}{4},∵△AEF的面积为1,∴△ABC的面积是4,∴四边形EBCF的面积是4-1=3,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, E and F are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively. If the area of △AEF is 1, then the area of quadrilateral EBCF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because E and F are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, therefore EF ∥ BC, therefore △AEF is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △AEF to the area of △ABC equals (EF/BC)², which equals (1/2)² = 1/4. Since the area of △AEF is 1, therefore the area of △ABC is 4, therefore the area of quadrilateral EBCF is 4 - 1 = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,梯形ABCD中,AD∥BC,对角线AC、BD相交于O点,若S~△AOD~:S~△OCD~=1:2,则S~△AOD~:S~△BOC~=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in trapezoid ABCD, AD ∥ BC, diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O. If the area ratio of △AOD to △OCD is 1:2, then the area ratio of △AOD to △BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the distance from point D to side AC be h, then the ratio of the area of △AOD to the area of △OCD is (1/2 × OA × h) : (1/2 × OC × h) = OA : OC = 1 : 2. Because AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠DAO = ∠BCO, ∠ADO = ∠CBO, therefore △AOD ∽ △COB, thus the ratio of the area of △AOD to the area of △BOC is (OA : OC)² = 1 : 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,在山坡上种树,已知∠A=30°,AC=3m,相邻两株树的坡面距离AB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, planting trees on the hillside, it is known that ∠A = 30°, AC = 3m, the slope distance AB between two adjacent trees is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: AB = AC / cosA = 3 / cos30° = 2√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,热气球从空中的A处看一栋楼的顶部仰角为30°,看这栋楼的俯角为60°．热气球与楼的水平距离为120m．这栋楼的高度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the angle of elevation to the top of a building from point A in the hot air balloon is 30°, and the angle of depression to the building is 60°. The horizontal distance between the hot air balloon and the building is 120 m. The height of the building is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, we know that ∠BAD = 30°, ∠DAC = 60°, and AD = 120m. Therefore, tan30° = BD/120, tan60° = CD/120. Solving these, we get BD = 40√3, CD = 120√3. Therefore, BC = BD + CD = 160√3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,某教学兴趣小组想测量一棵树CD的高度,他们先在点A处测得树顶C的仰角为30°,然后沿AD方向前行10m,到达B点,在B处测得树顶C的仰角高度为60°(A、B、D三点在同一直线上)则这棵树CD的高度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a teaching interest group wants to measure the height of a tree CD. They first measure the angle of elevation to the top of the tree C as 30° from point A, then move forward 10m in the direction of AD to reach point B, where they measure the angle of elevation to the top of the tree C as 60° (points A, B, and D are on the same straight line), then the height of the tree CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠CBD = 60°, and ∠CBD = ∠A + ∠ACB, therefore ∠ACB = ∠CBD - ∠A = 60° - 30° = 30°. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠A = ∠ACB. Given that AB = 10, therefore BC = AB = 10. In right triangle BCD, CD = BC•sin∠CBD = 10×√3/2 = 5√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,为了测得电视塔的高度AB,在D处用高为1米的测角仪CD,测得电视塔顶端A的仰角为30°,再向电视塔方向前进120米达到F处,又测得电视塔顶端A的仰角为60°,则这个电视塔的高度AB(单位:米)为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the height of the TV tower AB, a theodolite CD with a height of 1 meter is used at point D, and the elevation angle of the top of the TV tower A is measured to be 30°. Moving forward 120 meters towards the TV tower to point F, the elevation angle of the top of the TV tower A is measured to be 60°, then the height of the TV tower AB (in meters) is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, CE = DF = 120m, ∠EAC = ∠AEG - ∠ACE = 30°, therefore ∠EAC = ∠ECA, thus AE = DF = 120m, therefore AG = AE × sin∠AEG = 60√3m, therefore AB = AG + GB = (60√3 + 1)m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在一次数学课外实践活动中,小文在点C处测得树的顶端A的仰角为37°,BC=20m,则树的高度AB为()(参考数据:sin37°≈0.60,cos37°≈0.80,tan37°≈0.75)
question_en: As shown in the figure, during an extracurricular math practice activity, Xiaowen measured the angle of elevation of the top of the tree A to be 37° at point C, BC = 20m, then the height of the tree AB is () (Reference data: sin37° ≈ 0.60, cos37° ≈ 0.80, tan37° ≈ 0.75)
answer_cot_en: tanC = AB/BC, therefore AB = BC•tanC = 20×0.75 = 15m, thus the height of the tree AB is 15m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,某地修建高速公路,要从B地向C地修一座隧道(B、C在同一水平面上)．为了测量B、C两地之间的距离,某工程师乘坐热气球从C地出发,垂直上升100m到达A处,在A处观察B地的俯角为30°,则B、C两地之间的距离为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when constructing a highway, a tunnel is to be built from place B to place C (B and C are on the same horizontal plane). In order to measure the distance between B and C, an engineer takes a hot air balloon from place C, ascends vertically 100 m to point A, and observes the depression angle to place B as 30°, then the distance between B and C is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠ABC = 30°, AC ⊥ BC, AC = 100m, in right triangle ABC, BC = AC / tan∠ABC = 100 / (√3 / 3) = 100√3(m). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 数学实践探究课中,老师布置同学们测量学校旗杆的高度．如图所示,小明所在的学习小组在距离旗杆底部10米的地方,用测角仪测得旗杆顶端的仰角为60°,则旗杆的高度是()米．
answer_cot: 如图,根据题意得:AC=10米,∠ACB=60°,∵∠A=90°,∴在Rt△ABC中,AB=AC•tan∠ACB=10×tan60°=10×√{3}=10√{3}(米)．故选:D．
question_en: During the mathematics practical inquiry class, the teacher assigned the students to measure the height of the school flagpole. As shown in the figure, Xiaoming's study group, at a distance of 10 meters from the base of the flagpole, measured the angle of elevation to the top of the flagpole to be 60°, then the height of the flagpole is () meters.
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, according to the problem: AC = 10 meters, ∠ACB = 60°, since ∠A = 90°, therefore in right triangle ABC, AB = AC•tan∠ACB = 10×tan60° = 10×√3 = 10√3 (meters). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,要测量底部不能到达的一座塔的高度AB,甲、乙两名同学分别在C,D两处进行了测量．已知点B,C,D在同一直线上,且AB⊥BD,CD=12米,∠ACB=60°,∠ADB=30°,则塔的高度AB为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, to measure the height AB of a tower whose base cannot be reached, two students, A and B, took measurements at points C and D respectively. It is known that points B, C, and D are on the same straight line, and AB ⊥ BD, CD = 12 m, ∠ACB = 60°, ∠ADB = 30°, then the height of the tower AB is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠ABC = 90°. Since ∠ACB = 60° and ∠ADB = 30°, therefore ∠CAD = ∠ACB - ∠ADB = 30°. Thus ∠CAD = ∠ADB, therefore AC = CD = 12 meters. In right triangle ABC, AB = AC•sin60° = 12 × √3/2 = 6√3 meters. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图1表示一个时钟的钟面垂直固定于水平桌面上,其中分针上有一点A,且当钟面显示3点30分时,分针垂直于桌面,A点距桌面的高度为10公分．如图2,若此钟面显示3点45分时,A点距桌面的高度为16公分,则钟面显示3点50分时,A点距桌面的高度为多少公分()
answer_cot: 作A″M⊥OA′,垂足为点M,∵当钟面显示3点30分时,分针垂直于桌面,A点距桌面的高度为10公分．∴AD=10,∵钟面显示3点45分时,A点距桌面的高度为16公分,∴A′C=16,∴AO=A″O=6,则钟面显示3点50分时,∠A″OA′=30°,∴MA″=3,∴A点距桌面的高度为:16+3=19公分．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in Figure 1, a clock face is vertically fixed to a horizontal table surface, with a point A on the minute hand, and when the clock face shows 3:30, the minute hand is perpendicular to the table surface, and the height of point A from the table surface is 10 cm. As shown in Figure 2, if the height of point A from the table surface is 16 cm when the clock face shows 3:45, then the height of point A from the table surface is how many centimeters when the clock face shows 3:50?
answer_cot_en: Draw A″M ⊥ OA′, with M as the foot of the perpendicular. Because when the clock shows 3:30, the minute hand is perpendicular to the table, and the height of point A from the table is 10 cm. Therefore, AD = 10. Because when the clock shows 3:45, the height of point A from the table is 16 cm. Therefore, A′C = 16. Therefore, AO = A″O = 6. Then when the clock shows 3:50, ∠A″OA′ = 30°. Therefore, MA″ = 3. Therefore, the height of point A from the table is: 16 + 3 = 19 cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,AC是⊙O的直径,∠P=50°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠P = 50°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, and ∠P = 50°, thus ∠AOB = 360° - 90° - 90° - 50° = 130°. Since AC is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - 130° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,AD⊥BC于D,DE⊥AB于E,若AD=3,DE=2,则AC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, AD ⊥ BC at D, DE ⊥ AB at E, if AD = 3, DE = 2, then AC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because in right triangle ABC, AD is perpendicular to BC at D, DE is perpendicular to AB at E, therefore ∠ADC = ∠AED = ∠BAC = 90°, thus ∠EAD + ∠DAC = 90°, ∠C + ∠CAD = 90°, therefore ∠C = ∠EAD, thus sin∠EAD = sin∠C = DE/AD = AD/AC. Given that AD = 3, DE = 2, therefore 2/3 = 3/AC, solving this gives: AC = 9/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=BC=2,以AB为直径的⊙O与BC相切于点B,则AC等于()
answer_cot: ∵BC是⊙O的切线,且切点为B,∴∠ABC=90°,故△ABC是等腰直角三角形；由勾股定理,得:AC=√{AB²+BC²}=√{2BC²}=2√{2}；故选C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = BC = 2, the circle ⊙O with AB as the diameter is tangent to BC at point B, then AC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC is the tangent to ⊙O, and the point of tangency is B, therefore ∠ABC = 90°, hence △ABC is an isosceles right triangle; by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: AC = √{AB² + BC²} = √{2BC²} = 2√{2}; Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 定义:定点A与⊙O上任意一点之间的距离的最小值称为点A与⊙O之间的距离．现有一矩形ABCD(如图),AB=14cm,BC=12cm,⊙K与矩形的边AB,BC,CD分别切于点E,F,G,则点A与⊙K的距离为()
answer_cot: 连接KE,KF,KG、AK,交⊙K于H点,∵ABCD是矩形,⊙K与矩形的边AB,BC,CD分别切于点E,F,G,∴EK=FK=KG,∴四边形BEKF、四边形FKGC均为正方形,∴BF=FC=EK=6cm；∵AB=14cm,∴AE=8cm,AK=10cm,∴AH=AK-KH=10-6=4cm,∴点A与⊙K的距离为4cm．故选:A．
question_en: Definition: The minimum distance between a fixed point A and any point on ⊙O is called the distance between point A and ⊙O. Now there is a rectangle ABCD (as shown in the figure), AB = 14 cm, BC = 12 cm, ⊙K is tangent to the sides AB, BC, CD at points E, F, G, then the distance between point A and ⊙K is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect KE, KF, KG, AK, intersect ⊙K at point H. Because ABCD is a rectangle, ⊙K intersects the sides AB, BC, CD of the rectangle at points E, F, G, respectively, therefore EK = FK = KG. Therefore, quadrilateral BEKF and quadrilateral FKGC are both squares, therefore BF = FC = EK = 6cm. Because AB = 14cm, therefore AE = 8cm, AK = 10cm, therefore AH = AK - KH = 10 - 6 = 4cm, therefore the distance from point A to ⊙K is 4cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,∠BOC=3∠AOB,若∠ACB=20°,则∠BAC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, ∠BOC = 3∠AOB, if ∠ACB = 20°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 20°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠ACB = 40°. Since ∠BOC = 3∠AOB, therefore ∠BOC = 120°. Thus ∠BAC = 1/2 ∠BOC = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、D是⊙O上两点,CD⊥AB,若∠DAB=70°,则∠BOC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O, CD ⊥ AB. If ∠DAB = 70°, then ∠BOC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD ⊥ AB and ∠DAB = 70°, therefore ∠ADC = 90° - ∠DAB = 20°, thus ∠AOC = 2∠ADC = 40°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - ∠AOC = 140°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A,B,C都是⊙O上的点,若∠ABC=110°,则∠AOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are points on ⊙O. If ∠ABC = 110°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()

question: 点B在⊙O上,点C是⊙O上异于A、B的一点,若∠AOB=50°,则∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: Point B is on ⊙O, point C is a point on ⊙O different from A and B. If ∠AOB = 50°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because ∠AOB = 50°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 25°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知点A、B、C在⊙O上,∠AOB=100°,则∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠AOB = 100°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB and ∠ACB are angles corresponding to arc AB, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠ACB. Since ∠AOB = 100°, therefore ∠ACB = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的弦,∠ABD=59°,则∠C等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord of ⊙O, ∠ABD = 59°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Since ∠ABD = 59°, therefore ∠A = 90° - ∠ABD = 31°, thus ∠C = ∠A = 31°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,正方形ABCD中,AB=8,Q是CD的中点,设∠DAQ=α,在CD上取一点P,使∠BAP=2α,则CP的长是()
answer_cot: 取BC的中点E,连接AE,作EF⊥AP,则△ABE≌△ADQ,得EB=EC=4,由≥ft\{\begin{matrix}AE=AE\\∠EFA=∠EBA\\∠BAE=∠FAE\\\end{matrix}\right.\得:△ABE≌△AFE,∴∠AEB=∠AEF,得EF=EB=EC,∵PE=PE,∴∠ECP=∠EFP=90°,∴△EPC≌△EPF,∴∠FEP=∠PEC,∴∠AEP=∠AEF+∠FEP=90°,∴∠PEF=∠PEC=∠EAP=∠EAB,∴△CEP∽△BAE,∴\frac{PC}{EC}=\frac{BE}{AB}=\frac{4}{8}=\frac{1}{2},即PC=2,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD, AB = 8, Q is the midpoint of CD, let ∠DAQ = α, take a point P on CD such that ∠BAP = 2α, then the length of CP is ()
answer_cot_en: Take the midpoint E of BC, connect AE, make EF ⊥ AP, then △ABE ≌ △ADQ, get EB = EC = 4, by the conditions {AE = AE, ∠EFA = ∠EBA, ∠BAE = ∠FAE}, we get: △ABE ≌ △AFE, therefore ∠AEB = ∠AEF, get EF = EB = EC, since PE = PE, therefore ∠ECP = ∠EFP = 90°, therefore △EPC ≌ △EPF, therefore ∠FEP = ∠PEC, therefore ∠AEP = ∠AEF + ∠FEP = 90°, therefore ∠PEF = ∠PEC = ∠EAP = ∠EAB, therefore △CEP ∽ △BAE, therefore PC/EC = BE/AB = 4/8 = 1/2, that is, PC = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,矩形的两条对角线的一个交角为60°,AC+BD=20cm,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴AC=BD,OA=OC=OD=OB,∵AC+BD=20,∴OA=OB=5,∵∠AOB=60°,∴△AOB是等边三角形,∴AB=OA=5,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, one of the angles where the two diagonals of the rectangle intersect is 60°, AC + BD = 20 cm, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rectangle, therefore AC = BD, and OA = OC = OD = OB. Since AC + BD = 20, therefore OA = OB = 5. Given that ∠AOB = 60°, therefore △AOB is an equilateral triangle, thus AB = OA = 5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,∠BAD=120°,对角线AC的长为3,则菱形ABCD的周长为()
answer_cot: 如图所示,∵四边形ABCD是菱形,AC是对角线,∴AB=BC=CD=AD,∠BAC=∠CAD=\frac{1}{2}∠BAD,∴∠BAC=60°,∴△ABC是等边三角形,∴AB=BC=3,∴AB=BC=CD=AD=3,∴菱形ABCD的周长是12．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, ∠BAD = 120°, the length of diagonal AC is 3, then the perimeter of the rhombus ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, AC is the diagonal, therefore AB = BC = CD = AD, ∠BAC = ∠CAD = 1/2 ∠BAD, thus ∠BAC = 60°, therefore △ABC is an equilateral triangle, thus AB = BC = 3, therefore AB = BC = CD = AD = 3, thus the perimeter of the rhombus ABCD is 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,∠MON=90°,动点A、B分别位于射线OM、ON上,矩形ABCD的边AB=6,BC=4,则线段OC长的最大值是()
answer_cot: 取AB中点E,连接OE、CE,如图所示:则BE=\frac{1}{2}AB=3,∵∠MON=90°,∴OE=\frac{1}{2}AB=3．在Rt△BCE中,利用勾股定理可得CE=√{3²+4²}=5．在△OCE中,根据三角形三边关系可知CE+OE＞OC,∴当O、E、C三点共线时,OC最大为OE+CE=3+5=8．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠MON = 90°, moving points A and B are located on rays OM and ON respectively, the side AB of rectangle ABCD is 6, BC is 4, then the maximum length of line segment OC is ()
answer_cot_en: Take the midpoint E of AB, connect OE and CE as shown in the figure: then BE = 1/2 AB = 3, because ∠MON = 90°, therefore OE = 1/2 AB = 3. In right triangle BCE, using the Pythagorean theorem, we can find CE = √(3² + 4²) = 5. In triangle OCE, according to the triangle inequality, CE + OE > OC, therefore, when points O, E, and C are collinear, OC is at its maximum value of OE + CE = 3 + 5 = 8. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,菱形ABCD中,∠BAD=120°,BC=10,则对角线AC的长等于()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是菱形,且∠BAD=120°,∴AB=BC,∠BAC=∠DAC=\frac{1}{2}∠BAD=60°,∴△ABC是等边三角形,∴AC=BC=10．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, ∠BAD = 120°, BC = 10, then the length of diagonal AC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, and ∠BAD = 120°, therefore AB = BC, ∠BAC = ∠DAC = 1/2 ∠BAD = 60°, thus △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore AC = BC = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,菱形ABCD的周长是16,∠A=60°,则对角线BD的长度为()
answer_cot: ∵菱形ABCD的周长是16,∴AB=AD=CD=BC=4,∵∠A=60°,∴△ABD是等边三角形,∴AB=AD=BD=4．∴对角线BD的长度为4．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of the rhombus ABCD is 16, ∠A = 60°, then the length of the diagonal BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the perimeter of rhombus ABCD is 16, therefore AB = AD = CD = BC = 4. Since ∠A = 60°, therefore △ABD is an equilateral triangle, thus AB = AD = BD = 4. Therefore, the length of the diagonal BD is 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,AB=5,∠B=60°,则对角线AC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, AB = 5, ∠B = 60°, then the diagonal AC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = BC, and ∠B = 60°, therefore △ABC is an equilateral triangle. Thus, AC = AB = 5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,菱形ABCD中,AB=15,∠ADC=120°,则B、D两点之间的距离为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, AB = 15, ∠ADC = 120°, then the distance between points B and D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD, because ∠ADC = 120°, therefore ∠A = 180° - 120° = 60°. Since AB = AD, therefore △ABD is an equilateral triangle, thus BD = AB = 15. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,两条对角线AC=12,BD=16,则此菱形的边长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是菱形,∴OA=\frac{1}{2}AC=\frac{1}{2}×12=6,OB=\frac{1}{2}BD=\frac{1}{2}×16=8,AC⊥BD,∴AB=√{OA²{+OB}²}=10．∴此菱形的边长为10．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, the two diagonals AC = 12, BD = 16, then the side length of this rhombus is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, therefore OA = 1/2 AC = 1/2 × 12 = 6, OB = 1/2 BD = 1/2 × 16 = 8, AC ⊥ BD, therefore AB = √(OA² + OB²) = 10. Hence, the side length of this rhombus is 10. Therefore, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,∠BAD=80°,AB的垂直平分线交对角线AC于点F,E为垂足,连接DF,则∠CDF等于()
answer_cot: 连接BD,BF,∵∠BAD=80°,∴∠ADC=100°,又∵EF垂直平分AB,AC垂直平分BD,∴AF=BF,BF=DF,∴AF=DF,∴∠FAD=∠FDA=40°,∴∠CDF=100°-40°=60°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, ∠BAD = 80°, the perpendicular bisector of AB intersects diagonal AC at point F, E is the foot of the perpendicular, connect DF, then ∠CDF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD, BF, because ∠BAD = 80°, therefore ∠ADC = 100°. Also, since EF perpendicularly bisects AB, and AC perpendicularly bisects BD, therefore AF = BF, BF = DF, thus AF = DF, therefore ∠FAD = ∠FDA = 40°, thus ∠CDF = 100° - 40° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,菱形ABCD中,∠B=60°,AB=2cm,E、F分别是BC、CD的中点,连接AE、EF、AF,则△AEF的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是菱形,∴AB=AD=BC=CD,∠B=∠D,∵E、F分别是BC、CD的中点,∴BE=DF,在△ABE和△ADF中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}AB=AD\\∠B=∠D\\BE=DF\\\end{matrix}\right.\∴△ABE≌△ADF(SAS),∴AE=AF,∠BAE=∠DAF．连接AC,∵∠B=∠D=60°,∴△ABC与△ACD是等边三角形,∴AE⊥BC,AF⊥CD(等腰三角形底边上的中线与底边上的高线重合),∴∠BAE=∠DAF=30°,∴∠EAF=60°,∴△AEF是等边三角形．∴AE=√{3}cm,∴周长是3√{3}cm．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rhombus ABCD, ∠B = 60°, AB = 2cm, E and F are the midpoints of BC and CD respectively. Connect AE, EF, and AF, then the perimeter of △AEF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, therefore AB = AD = BC = CD, and ∠B = ∠D. Since E and F are the midpoints of BC and CD respectively, therefore BE = DF. In △ABE and △ADF, we have {AB = AD, ∠B = ∠D, BE = DF}, therefore △ABE ≌ △ADF (SAS), thus AE = AF, and ∠BAE = ∠DAF. Connect AC, since ∠B = ∠D = 60°, therefore △ABC and △ACD are equilateral triangles, thus AE ⊥ BC, AF ⊥ CD (the median of an isosceles triangle coincides with the altitude), therefore ∠BAE = ∠DAF = 30°, thus ∠EAF = 60°, therefore △AEF is an equilateral triangle. Thus, AE = √3 cm, therefore the perimeter is 3√3 cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,BC=BD,∠C=65°,则∠ADB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, BC = BD, ∠C = 65°, then the degree of ∠ADB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC = BD, and ∠C = 65°, therefore ∠BDC = ∠C = 65°, thus ∠DBC = 180° - ∠C - ∠BDC = 50°. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, thus ∠ADB = ∠DBC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=6,BC=8,∠C的平分线交AD于E,交BA的延长线于F,则AE+AF的值等于()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,AD=BC=8,CD=AB=6,∴∠F=∠DCF,∵CF平分∠BCD,∴∠FCB=∠DCF,∴∠F=∠FCB,∴BF=BC=8,同理:DE=CD=6,∴AF=BF-AB=2,AE=AD-DE=2,∴AE+AF=4；故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 6, BC = 8, the bisector of ∠C intersects AD at E, and extends to intersect the extension of BA at F, then the value of AE + AF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ CD, AD = BC = 8, CD = AB = 6, therefore ∠F = ∠DCF. Since CF bisects ∠BCD, therefore ∠FCB = ∠DCF, thus ∠F = ∠FCB, therefore BF = BC = 8. Similarly, DE = CD = 6, therefore AF = BF - AB = 2, AE = AD - DE = 2, therefore AE + AF = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AE⊥BC于E,AF⊥DC交DC的延长线于点F,且∠EAF=60°,则∠B等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AE ⊥ BC at E, AF ⊥ DC and intersects the extension of DC at point F, and ∠EAF = 60°, then ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because in square ABCD, AF ⊥ CD, therefore BA ⊥ AF, thus ∠BAF = 90°. Since ∠EAF = 60°, therefore ∠BAE = 30°. Since AE ⊥ BC, therefore ∠B = 90° - 30° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,▱ABCD中,AE平分∠BAD,若CE=3cm,AB=4cm,则▱ABCD的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD=BC=10,AB=DC,AD∥BC,∴∠DAE=∠BEA,∵AE平分∠BCD,∴∠BAE=∠DAE,∴∠BEA=∠BAE,∴BE=AB=4cm,∴BC=BE+CE=7cm,∴▱ABCD的周长=2(DC+BC)=2(4+7)=22cm；故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AE bisects ∠BAD. If CE = 3 cm, AB = 4 cm, then the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD = BC = 10, AB = DC, and AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠DAE = ∠BEA. Since AE bisects ∠BCD, therefore ∠BAE = ∠DAE, thus ∠BEA = ∠BAE, therefore BE = AB = 4cm, thus BC = BE + CE = 7cm, therefore the perimeter of ▱ABCD = 2(DC + BC) = 2(4 + 7) = 22cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AE平分∠BAD,已知∠AEB=63°,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AE bisects ∠BAD, it is known that ∠AEB = 63°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠DAB + ∠B = 180°, ∠B = ∠D, therefore ∠AEB = ∠DAE = 63°. Since AE bisects ∠BAD, therefore ∠DAB = 2∠DAE = 2×63° = 126°, therefore ∠B = 180° - 126° = 54°, therefore ∠D = ∠B = 54°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,对角线AC、BD相交于点O,AC=10,BD=6,AD=4,则▱ABCD的面积是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,且AC=10,BD=6,∴OA=OC=\frac{1}{2}AC=5,OB=OD=\frac{1}{2}BD=3,∵AD=4,∴AD²+DO²=OA²,∴△ADO是直角三角形,且∠BDA=90°,即AD⊥BD,∴▱ABCD面积为:AD•BD=4×6=24．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, AC = 10, BD = 6, AD = 4, then the area of rectangle ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, and AC = 10, BD = 6, therefore OA = OC = 1/2 AC = 5, OB = OD = 1/2 BD = 3. Since AD = 4, therefore AD² + DO² = OA², thus △ADO is a right triangle, and ∠BDA = 90°, that is, AD ⊥ BD, therefore the area of ▱ABCD is: AD•BD = 4×6 = 24. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD的对角线交于点O,且AB=6,△OCD的周长为19,则▱ABCD的两条对角线的和是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD=6,∵△OCD的周长为19,∴OD+OC=19-6=13,∵BD=2DO,AC=2OC,∴平行四边形ABCD的两条对角线的和=BD+AC=2(DO+OC)=26,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals of the parallelogram ABCD intersect at point O, and AB = 6, the perimeter of △OCD is 19, then the sum of the two diagonals of ▱ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD = 6. Since the perimeter of △OCD is 19, therefore OD + OC = 19 - 6 = 13. Given that BD = 2DO, AC = 2OC, therefore the sum of the two diagonals of the parallelogram ABCD is BD + AC = 2(DO + OC) = 26. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,若∠B=60°,则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, if ∠B = 60°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore ∠D = ∠B = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,已知∠AOB=90°,AC=8cm,AD=5cm,则BD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, it is known that ∠AOB = 90°, AC = 8 cm, AD = 5 cm, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore OA = 1/2 AC = 1/2 × 8 = 4(cm). Since ∠AOB = 90°, therefore ∠AOD = 180° - ∠AOB = 90°. Thus, OD = √{AD² - OA²} = √{5² - 4²} = 3(cm), therefore BD = 2OD = 6cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,▱ABCD中,CE⊥AB,垂足为E,如果∠A=115°,则∠BCE等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, CE ⊥ AB at foot E, if ∠A = 115°, then ∠BCE equals ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠A + ∠B = 180°, thus ∠B = 180° - 115° = 65°. Since CE ⊥ AB, therefore ∠BEC = 90°, thus ∠BCE = 90° - ∠B = 90° - 65° = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,CE平分∠BCD交AD边于点E,且DE=3,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=DC,AD∥BC,∴∠DEC=∠BCE,∵CE平分∠DCB,∴∠DCE=∠BCE,∴∠DEC=∠DCE,∴DE=DC=AB=3,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, CE bisects ∠BCD and intersects side AD at point E, and DE = 3, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = DC, and AD is parallel to BC, therefore ∠DEC = ∠BCE. Since CE bisects ∠DCB, therefore ∠DCE = ∠BCE, thus ∠DEC = ∠DCE, therefore DE = DC = AB = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: ▱ABCD中,对角线AC与BD交于点O,∠DAC=42°,∠CBD=23°,则∠COD是()
question_en: In ▱ABCD, the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, ∠DAC = 42°, ∠CBD = 23°, then ∠COD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠DAC = ∠BCA = 42°, thus ∠COD = ∠CBD + ∠BCA = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD的对角线AC、BD相交于点O,点E是CD的中点,△ABD的周长为16cm,则△DOE的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴O是BD中点,△ABD≌△CDB,又∵E是CD中点,∴OE是△BCD的中位线,∴OE=\frac{1}{2}BC,即△DOE的周长=\frac{1}{2}△BCD的周长,∴△DOE的周长=\frac{1}{2}△DAB的周长．∴△DOE的周长=\frac{1}{2}×16=8cm．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, point E is the midpoint of CD, the perimeter of △ABD is 16 cm, then the perimeter of △DOE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore O is the midpoint of BD, △ABD ≌ △CDB. Also, since E is the midpoint of CD, therefore OE is the midline of △BCD, thus OE = 1/2 BC, that is, the perimeter of △DOE = 1/2 the perimeter of △BCD, therefore the perimeter of △DOE = 1/2 the perimeter of △DAB. Hence, the perimeter of △DOE = 1/2 × 16 = 8cm. Therefore, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,BM是∠ABC的平分线交CD于点M,且MC=2,▱ABCD的周长是14,则DM等于()
answer_cot: ∵BM是∠ABC的平分线,∴∠ABM=∠CBM,∵AB∥CD,∴∠ABM=∠BMC,∴∠BMC=∠CBM,∴BC=MC=2,∵▱ABCD的周长是14,∴BC+CD=7,∴CD=5,则DM=CD-MC=3,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, BM is the bisector of ∠ABC intersecting CD at point M, and MC = 2, the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 14, then DM is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because BM is the bisector of ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABM = ∠CBM. Since AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠ABM = ∠BMC, thus ∠BMC = ∠CBM, therefore BC = MC = 2. Since the perimeter of ▱ABCD is 14, therefore BC + CD = 7, thus CD = 5, then DM = CD - MC = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,P是▱ABCD上一点．已知S~△ABP~=3,S~△PDC~=2,那么平行四边形ABCD的面积是()
answer_cot: ∵P是▱ABCD上一点,∴S~△PBC~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形ABCD~,∴S~△ABP~+S~△PDC~═\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形ABCD~,∵S~△ABP~=3,S~△PDC~=2,∴S~平行四边形ABCD~=(3+2)×2=10,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on ▱ABCD. It is known that S△ABP = 3, S△PDC = 2, then the area of the parallelogram ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because P is a point on parallelogram ABCD, therefore the area of △PBC = 1/2 the area of parallelogram ABCD, thus the area of △ABP + the area of △PDC = 1/2 the area of parallelogram ABCD. Given that the area of △ABP = 3, and the area of △PDC = 2, therefore the area of parallelogram ABCD = (3 + 2) × 2 = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AE平分∠BAD交边BC于点E,若AD=8,EC=2,则AB的长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC=8,∵AE平分∠BAD交边BC于点E,∴∠BAE=∠DAE,∵AD∥BC,∴∠DAE=∠BEA,∴∠BAE=∠BEA,∴AB=BE,∴AB=BE=BC-CE=6,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AE bisects ∠BAD and intersects side BC at point E. If AD = 8, EC = 2, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, and AD = BC = 8. Since AE bisects ∠BAD and intersects side BC at point E, therefore ∠BAE = ∠DAE. Since AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠DAE = ∠BEA. Thus ∠BAE = ∠BEA, therefore AB = BE, hence AB = BE = BC - CE = 6. Therefore, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,过点C的直线CE⊥AB,垂足为E,若∠EAD=54°,则∠BCE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, the straight line CE passing through point C is perpendicular to AB, with the foot of the perpendicular at E. If ∠EAD = 54°, then the degree of ∠BCE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CE ⊥ AB, therefore ∠E = 90°. Since ∠EAD = 54°, therefore ∠2 = 90° - 54° = 36°. Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, thus ∠ECB = ∠2 = 36°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,BD=CD,∠C=70°,AE⊥BD于点E,则∠BAE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, BD = CD, ∠C = 70°, AE ⊥ BD at point E, then the degree of ∠BAE is ()
answer_cot_en: In △DBC, because BD = CD, and ∠C = 70°, therefore ∠DBC = ∠C = 70°. Also, in rectangle ABCD, AD is parallel to BC, therefore ∠ADB = ∠DBC = 70°. Since AE is perpendicular to BD, therefore ∠DAE = 90° - ∠ADB = 90° - 70° = 20°. Hence, the answer is: AD.

question: 如图,P为平行四边形ABCD内一点,过点P分别作AB、AD的平行线交平行四边形于E、F、G、H四点,若S~AHPE~=3,S~PFCG~=5,则S~△PBD~为()
answer_cot: 显然EPGD、GPFC、EPHA、PHBF均为平行四边形,∴S~△DEP~=S~△DGP~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形DEPG~,∴S~△PHB~=S~△PBF~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形PHBF~,又S~△ADB~=S~△EPD~+S~平行四边形AHPE~+S~△PHB~+S~△PDB~①S~△BCD~=S~△PDG~+S~平行四边形PFCG~+S~△PFB~-S~△PDB~②①-②得0=S~平行四边形AHPE~-S~平行四边形PFCG~+2S~△PDB~,即2S~△PBD~=5-3=2∴S~△PBD~=1．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point inside the parallelogram ABCD. Lines parallel to AB and AD are drawn through point P, intersecting the parallelogram at points E, F, G, and H. If S_AHPE_ = 3, S_PFCG_ = 5, then S_△PBD_ is ()
answer_cot_en: Clearly, EPGD, GPFC, EPHA, PHBF are all parallelograms, therefore the area of △DEP equals the area of △DGP, which is half of the area of parallelogram DEPG. Therefore, the area of △PHB equals the area of △PBF, which is half of the area of parallelogram PHBF. Also, the area of △ADB equals the area of △EPD plus the area of parallelogram AHPE plus the area of △PHB plus the area of △PDB. The area of △BCD equals the area of △PDG plus the area of parallelogram PFCG plus the area of △PFB minus the area of △PDB. Subtracting the second equation from the first, we get 0 equals the area of parallelogram AHPE minus the area of parallelogram PFCG plus twice the area of △PDB, that is, twice the area of △PBD equals 5 - 3 = 2. Therefore, the area of △PBD equals 1. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,▱ABCD中,∠A=120°,则∠1=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠A = 120°, then ∠1 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore ∠BCD = ∠A = 120°, thus ∠1 = 180° - ∠BCD = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,CE⊥AB,点E为垂足,如果∠D=55°,则∠BCE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, CE ⊥ AB, point E is the foot of the perpendicular, if ∠D = 55°, then ∠BCE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore ∠B = ∠D = 55°. Since CE ⊥ AB, therefore ∠BEC = 90°, thus ∠BCE = 90° - ∠B = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,∠ABC=60°,AB=BC=4cm,点M,N分别在边BC,CD上,且∠MAN=60°,则四边形AMCN的面积为()
answer_cot: 连接AC,∵∠B=60°,∴∠BAD=120°,∵∠MAN=60°,∴∠BAM=∠CAN,∴△ABC为等边三角形,∴AB=AC,∴△ABM≌△ACN,∴四边形AMCN的面积等于平行四边形面积的一半．∵AB=4cm,∴BC边上的高为2√{3},S~菱形ABCD~=4×2√{3}=8√{3}∴四边形AMCN的面积等于\frac{1}{2}×8√{3}=4√{3}．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠ABC = 60°, AB = BC = 4 cm, points M and N are on sides BC and CD respectively, and ∠MAN = 60°, then the area of quadrilateral AMCN is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AC, because ∠B = 60°, therefore ∠BAD = 120°, since ∠MAN = 60°, therefore ∠BAM = ∠CAN, thus △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore AB = AC, thus △ABM ≌ △ACN, therefore the area of quadrilateral AMCN is half of the parallelogram area. Since AB = 4cm, therefore the height on BC is 2√3, the area of diamond ABCD = 4 × 2√3 = 8√3, therefore the area of quadrilateral AMCN is 1/2 × 8√3 = 4√3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AB=4,BC=6,AC的垂直平分线交AD于点E,则△CDE的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵AC的垂直平分线交AD于E,∴AE=EC,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴DC=AB=4,AD=BC=6,∴△CDE的周长为:EC+CD+ED=AD+CD=6+4=10,故选:B．
